"Where is everybody else?"

"I don't know, I saw the woman take out some jars. They had some holes in them, so I'm guessing she wasn't trying to kill them. The people are also smaller than me right now, so they could fit in them easily."

"Awesome,hostages. Okay, did she say anything else?"

"Noo- wait, yeah, she did. She called herself 'The Shrinker', but 'Crazy Bitch would be a better name."

Magic Man looked at the doll sized woman, who was currently covering herself. " What... what is your name?"

"Amelia."

"Well, Amelia. I'm going to do my best to fix you, but I need to check for clues. I need to find those hostages, can you deal with being in my pocket for a while?

Amelia looked at Magic Man from his palm, slowly did she nod. Magic Man put the doll woman in his coat pocket and went off to find some clues on this 'Shrinker'.
15521111.title: The Shrinker Appears!

choices: Mark goes to class and Amelia tries to get her power under control
Mark goes to Amelia's family to ease their worry.
155211112.content:
Try as he might, Magic Man couldn't find any residual evidence of the Shrinker, or was it shrinker? You know, because she deals with height and, never mind. He did magical signatures in case the Succubus gave her mystic might, she didn't. Magic Man couldn't use his technological signature tracker because the Shrinker was using a new source of energy, so that was out of the question. Magic Man also didn't want to tamper with the evidence, after the last mess up he did with that, Magic Man left that source to the police.

Amelia shifted in his coat pocket as Magic Man tried in vain to search for the missing people. He could clearly hear her sigh in dismay, maybe her friends were gone as well?

"Damn, can't find anything. The police haven't been notified yet, hopefully they can find something I missed." Magic Man proclaimed. Amelia looked up at the sound of his voice. " You can't be serious! Everybody is missing and you're just going to let that crazy bimbo get away?"

"No, I'm not. I just need to wait for an opportunity to present itself." Magic Man looked at the six-inch doll sized girl, her voice seemed to possess a fire that she didn't have a few moments ago. She was probably trying to hype herself up, most likely from the guilt of running away.

"I'll contact the police and hopefully they'll get somebody here." Magic Man snapped his fingers as an old fashioned rotary phone appeared in his hand. He did it mostly for show, he could easily get a newer phone, but where was the fun it that? Amelia looked up at him as he called out through the line.

"Excuse, their has been a recent villain attack at-yes, this is Magic Man. Anyways, its between Katie Avenue and Hollander Park and- no Detective Evans, its a new one. I'm sorry, I don't make them, I just take them in. Okay, they do come after me, but- yeah, yeah. So listen, how long will it take for you to come down here? That long? Alright, see you then."

With that, Magic Man snapped the phone out of existence. Amelia watched from his coat pocket, wide eyed at his casual display with the police. Magic Man turned his head down at Amelia and smiled.

"Hey, Amelia, would you like to act as a witness for the police? I'm just asking and-"

"No, no, no one can see me now. I would die of embarrassment!"

"Just wondering, keep quiet as Detective Evans and her squad come to investigate. I'll get you at of her soon enough; i'll put you down as a anonymous source."

===

Those was a long hour, but Amelia kept her cool as Magic Man explained what had transpired. Detective Evans, as usual, kept bashing Magic Man of his involvement with the villains of the city. With various shots of "You horny bastard";" Your girlfriends are endangering the city;and "Perverted Fiends coming in, and around, the city." That last one was probably a euphemism of some sort. Finally, Magic Man flew back to his secret lair with Amelia.

He made contact with the ground and moved forward, Amelia could not get a grip on the mouth of the pocket. Magic Man's jiggling was causing her to keep falling down into the cotton depths. He stopped and Amelia could see a bright flash come through the cotton sheet that protected her from the world.

"And, presto, we're here. Welcome Amelia to Chateau de Magic!" Amelia heard the voice of Magic Man and many thoughts went in her mind.

"I'm going to see where our city's protector keeps his HQ! I wished I told him to get my phone, I sure as hell can't use it right now.

Amelia hurried up from the mouth pocket to look around, and was disappointed with seeing a dirty, rank, old warehouse. She could see broken bottle glasses,caved in windows, and cracks enveloping the floor.That bright flash she was greeted by through the cotton material was a broken light-bulb above Magic Man.As if to annoy her, his giant smiling face looked down at the grimacing girl, Amelia could only said a few words in response.

"THIS is where you live? Don't tell me, you're a hobo in civilian identity."

Magic Man said. "Not live, but it is where I keep my projects and where I look over the city from."

Amelia looked up at her savoir like he was a madman, Magic Man returned the look. With a laugh, he started to spin around. A thought occurred in Amelia's mind that Magic Man somehow snapped while she was traveling with him.

Magic Man's spinning was starting to make Amelia feel nauseous, but strangely she didn't fly out of Magic Man's coat pocket. Just as quickly as it begun, Amelia felt a sudden stop. She hurried back up to the coat's mouth and looked around, what she saw was completely different than the previous area.

It was almost as if somebody repainted the entire place; a large computer was located at the back of the warehouse; the walls were colored with a soothing palette; and cases of villain weaponry were everywhere.

Amelia could see Thunder Thigh's Thunder Thong; the villain's first defeat resulted in a humiliating ending. She saw Hypnotits Bra Of Titnosis; Magic Man took the thing off during the winter season. She saw a near car sized gum wad from Bubblepunk; that was when the villain tried to trap Magic Man in it, a weird plan, but nevertheless almost successful.

"You like? Took me a while to get this all together." Magic Man ran towards the computer, Amelia bobbed all the way. He reached it soon enough and took out the dizzy, tiny girl onto a table he conjured. Amelia yelped at her naked form, which wasn't as naked as it was before. It seemed that Magic Man had enough decency to make her a patient shawl for her troubles. He stared at her for a few moments and began to speak to her.

"Amelia, I'm going to test something out. It has to do with the Shrinker's ray and I need a test subject for my theory. Sense you're the only one who I can use as my test subject, will you agree to what i'm planning?"

Amelia was about to reply with a large "NO", but something in her mind stopped her. She saw flashes as her friends and colleagues began to shrink down in front of her. One girl named Sally, fifteen at most, was begging for help. Amelia took a liking to the girl and mentored her for a few days, Amelia could remember the girl plead for Amelia as she shrank. All Amelia did was cower and hide as people were injured, a coward was what Amelia was. She closed her eyes and began to breathe in. She wouldn't be that every again, she wouldn't cower away as people were harmed.

"I'll do it."

Magic Man nodded and began to chant slowly, Amelia could feel something happen to her. Whatever the feeling was, it snaked its way through her body like adrenaline. It coursed like a river trying to find its way out towards the ocean. She felt as though the rush of running away was changing into something else, something more noble. She stretched and began holding her arms towards the world, as if to say "Come and get me."She closed her eyes and basked in the exaltion. With one final chant, Magic Man ended as fast as he began.

Amelia opened her eyes, and was met by Magic Man's confused face. She looked to still be on the table, nothing seemed to happen to her.

"So, was it supposed to do someth-*ACHOO*!" Amelia sneezed, which resulted in the doll size girl blowing up back into her normal height. Magic Man jumped backwards in surprise. Amelia looked around and noticed she was back at her normal height again.

"You did it! You-*ACHOO*" Amelia sneezed again, which resulted in her shrinking down into a child size form. Not as small as her doll sized one, but still unnatural for a grown woman. Amelia swiveled her head around and noticed her new surroundings. Right before she began to speak, another sneeze began. This time it resulted in her growing to a foot smaller than her normal height,

Magic Man looked at the changing girl with obvious guilt and said only one thing to answer this conundrum.

"Dammit."
155211112.title: No luck in the search for the villain

choices: Mark checks in with Amelia to see how she is fairing.
Mark overhears something Dr.Grant was doing
1552111121.content:
"What is happening to me! I'm *ACHOO*" Amelia grew back to her normal height and instantly grabbed her nose to stop the sneezing. Magic Man's jaw could catch flies with how big it was at the moment. He shook his head an began to look more intensely at Amelia.

"It seemed that my mystical energy had collided with the technological energy from this Shrinker's ray, which caused a chain-reaction in your soul and physical makeup.This has given you a biological shift that you can easily access. I do, however, have an opportunity to understand the problem that this Shrinker's victims are dealing with at the moment." Magic Man stated.

"Okay, what has happened to me in-*ACHOO*" A very strong sneeze blew Amelia's fingers away from her nose. Amelia shrank down to a foot in height and looked at the large, Magic Man." -Happened to me in English?"

"You're now permanently this way."

"You mean-*ACHOO*" Child sized. "I'm-*ACHOO" Fun sized. "Permanently stuck shifting-*ACHOO*" Normal sized. "Heights!"

"No, not until I can find you something to help control your trigger or switch the trigger with something else.." Magic Man walked away from the girl.and came back with a menagerie of different geegaws and tools. Just as he was about to use the first one of these things, his phone ranged. Magic Man pulled it out a spells and looked at the message. He cursed and put all the weird objects away from prying eyes.

"Sorry Amelia, something has come up. You can watch T.V and move around the facility, take this stone and rub it if you need anything. Don't worry, it'll shrink with you." Magic Man handed Amelia a red stone with a green spiral on t for her to use. Amelia looked down at the stone as Magic Man walked off and got into a pod that Amelia swore wasn't there before. Magic Man stood in the pod for a few moments, right before a flash of light took him away to god knows where. This left Amelia alone in the facility,alone..

"I'll see whats on the tell- *ACHOO*:"
===

Mark hurried his way across campus as class almost began in twenty minutes. The situation of Amelia and the Shrinker still perpetuated through his mind, various ways to tackle the situation clouded his capacity to think.

"Hellooo, Mark!" A familiar voice called out, Mark turned around to see the distinct form of Dr. Grant walking towards him. Her general aura seemed to be changed now, she had more skip to her feet than usual.

"Oh, Dr. Grant, nice to see you again." Mark said to her, he smiled at seeing her changed attitude. Whatever happened to her was probably a great thing, Mark thanked this event; he liked seeing Dr. Grant happy.

"Oh, Mark, I feel exalted at life now. I have acquired a few,tiny, things to help with my mental health."

"What are these "tiny things" pray tell?"

"Oh, just some things I got at the store. They help in relieving my stress" Dr. Grant replied coolly, she walked off towards the poly-sci building as Mark made his way to the economics facility.

"I'm glad she got something to give herself her own happiness. She deserves what she has now,hopefully it lasts her a good while." Mark said aloud, he then instantly felt guilty. Somewhere in the city was a mad woman who had taken hostages.those whose own happiness were at stake. Mark needed to find those people to help,so that they can enjoy life like Dr. Grant.

===

"Alright, so how can I use this for my 'training'." Amelia said aloud, she had decided to test the maneuverability of her own body after trying to watch T.V resulted in her seeing the, currently relatable,movie of "The Incredibly Shrinking Man. She was currently the size of a three-year old child and had went around the place, which was a lot bigger than the warehouse could ever be, and had acquired a variety of objects to use.

A nail, string, a tiny piece of cloth, and other "small" tools to use. Amelia looked them over, right before she felt a sneeze build in her. She climbed on top of the table and waited for the sneeze to come.

*ACHOO* She felt herself shrink down to her pocket size and the she traveled over to her wares. Just like before, she studied what she had to use and began to combine those things together. Finally, she went and began to plan out how she wanted to reach her goal. Her goal being the bottom of the Thunder Thighs Thunder Thong exhibit.

She tied a piece of string around the nail to use as grappling hook. Then she used the cloth as a makeshift gloves to use, so not to burn her hands as she slid down the string. Next she traveled forwards to the exhibit, the distance being like a great desert..Then she arrived at the raised steps of the exhibits,easily passable for a normal human, these things were like the Himalayas for Amelia. Cracks in the foundation allowed her to slowly shimmer her way upwards, before she finally made her way to the thong. She breathed outwards in pure bliss and marveled at her work.

"Okay, I think i'm getting the hang of this." Amelia smiled, maybe she could help Magic Man take down the Shrinker? That was for later, for now Amelia was going to trek across the facility to hone her skills while Magic Man was away.
1552111121.title: New Discoveries

15521111212.content:
Mark walked down the corridors of the university, his mind was occupied with the thought of Amelia.
"What could've happen to have caused her strange situation? This hasn't happened before, although, the same could be said of the shrinking people. And who is this new villainess that has taken those innocent people?

Mark was so wrapped up in his own thoughts that he didn't even noticed when he collide into someone else. He grunted as he fell and the same sound came from across him. Mark looked up---or more accurately,down--- to see the short and curvy form of Dr.Grant. He shook himself out of his stupor to come to the doctor's aid and pulled her back onto her feet.

"I am so sorry, Dr. Grant, I didn't se- I mean, I was caught up in my own thing." Mark quickly explained.

"I'm fine, Mark." Dr. Grant smiled at him. Mark looked at Dr. Grant a little more closely. She had her hair down and her posture was more erect. She looked happier and seemed to have done her face up. In fact, she looked clean and ready for the day, unlike her usual slubby appearance.

"Dr. Grant, you look great. I..I mean...sorry." Mark stuttered out a reply.

'Don't be shy, Mark. I do look GREAT!" Dr. Grant struck a pose, which on her diminutive stature, normally looked ridiculous. The way she held herself at the moment though, made her look godly. Mark was slack-jawed for a moment, before he got a hold of himself.

Mark did a double-take of Dr. Grant and noticed a peculiar thing, by her side was a covered jar with a net over the top.He must've been looking very intently on it, because Dr. Grant answered him before he could say anything.

"A gift for myself, Mark. Just some little things I got for myself" Dr. Grant proclaimed. "I'll be seeing you later, Mark."

She grabbed her thing and trotted off, leaving Mark alone in the hallways. A bell rang that brought himself back to consciousness, he made his way to his classroom. He began to pick off where he stopped: "who is the new villain?"
15521111212.title: "Are you alright, Dr.Grant?"

choices: The next day, Mouse and Magic Man go find the Shrinker
That night, a different villain attacks
155211112122.content:
Mark got back to his place. When he arrived, he saw no sign of Amelia.
“Amelia? Hey are you here? I’m home!” He called. He still saw no sign of her. His place looked the same as always. Sunddenly, he heard something behind him.

“Oh hey Magic Man.”

He spun around and there she was, normal sized on the couch.

“Wait...But...wha...how? I just looked and you weren’t there.” He asked. She just casually sat there, acting like everything was normal. She suddenly burst out in laughter.

“You should’ve seen the look...hahahaha....on your face! Hahahah. Oh, priceless.”

“What’s going on here?” Mark asked. Amelia sighed and came over to him. She put her hand on his toned shoulder.

“Oh you silly guy. I got my powers under control. So I decided to do a little trick. Here watch this. I’m going to be child sized. ACHOO.”

Mark watched as she suddenly went down to the height of an 8 year old. “Now I’ll do normal height.”
Mark watched as she shot back up to normal.

“Wow! That’s great.” Mark said.

“I know!” She replied “I can’t to help you take out that villain. On the bright side, she did give me powers.” Amelia walked to the couch and once again plopped down. Mark just waited.

“Cmon silly. We’re friends. No need to be nervous. Just take off your coat, untie those shoes, put away the groceries, clean the exhibits, wash the dishes then come right over!”

Mark enjoyed the joke and followed the first two steps and then joined her. She was very nice. She had bright white teeth and was wearing ripped jean shorts, a t-shirt and sandals. Mark knew he would enjoy her company. After all his ex-girlfriends turning into villains, having a woman as his friend would be nice.
155211112122.title: Mark checks in on Amelia.

choices: It was another attackby the Shrinker
It was another villainess, but maybe Amelia wants to test her mettle?
1552111121222.content:
"Yeah, I'm good;I'm safe. I'm sorry I didn't call you immediately after the attack, I was just too scared." Amelia talked with her parents over the phone. Mark allowed her to counsel her family;thankfully, her parents didn't file a report for her.They were most likely hoping that she would get home soon. Although, from what Mark could hear, Amelia was getting chewed out by them.

A few minutes later, Amelia walked over to Mark, or Magic Man as she still didn't know his true identity,who was sitting on a chair in his lair. Amelia motioned for him to make something to sit on, which he obliged. Summoning up a giant, mouse themed chair. She briefly glared at him, but still, she slumped onto the animal chair.

"How'd it go?" Magic Man questioned.

"Badly. My parents want to bring me to the police, so I can answers some questions for them. And I still think I don't have a good control over my...*ACHOO*!"
Amelia shrunken down to a toddler sized version of herself. "...my powers. Back on topic, I don't have an alibi! What will I tell the police? 'Hey, so I was just saved by the city's great protector. Why only me? Its just because I ran like a coward!' What am I going to do?"

Magic Man looked down at toddler Amelia and scratched his head for a little bit. He snapped his fingers in a "eureka" moment. " I know someone who could help you out. He is a....friend of mine. Name's Mark and he'll act as your witness."

Amelia looked skeptically at Magic Man, then shrugged. Hey, he didn't fail her yet (that depended on your definition of "failure", however) and nodded at his suggestion. "Alright, their going to take me tomorrow, will this Mark be ready then?"

"Righty-O" Magic Man cursed himself, who says "Righty-O", everyone but him that is. He stood up from his chair, confidently holding himself in front of the toddler-sized Amelia with gusto.Amelia looked up at Magic Man, with a face between "Awesome" and "Is this really the dork that protects the city?"

Magic Man held himself like this for longer than he intended, when he was than thankfully interrupted by a beep from his monitor. He swerved around to check the warning. The small Amelia waddled behind him.

"Where did you get a monitor like this from?" Amelia questioned Magic Man.

"I had to conjure it up." Magic Man explained as he looked through his messages. For a second time that night, Amelia looked at him weirdly. Magic Man noticed that and went more in-depth. "My magic powers generally can summon up simple tools and objects, but larger things take up more time. I don't need to have intimate knowledge of the object, but I have to have a general idea of it, shape and some of its workings. Its also limited to things in the realm of 'norm.' That is why I can't summon up a 'put villainess in jail when they do crime' machine."

Magic Man found the warning he was searching for. "It seems that....
1552111121222.title: Mark Patrols Tonight

choices: “Mouse” and Magic Man go fight The Shrinker
15521111212221.content:
“What is it?” Amelia asked. Mark didn’t want to tell her that it was in fact an attack by the Shrinker.

“Oh...I’m not sure. It’s just a disturbance.” Magic Man lied. Amelia narrowed her eyes. Magic Man laughed awkwardly to try and cover up his untruthful ways.

“Don’t you lie to me. It’s her isn’t it. I know it is. And I’m coming with you.” Amelia said. Mark tried to lie again, but Amelia wouldn’t hear it.

“Ok.” Mark finally agreed. “But you need a suit. You can’t go like this or your identity will be out there for all the villains to see.” Magic Man quickly rummaged through his collection.

“Ah. Here we go. This is from a crazy villain who thought she was a rat. She tried to wear this like she was super.” Amelia looked at it. She smiled and had Magic Man leave the room while she changed into her new suit.

When she came out, Mark put a tightness spell on. Not as creepy as it sounds. It was so that the suit would remain snug even when she got smaller.

“From here on, I am no longer a regular person. I’m...Mouse! A super hero!” Amelia cried triumphantly.
15521111212221.title: “Mouse” goes on patrol

choices: The duo encounter The Shrinker, who fled, but not before she shot Detective Evan
The duo look around for clues and their efforts bear fruits.
155211112122211.content:
"Not yet;you aren't" Magic Man proclaimed,patting Mouse on the shoulder. Magic Man walked past the new heroine.Just when he was about to exit, a idea formed in the hero's head.

"This may sound weird,but could you shrink down? Like, maybe small enough to fit in my pocket?"

Magic Man raised his hand just before Mouse could speak."Yeah, I know:embarrassing, but hear me out, though. It usually takes alot out of me to teleport, thats why I fly to most places. But seeing as you want to come with me to the place, I don't know how I'll fair carrying you there. So what I'm thinking you should do is shrink down and I'll carry you in my pocket."

Mouse stared at him for a few moments, before she shrank down to the around the size of a middle finger. Magic Man gently lifted her up and placed her inside of his pocket. Heading towards the door, Magic Man arrived in front of the abandoned warehouse. Looking around, he muttered a spell. A light pulse burst from him, highlighting everything in the area. Magic Man watched for any movement, looking for a human glow, seeing none, he dissipated the spell.

Staring upwards, Magic Man shot up into the sky and flew himself towards the disturbance.
===

"You look kinda adorable peeking out of my pocket." Magic Man jokingly stated as he stared over the skyline; Magic Man soared through the air like a bird, Mouse stared down at the skyline.

"Laugh it up all you want." Mouse spoke sarcastically, before she noticed something odd." Why can we talk with each other? You're not going plane fast, but you're still going at a respectable speed. Nothing is covering us and shouldn't I be pushed to the bottom of your pocket right now?'

"You know, I'm glad you asked that. I don't get that question often, but I also don't get partners often as well." Magic Man shook his head as he realized he was rambling. "Anyways, yeah, my spells get rid of the most dangerous parts of physics. You know, like someone like little old me not getting oxygen while hundreds of feet in the air. And not getting shot down as a U.F.O or being detected by the government. Hell, if you look closely, you can see bugs getting squished against a shield."

Mouse eyes widened, she peered in front of her to see a faint glow in front of the duo. There is was, a shield, which had a bunch of squished bugs in front of Magic Man.

"Yuck! Why isn't there a giant field of green around you when you come down then?" Mouse spoke.

"Watch." Magic Man replied, Mouse turned towards the shield again to see it flash faintly. Not too bright,but bright enough for someone paying attention. Mouse saw the bug bodies accumulating on the shield disappear, fried off like crispy critters.

"Cool, and practical, right?"Magic Man questioned.

"Does it work on cars?"

"I'll see what I can do." Magic Man replied,sardonically. Suddenly, he stopped and floated around an area. He slowly descended down onto the street,police cars already at the scene of the crime. The new Shrinker crime scene was a parlor of all places; "Beau-tiques." was proudly stamped onto a sign.

"We're here." He whispered into his pocket. Mouse jumped out, growing back to her larger size. Magic Man landed on the concrete, he waved as Detective Evans walked up to the heroes.

"Magic Man and..." She stared as Mouse came up beside him. She looked back at Magic Man."I didn't know you're working with Rat?"

"No, this is Mouse. She's new." Magic Man replied. Detective Evans raised an eyebrow at that, turning to Mouse, she pointed a finger. "You may want to change the colors on costume, make the ears a little bigger, make it a little more charming. The original Rat wasn't a danger to anyone, but she was annoying."

"You got it ma'am." Mouse saluted her, Evans rolled her eyes, she offered her hand for a handshake which Mouse took gingerly. After finishing their introductions, Evans went back to conversing with Magic Man.

"What do we have on this place?" Magic Man questioned.

"Its a parlor, as you obviously see, but also an antique store." She raised a hand as Magic Man was about to say something. "I know, weird, but this isn't my store. We only know what happened through piece meal, so excuse me if my explanation is bare bones. About twenty minutes ago, the villianess known as Shrinker walked into the store; pointing her weird gun around, she tried to shrink a bunch of civilians. She didn't succeed, with over twelve people getting away from her, though, she did get a sizable amount of people. Important among them is Ayla Chang, known as 'Lady Quartz' to her friends."

She interrupted Magic Man again with a raised hand." I didn't name her. Back onto topic, she proceeded to due this for over ten minutes. An anonymous eyewitness spoke that vacuumed over sixteen people into cages. She escaped, but we have a good idea that she may still be in the area."

"Thanks, we'll do our best to help, Evans" Magic Man proclaimed. As two walked away, Magic Man faintly heard "I wonder what the other girls in the city will do once they find out he's taken." He blushed at Evan's observation.
155211112122211.title: “Mouse” and Magic Man go fight The Shrinker

choices: Magic Man and Mouse gives chase and seemingly corner Shrinker
Magic Man and Mouse gives chase and somehow lose her.
1552111121222111.content:
Mouse and Magic Man searched the crime, or more accurately, Magic Man did so. Seemingly having more experience around this type of situation, Mouse watched as Magic Man began to speak with the police.

"I wished I know what to look for." Mouse thought as she saw Magic Man head into the crime scene. She did her best to look like she was doing something, but she did not seem quite there. Shrugging, Mouse walked around the rest of the building, hopefully some fruits for that labor would commence.

Walking towards the back, Mouse came across one certain detective. Evan was looking down at a piece of glass, a glove covering her hand as to not contaminate the evidence.

"Oh, sorry." Mouse coughed out as she saw Evans. The brunette didn't seem to be non-pulsed by the heroine's arrival. Getting up and turning around, she placed her hands onto her hips.

"Hello there Mouse." Evans replied. "You're not with Magic Man."

"Yeah, he seemed more suited for the investigations than I am."

Evans raised an eyebrow, but seem to relent from the fact. Turning back towards her own investigations, Mouse thought she was being dismissed. Just when she was about to leave, Evans called out.

"Hey Mouse, can you come over here?"

Mouse complied and walked right next to Evans. Crouching down next to the detective, the officer of the law motioned her to look closer.

"Can you use your shrinking powers? I'm seeing something really weird on this glass here and I'm not quite sure if my mind is playing tricks on me."

Mouse nodded and shrunk down. She saw the lot getting larger and larger around her, before her body stopped at around 3 inches. Evans whistled, which caused Mouse to cover her ears.

"Sorry"

Mouse nodded at the apology, soon walking right towards the piece of glass. Bending down to inspect the glass, she soon saw what Evans about. It was a minor indent in the glass, but what made it strange was that it appeared to be chiseled with something. As if someone had a tiny pick and carved out a piece of the glass. Mouse raised an eyebrow.

"Detective Evans, where did you get this glass from?" Mouse questioned. Evans pointed to one of many broken windows and Mouse regrew to her normal height. Walking over, she saw the broken glass window. Shrinking down again, she grabbed onto the ledge to inspect the miniature scene. She jumped inside of the building,avoiding glass shards on the windowsill. She inspected the corner of where she was at. Looking at the side, she could see miniature picks in the side of the wall. Craning her head, Mouse could see the tiny carvings going up all the way to the top of the roof.

Mouse turned towards Magic Man and headed to the windowsill's edge. Growing before she hit the floor, Mouse came to Magic Man. Behind her, she could hear Evans shuffling to get to the duo.

"Mouse, wha-"

Mouse quickly tapped on his side and pointed to the corner. Raising her fingers upwards, she pointed to the roof. Magic Man stayed quiet, while Evans motioned her men to point their guns upwards. Magic Man whispered something out and a small energy arrow appeared next to his head. A sharp whistle erupted from his mouth. The arrow shot forth, followed by a miniature curse from someone.

"Put your hands over yo-"

Evans never got the chance to finish that sentence. Ten small smoke bombs came from that corner, which soon became normal sized bombs. They exploded over the crowd and a thud inside of the was masked by a variety of curses. A bright beam shot forth, splashing against Evans chest.

The perp rushed out the backdoor of the boutique while everyone else was dealing with the chaos inside.

"EVANS" Magic Man screamed out.

"I'm okay, just get that crook." Her sound soon grew too tiny to hear. Magic Man quickly uttered a shield spell to cover the detective, so hopefully nobody would step on her small size.

"Mouse, come here!" Magic Man cried out. The junior heroine rushed forth and grabbed a hold of Magic Man's hand. She shrank down and was soon gently placed inside of his pocket. The mage stomped out of the boutique, shooting after the villainess like a bullet.
1552111121222111.title: Detective Evans, no!

choices: Cut to Mark meeting a strangely vigorous Dr. Grant
Cut to Amelia at her family's place.
15521111212221112.content:
He ran after the retreating form of The Shrinker, intent on finally bagging her. Unfortunately, it was of course not as simple as that. The retreating villainess shot beams after beams behind herself.

It struck targets at random. It shrunk load-bearing holds, cars, people, and all manner of things.Which gave Magic Man a considerable load to work with. He jumped forwards, snatching a woman who had shrunk while crossing the street. He laid her down onto the side and allowed Mouse to begin administering aid. Pointing upwards, he teleport towards the sky and brought down a man who was falling from his platform.

Placing him down, Magic Man then moved towards a car which was slowly shrinking and the unfortunate inhabitants who weren't under the beam's effects. Opening the door, he moved each occupant out of the vehicle. Wiping his forehead, Magic Man quickly made a mystical stoplight to replace one that had shrunk do to The Shrinker's powers.

Finshing with this section, he quickly grabbed a hold of Mouse,quickly making sure the shrunken woman had some way to receive aid, and moved after The Shrinker again.

All-in-all,this entire event took around five to ten minutes.

The Shrinker had not gotten far, but this time Magic Man did his best to deflect the worse of her powers from manifesting. He brought up shield, temporary masses, and even used mirrors to deflect each of her beams. Some shot into the sidewalk making potholes,others shot into the side of buildings which crunch areas of them inwards, other shot skywards and some unfortunate birds were hit.

"We're still hot on her tail." Mouse announced. The duo saw The Shrinker run towards into an alleyway. Smiling, Magic Man ran in and saw...nothing.

"She must've shrunk!" Mouse screamed. Jumping out of Magic Man's pocket, she grew to her full size before impact then shrunk down again. She searched through the alleyway, every nook and cranny, but despaired at finding no source of the missing villianess.

"NO!" Mouse cried. Magic Man gently lifted her up and counseled her. After a few moments, the hero realized that he needed to check in on Evans and the woman. He teleported back to the shrunken woman's spot, Magic Man quickly scooped her up and then teleported back to Evan's place.

Greeting him upon getting there was the greatly angry detective holding a piece of cloth for modesty.
15521111212221112.title: And The Shrinker is gone again.

155212.content:
As soon as he left, Dr. Grant began to tinker with one of her gadgets. While she did, she didn’t notice the swirling mist behind her.
“We meet at last Dr. Grant!” A seductive voice called.
The short professor spun around and faced a strange sight. A woman who was glowing and wearing flowing white and red robes floated in front of her.
“Who are you?”
“I am simply a lover of justice. And revenge.”
“What’s that supposed to mean.”
The succubus smiled in pity.
“Dr, I know you’ve been bullied because of your size. It has tortured you long enough. It’s time someone else knew how it felt.”
“I don’t understand.” Dr. Grant said.
“You will. I hereby grant you the power.......OF SHRINKAGE!!!” She laughed and disappeared.
Dr. Grant was left alone in her laboratory. She thought about the strange events that had just occurred.
Mark strolled in.
“Hey Dr. G. What’s up?”
“Uh, hi. Um, uh, Mark.” She muttered.
“Is everything ok?”
Suddenly, it dawned on Dr. Grant. She has the power to shrink. Something inside her at that moment snapped, creating a villain.
She grinned maniacally.
“Oh I’ve never been better Mark.”
She slowly raised her hands and grunted. Mark suddenly felt that _____
155212.title: The Shrinker Rises!

choices: Dr. Grant Finds our little hero
Mark avoids her and goes for help.
1552121.content:
Dr. Grant began to rise higher and higher.
The foundation shook as the midget suddenly had a size changing explosion. Then Mark realized what was happening. Dr. Grant wasn’t changing, THE BUILDING WAS!

“What’s happening to you?” Mark asked.

“I’m more powerful than ever puny little guy. You and all your worthless, powerless beings have no chance against me! So you think I’m short huh? Well watch THIS!”

Mark ran across the room as she continued to shrink the school. He threw open the door to the lab and sprinted down the hallway. He was followed by Dr.Grants laughter wherever he went.

“Get out! Run! We’re SHRINKING! Go! Emergency! Clear the building! RUUUNNNNN!” He screamed, trying to alert everyone.

As he ran and warned, he unzipped his shirt and pulled off his belt, leaving them in the hall. He was now Magic Man! Suddenly, the rumbling stopped. Students swarmed the halls in full blown panic. Magic Man ran toward the office. He threw open the door and stormed behind the administration desk.

“Ma’am, I need this microphone. Now.” He asked.

Before the old secretary responded he grabbed the PA and pressed the button, causing a ton of feedback.

“Attention students! Please do not panic. This is Magic Man. I am here to help. But, for me to help you, you need to help me. Got it? Good. Please, everyone calmly return to your classes, or the nearest safe room. Go into an immediate lockdown. Nobody leave the building until I say. There’s a villain out there. And a real big one too.”

Magic Man dropped the mic, and crashed through the nearest window, rolling on the grass. He was alert. But all he saw was the school in front of him. Until a massive boom shook the earth.
Boom.
What in the world? he thought.
BOOM

Magic Man began to panic. It was her. Dr.Grant was coming nearer. Suddenly, he saw her. She was enourmous. The two story college building only came up to her waist. It was the size of a table to her.
She turned toward Mark’s position.

“Where is my little Magic Man. Or should I say Magic Mark!”

Magic Mans cover was blown! He knew that this giant (well, she was actually normal and the school was tiny) would destroy him. He had to get help. Or, he would be found and crushed by the evil doer.
1552121.title: The school was shrinking

choices: They revise a new plan to save the day
15521212.content:
Taking great care, Magic Man flew off, leaving Dr. Grant and the school. He had to find help. So he did what anyone would do, he went to the home of his partner, Mouse.

He flew over huge buildings. He dodged enourmous people. The wind battered his tiny frame. After what seemed like a million miles, he finally flew into her house via an open window.

She was sitting on the couch, munching on a snack and giggling at “The Bachelor”. He quickly landed next to her.

“Hey! Mouse! Amelia! Down here!” He screamed, waving his arms. She looked down.

“Aaaaah! Mark what happened!” She said, bending down and putting her billboard sized face in front of him.

“I had a run in with the Shrinker. Amelia, she took over my school. The old Fendermen building, is now under her control. She shrunk me and everyone inside.”

Amelia sighed. She suddenly shrank down to his size.
“There, that’s better.” She said, looking him in the eye.

“How in the world do we stop her? I mean, you can fight her, you’re plenty tall. But, she’ll just shrink you down!”

Amelia frowned. She began to think. “Will her powers affect me? I mean after all, I can alter my size. Maybe if she shrinks me I can just go back.”

Mark thought about it. He wasn’t sure. Amelia was new to his life and her power was still being uncovered. It was risky to attack Dr. Grant. She was centered on vengence.
15521212.title: Mark avoids her and goes for help.

155212121.content:
Amelia quickly changed into her super suit. Magic Man quickly grabbed her.

“Hold on. I’m gonna fly us there. Just be ready to go. I have no idea what evil plan she had in mind. Let’s go!”

Amelia nodded. She had shrunk to a size smaller than Magic Man so he could easily travel. They flew off, going as fast as his tiny powers could carry them. As they flew, Magic Man scanner the city to see what was happening.

Bubble Punk was chewing a wad behind a store, and Thunder Thighs was casually walking toward the power plant. He had no time for those minor problems.

When they had almost arrived, Magic Man got high up to see the situation. He was horrified. Dr. Grant had torn up the half of the English wing. Tiny students ran out of the building in different directions. Currently, the Shrinker was laughing heartily and using her feet to try and crush runaway students.

“Oh my god! We have to do something RIGHT NOW! You have to grow and fight her. Now!” Magic Man said.

“Wait! Just think about this. I could grow. Or, we could try and distract her while we evacuated.”
155212121.title: Mark brings her back ASAP

choices: Continue with the small student rescue!
1552121211.content:
“I think you have to get back to normal size and take her on. You’ll have a size advantage. I’ll handle the students. Good?” Magic Man said.

Amelia nodded. Mark flew down to the ground and placed Mouse there. She smiled and gave him a hug.

“Be safe.” She said. Magic Man squeezed her tight. They both pushed away and became serious. Mouse winked at Mark before instantly ascending to her normal height. Each step thundered as she jogged over to The Shrinker.


.....

Magic Man flew over to a crowd of students. They were all in complete panic. He used a spell to make his voice louder. “Everyone! Stop! I’m going to get you out of here. We’ll find a way to get you back to normal. Just stay calm and let’s go.”

Magic Man began to grab students. He picked them up two at a time and flew them to safety. By safety, he meant a nearby building that was abandoned. He quickly put a protection spell around the warehouse, and flew back for more students.
1552121211.title: Grow and Fight! Now!!

choices: She makes out with Mark as she slowly shrinks him.
She rapidly shrinks Mark. Her curvy body was eager to play with him.
Mark manages to escape before she shrinks him further.
1552122.content:
Mark stumbled as his height began to leave him. He fell forward and was caught by the college professor. She helped him to his feet, and the man was surprised to see he was now eye level with the short woman.

"It worked!" Dr Grant squealed in delight as she rapidly clapped her hands.

"What worked? What did you do!?" Mark asked in panic. He grabbed the scientist's shoulders in a fear induced death grip.

"Oh, Mark. The most beautiful woman came by and granted me this power. The power to make the world smaller than me." She explained with a sense of awe and wonder in her voice. "I can get revenge on everyone! Everyone except you, Mark."

Dr, Grant looked at him longingly and licked her lips. Mark was left terrified for completely different reason now. He tried to get away, but the superpowered woman grabbed him and pulled him into a hug.

"You were the only one who was kind to me. And for that kindness, I think deserve a special reward." She told the shrunken man as she lovingly caressed him.
1552122.title: He was shrinking

15521221.content:
Dr. Grant pressed her lips against Mark's as his body began to tingle with the sensation of shrinking again. The would be hero tried to squirm free, but failed because he didn't want to hurt the bullied professor.

Thoughts of escape briefly left him as the superpowered woman slipped her tongue into his mouth. He let out a moan as she probed him. He tried to fight back with his own tongue, but it was completely overpowered by her larger one.

Eventually, Dr. Grant broke the kiss. Mark was surprised he was still eye level with the professor only to quickly realize she had knelt down to keep the kiss going.

"Enjoying your reward?" Dr. Grant asked lovingly as she stared into his eyes.

Marks only response was to nod dumbly. He was honestly feeling overwhelmed but saying he hated it would be a lie.

"Good." Dr. Grant said as she affectionately patted his cheek. "Then let's keep going."

As Mark started to shrink again, Dr. Grant decided to...
15521221.title: She makes out with Mark as she slowly shrinks him.

choices: He goes into a nearby room/locker room
He runs into someone. (Maybe this stalls him until Dr. Grant arrives)
15521223.content:
Mark quickly pushed Dr: Grant off, and he atumbked out of the door. She let him go, smiling as he left. She would get him, soon. But for now, she had to begin to plan her next move.

Mark ran down the hallway in a full out sprint. He ducked his head as he passed people who might recognize him. He finally made it to the exit. He turned and scanned the hall behind him, making sure he wasn’t followed. He was now Dr. Grant’s height of 4’10. He stopped to catch his breath. Running at this size was not easy. He turned and pushed open the door, beginning the long run to his dorm.

....meanwhile....

Dr. Grant fiddled with her machines. She began to put them in boxes. She had already cleaned out her desk. She heard a knock at the door. The Dean walked in.

“Hello Dr. Grant. What seems to be the problem? Are you leaving us?” Said the Dean. Dr. Grant smiled and walked over to her boss.

“Unfortunately, yes. There are certain....issues, in my life that I have to deal with. I have to resign immediately. It’s been a pleasure working here.” She said, extending her hand. The Dean was sincere and took it, shaking it firmly.

“Well if you ever need the position, and we haven’t filled it, you are welcome to join us again.” He said. Dr. Grant began to grin. But this wasn’t happiness, it was....evil? Suddenly, the Dean felt lightheaded. He let go of her hand and stumbled backward. His vision blurred.

When he regained his senses, all he could see was darkness. He looked around frantically, trying to make sense of his surroundings. Suddenly, an earthquake rocked the floors. He tumbled to the ground. The last thing he saw was an enormous hand closing on him.

.....

Mark had made it to his building. He pushed open the door and went inside. He finally rested. Once he was breathing normally, he began to casually walk to the staircase. He slowly ascended to the fourth floor. He was in his hallway, finally.

Mark then heard a sound that made him gulp. It was unusually loud sound of footsteps. He gasped and began to rub once again as a person, or people, began to approach him. He had to make a decision.
15521223.title: Mark escapes the professor, and a new villain

15522.content:
Mark walked down the street. He was wearing his costume underneath his sweater in case he needed to fight crime.
Suddenly, a mini car drive past him. People who were only a foot tall screamed and ran away from where Mark was going.
He ripped off his street clothes and assumed the role of Magic Man. Sirens wailed as he flew toward the disturbance. When he arrived, all he saw was a short curvy woman laughing maniacally.
At her feet were tens of terrified police officers.
She looked mad with power.
“Halt Villain! On behalf of this City, I demand you stop this madness!”
The Woman turned toward him. She smirked.
“I am The Shrinker! And punk, I’m gonna rule this city!”
Magic Man lowered himself to the ground and readied for battle. The Shrinker just stood, as if she was bored.
Magic Man charged at her, he felt heavy resistance, so he closed his eyes and fought against the unseen force. It stopped, and he jumped at her triumphantly.
He crashed into a mountain of flesh. He got to his feet and slowly tilted his head higher until he saw the face of the formerly short woman grin down at him.
“Hey there little fella!” She teased.
Magic Man backed away from the behemoth. She was easily double his size. He only reached her waist. What now?
15522.title: Scum in the city

choices: He wakes up in a jar
He wakes up in her lair.
155221.content:
She promptly starts laughing. Magic Man tried to scramble away but she grabbed him by the collar.
“Oh I don’t think so little guy.” She said.

With that, she tossed him onto the street, and sat on him.

It was getting harder and harder to struggle as the Shrinkers butt was starting to get bigger and bigger on Marks face.
"Wow" he heard her say, "You have gotten a lot smaller there little guy.”

She slowly got up, removing her massive body (massive to you) from on top of Mark.

Mark rolled away, getting up and facing his much bigger opponent. He couldn't help himself from attacking, he just wanted to shut her up so badly that he charged with all he had.

Then, just when Magic Man got in front of her, he ducked down and grabbed the Shrinkers leg, knocking her off balance and bringing her down to the floor along with Magic Man.

However while they were both falling to the ground Dr. Grant made a quick maneuver that turned the tides in her favor yet again. Using her other leg to stay on top of Mark as she fell forward Dr. Grant managed to land on top of him cushioning her own fall while he absorbed the impact for her. The now heavier villain landed on his back, knocking all the air out of his lungs and possibly bruising some of his ribs.

Magic Man quickly closed his eyes, listen to the Shrinker laugh as he went unconscious.
155221.title: She’s not done yet. Fight

15523.content:
How about if Magic Man tries to break into Dr. Grants secret laboratory (lair), but she catches him in the act?

Or

Something else. Another place por favor.
15523.title: Well, where to Dr. Grant?

choices: Rescue mission. Magic Man is coming!
155231.content:
Mark slowly crept through an abandoned building. Rubble and old antiques layed around him on the dusty wood floor. Mark, (now in his Magic Man costume) was sure that this is where he followed The Shrinker to.
He looked for secret doors or rooms, or anything that could lead him to her. After a moment, he came to a bookcase. He pulled the lone book, and suddenly, it swung open, revealing a metal staircase leading downward.
“This is it!” He muttered.
He slowly crept down the stairs, until he came to the bottom. A massive cavern full of gadgets, wires, and equipment. She also had an entire shelf of glass jars for her her victims. Mark stayed in the dark and watched as the curvy shorty worked on a futuristic machine. He did have the element of surprise, should he try and fight her? Or should he sneak toward the table to free the mini-citizens?
155231.title: The Lair of Evil! (And Dr. Grant)

choices: Fight. He has Magic on his side.
Run. Risk shrinking but stay out of her grasp (literally)
1552311.content:
He slowly crept behind a table that was overflowing with wires and gadgets. Dr. Grant still had no idea he was there. That was about to change.
“Stop this at once Shrinker!”
She turned around and smiled.
“Ah, Magic Man. You’ve finally arrived.”
“That’s right evildoer, and under my watch, your reign of shrinking ends!”
“Is that so?” She asked.
“Yes!”
She spun around a grabbed a blaster. Pew!
She shot a bolt of light at him. Magic man ducked behind the table.
“Oh Magic Man! Come out! My laser is waiting.”
The Shrinker saw some of his uniform around the corner of the table. She grinned.
“Well “little guy”, I guess I have to find you!”
She concentrated her energy on Magic Man.
Suddenly, his clothes began to feel loose. Magic Man slowly realized what was happening. He was shrinking!!
He quickly jumped up, already noticing his shorter stature, and blasted her with a bolt of lighting. She hopped backward, cursing under her breath.
For now, her spell had stopped.
He quickly ran toward the stairs, but he suddenly felt a familiar tingling sensation.
“Hahahahaha! You can’t escape my little boy toy!”
He blasted her again, breaking her concentration, and making her lose her target. He was safe for a moment.
Magic Man knew that at this rate The Shrinker had gained a size advantage. What should he do?
1552311.title: Square up. It’s go time.

15523111.content:
He had no choice. Magic Man had to fight to stay alive, and out of Dr. Grants reach. He had to make the first move. Holding his hands up, Mark quickly approachedher, hoping to overpower her and end this match before things get dicey. The Shrinker sees you coming and raises her hands to match yours, initiating a test of strength as they clasp together.

To Magic Man’s dismay, it is immediately clear that She has the strength to match her size. It's took a lot of effort for Mark to hold his ground, let alone attempt to push her back. And the smug look still on her face made Mark worry that she might be holding back.

"Mmmm, such a strong, firm grip you have there,
Little guy," she said.

She suddenly rocked her hips back the other way, pounding him with her huge ass like a wrecking ball. She gave a smug look as she watched the helpless super hero topple to the mat, her ass packing much more of a wallop than he ever expected.
15523111.title: Fight. He has Magic on his side.

choices: He wakes up and is attached to machines
He wakes up seconds later, in the ring.
155231111.content:
Despite the obvious size gap between the two, Magic Man felt confident (or desperate) enough to try and lift The Shrinker and slam her onto the floor, hoping to end this. Mark tried to clasp his arms around Dr. Grant, but quickly he realized that he can’t even fully reach around her thick body.

“Hahahaha! You’re so tiny and weak!” She says.
With her mighty arms, she does the same to Magic Man. Except this time, it works. The Shrinker lifts him off the floor like a feather a holds him in front of her face.
“Wait! No!” Mark cried as she slammed him down.
He suddenly grew red. Magic Man charged at her in rage, and wrapped around her legs, pulling them out from under her. The Shrinker was sent sprawling onto her back. Mark laugh triumphantly. Dr. Grants face burned with rage. She slowly stood, rising past Marks height.
“Muhuhhuha. Shrimp. Let’s do this.” She booms.
She continues to laugh. Suddenly, she grabed Magic Mans diminutive body, lifting it over her head.
“Night night punk.” She says.
That was the last thing Magic Man heard before being thrown downward.
155231111.title: Let’s get ready to RUMBLE!!

1552311111.content:
Magic Man slowly came to. He looked around. He was strapped down to a surgical table, with wires and tubes attached to him. He saw Dr. Grant fiddling with a machine.

“Ah, you’re up.” She said.
“What have you done?” Magic Man asked.
“Oh no no no. It’s what I’m doing.” She said.
“What are you doing then? I’m already a midget!”
“True,” she said “but it’s not enough. Even though you are a puny weakling, I need a new pet.”

Magic Man pulled against his restraints but he couldn’t budge.
“How small are you gonna make me?”
She laughed. The Shrinker strolled over to Magic Man, bending over the table so they were face to face.
“Oh. It’s so cute to see you this scared! To answer your question, it depends.”
“Depends on what?” He asked.

The Shrinker sighed.
“You ask a lot of questions. Just wait and see.”
She then walked across the room to a control panel, and began to flip switches.
Magic Man felt a jolt. He began to slowly pass out.

....

He woke up, and realized in horror where he was.
1552311111.title: He wakes up and is attached to machines

choices: She wants to shrink the city down.
155231112.content:
Mark stumbled back as the Shrinker confidently strutted toward him. He backpedaling to keep her in front of him. Magic Man tripped over a cord and fell to the hard rocky ground.

“No please!” Magic Man shouted. He sounded like a cowardly little kid. But he was terrified. The Shrinker was in complete control. She bent down and picked him up by his collar. She was an Amazon to him, and when she held him at face level, his feet dangled off the ground.

She brought him to a human sized bird cage and tossed him in, slamming the door shut. He coughed and slowly got to his feet.

“Magic Man. This has been only a minor inconvenience. Now that you are my little pet, I won’t have any problems with my plan!” She said.

“What plan?” He asked.

“Well I thought you would know by now squirt. It’s very simple really.”

Magic Man was shocked when the short professor revealed her plan. It was so easy, yet so terrifying.
155231112.title: The Shrinker beats Magic Man and reveals a plan

15523112.content:
Magic man quickly thought about his options. He could run, but she will almost definitely get smaller. If he fought, then he could end up in a glass jar forever, trapped as a miniature person. Running was definitely best.
He peered around the corner of the table. The Shrinker was not looking. This was his chance. He got up and began to sprint for the door that would lead him upstairs. As he ran, he suddenly felt a tingling sensation throughout his body.
“Oh no! She’s got me!”
Suddenly, the feeling stopped. He opened his eyes and looked around. Nothing. He was about to feel relieved, when the ground began to shake. He spun around and looked in awe at a massive_____
15523112.title: Run. Risk shrinking....

155231121.content:
Magic Man was in disbelief as he stared at her gigantic feet encased in the most enormous pair tights. Mark began to look up at her legs which rise up like huge tree trunks out from the shoes. He had to crane his neck up to see her face which was beaming down. She lifted up a foot and hovered it above his head. It was is so much bigger than him, that he could tell tell it would completely crush him if she lowered her foot. Mark dropped to his knees in fear.
“Please don’t crush me.” He pleaded “I am begging you.”

The Shrinker laughed at his pleading and lowered her foot down right in front of him.

A frown spread across her face and her huge hand reached down for Mark. He tried to scream as her fingers wrapped tightly around his body. She lifted him up to her giant face. She was squeezing so tightly that Magic Man could barely speak. Mark suddenly felt so tiny and helpless and began to realise that Dr. Grant was an all-powerful giant.

“Well my little guy. I have just the idea.” She grinned.
155231121.title: Shin. (Very small, just above foot)

1552311211.content:
“I need some fun. And you can help.” She said, grinning.

Magic Man squirmed helplessly in her grasp but she held tight.

“Uh uh uh. Can’t have my toys escaping now can we?” She teased.

“Let me go! And make me normal again. I’ll do anything I swear!” Mark cried.

The giant boomed with laughter. She loved being in control after all her years of being small. She thought for a moment.

“Ok Magic Shrimp. Here’s the deal. I’m gonna put you down. If you can hide and avoid me finding you for 10 minutes, I’ll consider bringing you back to human size. But not bigger than me. Got it?”

Mark nodded. It was his only option. It was this game, or a lifetime as her mini pet.

“Ok! I’ll do it! Just please, put me down!”

She laughed heartily once again. She bent down, and got in one knee. Then, she lowered her hand to the cold cement floor, opening it and letting Magic Man tumble out.

“You have 5 minutes to hide. Oh, and just so you don’t hide somewhere too small...”

Mark slowly began to grow. He stopped at about a foot. This was even worse. He was small enough for her to easily be in control, but now he was to big to hide anywhere good, like in a shoe.

“Please don’t do this. We can-“

“I’m already counting! One, two, three, four...” she interrupted.

Magic Man took off, running as fast as his tiny legs would carry him. He looked for anywhere to hide. After a minute, he realized that he had few options.

He could hide behind the control panel in a jungle of wires. This was basically a long black desk covered in buttons and switches. That was good, but it would be very uncomfortable.

The other option was with the supplies. There were boxes of wires, crates, mixtures, chemicals, and machines. That was good, he could get inside a box of equipment. The only downside was, although he would be hidden well, she would likely look there early on.
1552311211.title: The Shrinker’s Cat and mouse game

choices: Magic Man tries to stop her from within
Magic Man tries to escape from her body
1552311212.content:
"I'm gonna make you so small you can't bother me ever again!" she said. Magic Man felt himself shrinking even smaller now, in the palm of Dr Grant's hand. He dwindled away into insignificance, becoming microscopic then and there.

"Now to put you somewhere you'll never escape from! Inside my body!" The Shrinker cackled maniacally. Magic Man could do nothing as she licked him off the palm of hand and drew him into her mouth to be swallowed.

*GULP*

"Ah, now that gets rid of him! Nobody can stop me now, I'll shrink whoever and whatever I want!"
1552311212.title: Microscopic Magic Man!

1553.content:
Astro Cheeks
Astro cheeks is a tall curvy woman. She was formerly in the space program, before dropping out. Her power is that she can absorb anything through touch. Each time she does, she grows even bigger. But, as she moves, and or fights she looses size, so she has to replenish it.

Or

The Squisher
The Squisher is a big woman. She was a wrestler before a villain. After losing a match, she went to see the succubus to make sure she never lost again. She was granted the power to always be bigger than her opponent. So every time she faced someone, she always grew larger than them. She likes to use her big butt to squash people.
1553.title: Other

choices: Astro-Cheeks went towards the largest building in the city
Astro-Cheeks traveled away from the city.
15531.content:
Mark walked through the city, his hands were in his coat pockets. The cold air making him see his own breath, Mark sighed in delight. Winter was always his favorite season and he could enjoy the finesse of the snow on him.

Mark was in a particularly desolate part of the city at the moment, so little to no people were near him. That suited him just fine, he like the occasional absences of others. With the coldness sweeping through the city, not even the bums were outside now.

"La dee la dee, la dee la do!" A voice alerted him from his stupor, he quickly whispered a spell to turn himself invisible. Right now, Mark had only a few real damaging spells to throw at an opponent. He wasn't looking for a fight and he cursed himself for his error of judgement.

A figure brushed past him and Mark could see who it was. A tall, nearly six foot figure, swaggered her way through the snow. Her costume consisting of a skin tight, black bodysuit. Various astrological objects were located on her body, from stars to comets. On her very perky cheeks were the planets of Neptune and Pluto, and above the crack of her butt was Uranus. Mark sighed and said only one word.

"Astro-Cheeks"

The torrent of wind and her own singing disguised the sound he made. He followed behind the oblivious villain as she she sang to the world. It wasn't loud enough to be considered yelling, but it was a noticeable thing.

===


Astro-Cheeks, or Joan Kepler, was one of the rare villains that didn't originally come from the city or knew Mark personally. This thankfully made fights against her a little easier in Mark's conscious, a little. What he could gather from his notes was that she was an Inductee to the Space Program. Some accident,or something, caused her to be booted out. The Succubus came to the girl and gave her the power to "go to the moon" or something like that.

The villainess known as Bully was frankly obnoxious, whenever she saw another villainess, she would use her power not to make do with their score,but just to mess with them. And there was no stopping her, for her power was basically unstoppable.

Only the mental villainess could deal with her and she dealt with that weakness with her prodigious size. True, she didn't have a truly amazing super strength, but she was still six inches over six feet. Bully was also an amateur boxer, so that counted for something. So the rest of the villainess lived in terror of the woman, or so she thought, most of them just hated and disliked her. Except Magic Woman, she kicked Bully's ass like it was a bent tin-can.

"I will facking end you, you Goliath quim." The Irish lady said.

So here was Bully, sitting on a bench for the world to see. But soon enough something caught her eye.
1553323221.title: Bully

A major crush and former classmate of Mark's who dropped out of High School and seemingly vanished without a trace. The Succubus granted her the ability to poison victims with a bite to the neck in various ways; she can knock them out, put them in a place of sexual euphoria, put them into a painful paralysis, e.t.c. 1553323222.title: The Cobra

choices: The Cobra has a run-in with Magic Man
15533232221.content:
"Mam, you need to stay away from the scene of the crime. The villainess could still be around the area, we recommend finding shelter soon." The police officer said.

The scene in question was the warehouse of the Mackillian Brothers, two of the wealthiest financiers of the northern half of the state. It wouldn't be that bad---it was just a warehouse---if not for the fact the place was in the middle of a busy highway and cross section of the city. Many pedestrians stopped to look at the carnage of a wrecked metal door and one particularly inquisitive pedestrian accidentally got a little too close.

"Is it really that dangerous?" The woman's question was filled with fear as she spoke to the officer. She wore a green sundress pattered with cute, little rabbits; a large sunhat blocked most of of her face. All in all, a perfect specimen of innocence if one ever saw one.A primal instinct stuck in the hidden recess of the arbiter came forth, he looked at the woman in one of the "hardest" faces he could muster. "Yes, we don't know which assailant could have done this attack. And we don't want to put the little one in danger, do we?"

The police officer pointed down at the obvious bulge the woman possessed, she nodded fearfully. The woman walked off and her spot was filled with more crowding citizens as she made her way from the crime scene.

"Nobody suspects a thing" The woman whispered to herself, she walked through an alleyway and made her way to a wall that any pedestrian could easily miss. She made one look around, and even put her tongue out of for good measure, to see if anyone was watching her. Satisfied with the knowledge of nobody currently seeing her, she hastily used a fingernail to tap on the wall. In almost an instant, the wall began to open and the woman checked if anyone decided to look into the alleyway at that moment for some reason. She saw no one again and made her way in, the wall slammed shut behind her, only scaring off a few rats and pigeons.

===


"Hooo, I need a hot bath." The woman said, she walked down a corridor and arrived at its end. A large door greeted her and she began to type in a code to get in.The door popped open with a happy ding and the woman walked into a sizeable room.

On one wall was a monitor, sparse and not one of the newer models of communication, but it sufficed. A briefcase was on a shelf that occupied the space right of the woman. A comfy chair was the only furniture that was in the room at the moment.

The woman began to strip down from her dress, she appeared to be only using that for any decency. No undergarments were on her person, but her belly still bulged. The woman then began to breathe in and out, very slowly. This was followed by the woman beginning to cough, her jaw unhinged, and with a final cough, a large sphere plopped right in her hands. Instantly, her belly shrunk down to the tone abs of a gymnast. The woman patted her own stomach,as though she was a animal that did its job well. And seeing that the woman known as Cobra had animal-like behavior, her lizard brain could've been rewarding itself of its own hardship.

The Cobra, still nude, walked towards the monitor, she still held onto the sphere. She went up to the monitor and held the sphere towards a little nodule. She walked out of view, so not to give her nude form away. She typed a few commands into the keyboard and clicked the "OK" for a picture. The nodule possessed a little window that shrank and grew and finished with a flash. The Cobra waited, a ding indicated she had a message. She held the sphere under her arm and typed in the chat.

} COBRA, REPORTING IN.

}YOU'RE LATE BY [15] MINUTES, WHAT HAPPENED?

}GOT DELAYED, SEEMED THAT THE BLUEPRINTS I GOT WERE OUT OF DATE BY A MONTH OR TWO.

The Cobra waited as whoever was on the other line was no doubt looking to punish the person handling the blueprints for this mission. Their "cred" was on the line and giving false data to an contractor was considered grounds for mercenaries not to take those jobs.

}UNDERSTOOD, THE FIRST EXTRACTION WILL BE DELAYED FOR ANOTHER [30] MINUTES. YOU'LL HOPEFULLY HAVE ENOUGH TIME TO GET THERE, IF NOT, PLAN B WILL BE READY IN CASE ANY COMPLICATIONS HAPPEN. GOOD LUCK,

The Cobra nodded at that and began to walk towards the briefcase, she put one hand over the top of it and the the thing opened up. Inside was her famous Cobra suit and the titular mercenary began to ease her way back into her "skin."
15533232221.title: The Cobra

15533232222.content:
Cowgirl: A strong girl from the great, wide west. She is a disgraced rancher that the Succubus decided to give powers to use for her own will. Egged on by the Succubus to travel to Magic Man's city;she was instantly entwined in the spell that makes him an object of desire. She now works as a mercenary for the various villains of the city. And like the rest of them, wants Magic Man for her own pleasure.

Powers:Over a period of a week, Cowgirl's breasts slowly start to grow. It begins at her normal B-cup gradually heading towards absurd sizes, with one of her boobs being the size of two yoga balls combined at her limit. This isn't how her power benefits her , the size of her boobs correlate with her strength and durability. Her smaller sizes being equivalent to an athlete, while her largest giving her the ability to shrug off tank rounds with ease. She can lift small buildings off their foundations at this size as well.

Two main weaknesses affect her; the first is the maneuverability of her own body at larger sizes. She maybe able to carry her weight, but the size of it will obviously impede progress anywhere. Her field of view will be filled with her own body. Her second weakness is a secret that only she knows. Her breasts can't be drained by her own hands, another person must do the deed. Cowgirl keeps her contacts that she trusts to do that close to her heart.

Appearance: An almost stereotypical cowgirl costume. Daisy dukes on her hips; short vest revealing cleavage and stomach; handkerchief on her neck; all of that phooey. Her stetson hat is indestructible and always comes back to her. Two noticeable horns jut out from her hat's side, thankfully not large enough to gore a man. A miniature, metal cow skull is on the hats front. These are the only part of her assembled clothing that is doesn't get destroyed by her own body.

Besides that, her hair is like a cow's pattern, blotches of black and white going up and down the tidal wave of hair. Which contrasts highly with her youthful, freckled face.
15533232222.title: Cowgirl

Cut to Cowgirl and her partners at her current hideout.
155332322221.content:
Magic Man floated through the city, watching for any major events the police couldn't deal with. Either he pointed those out and called the police,or he came to interrupt them if the police were too far away. He sat as he waited for the next event to occur, using a spy-glass to watch over the cityscape. Suddenly, he spotted a peculiar sight, a woman seemed to be greatly distressed about something. He looked around her area closer, and gasped in shock at what he saw. Around her area were wrecked cars, some of which were even on fire.

Magic Man did one thing,and one thing only: he flew to her rescue.

He made landfall and spoke a few words, a raincloud appeared over the place he was at. The water poured down by the gallon, washing the burning wreckage. When it settled, Magic Man scanned the area, it now resembled a scrapyard of cars. He turned back towards the woman, who stared at him in awe of his might. He could see she wore a hoodie and a beanie on top of her head;besides that, she had a pretty face and raven hair flowed from some of the hoodie's gaps.

"What happened here citizen." He questioned.

"There was a horrible accident here!" The woman cried, it was pretty obvious what she was referring to.Magic Man could hear a southern drawl in her voice.

His eyes popped almost out of his head when he heard of an accident though, he did a double take around the area. There wasn't any bodies in the wrecks, thank god, so then who was this woman? She didn't appear to be scrapped or bruised, so where did she come from? Magic Man turned back to the woman and began to ask her a question.

"So how exactly did this accident occur---and when?" Magic Man said.

"Well a foppish, ma-gee-sea-and,came and got caught in a electrified net. And when it occurred,I say about---now." The woman smiled at Magic Man when she finished her sentence.

"Wha-" Magic Man could barley finish his sentence before he heard a creaking noise behind him. He turned around and was quickly greeted by a steel net hurtling towards his face, Magic Man quickly put up a shield to block the incoming projectile.The net limply fell to the ground as Magic Man breathed out in relief.

"Almost gat ya there,partner." The woman's voice called from behind Magic Man. He turned around to see the hoodie woman revealed in all her glory. Her hair was done in the style of a cow, a stenson hat covered her head, and she was decked like an old-fashioned cowgirl. Although, she did have room for cleavage she didn't possess, odd.

"Name's, Cowgirl, howdy." She said with a willy grin.

"Hello there, Cowgirl Howdy." Magic Man responded back, he summoned a mystical sword and shield to prepare himself. Cowgirl grinned in response to his jab." Well, my glamorous guardian, I've been seeing you in da funny papers lately. I made a decision that involves your butt and me getting dough from any of your girlfriends."

"Fat chance, Howdy, it'll take a lot more than one net to get me."

"Great, because I have several."

For a second time today, Magic Man could only respond with a "Wha-"

Behind, and around him, the wreckage of the cars revealed themselves to be various net launchers. Magic Man called upon as many shields as possible to block off the nets being launched at him.

Cowgirl watched as Magic Man blocked the multitude of nets coming his way. She noted his response time, his reaction time, and his casting time. All these factors she considered in her head as she watched the battle unfold.

"Nice to see this one fair better than some of the other "supers" I bagged." Cowgirl noted in satisfaction, maybe this one could be a challenge? She watched as Magic Man threw the last of the nets away from him and glared at the nonchalant form of Cowgirl.

"Very mooooving" Cowgirl's eyes grew to saucer-like proportions when she said that, Magic Man stared at her funnily. Cowgirl quickly huffed and took out a remote, she pressed a button on it that released a beeping noise. Magic Man had only a few seconds to react as his vision was filled with smoke. He summoned a gale of wind to blow it away and saw the retreating form of Cowgirl.

Magic Man sped after her and while he did a thought came over him. "Did her chest get bigger when she said 'moooving'?"
155332322221.title: Cowgirl

1553323222212.content:
"Tarnation." Cowgirl muttered once she was back in the relative safety of her lair. "That sheriff sure is persistent. Almost thought I wouldn't lose him for a bit there."

"Welcome back, boss." one of several woman in a flannel shirt and a pair of overalls greeted her. "Get anything useful?"

"Yeah. This city slicker is pretty good. But we're better." Cowgirl said confidently as strolled over to a computer and began typing in every thing she learned in her encounter with the local hero. "We wasn't that bad lookin', though. Hehe, wouldn't mind a chance to milk him myself before we sell him off. Speakin' of, what about the other dames? We gonna have ta worry about them tryin' ta rustle this guy away from us?"

"Naw, boss." another minion spoke up. "Seems like they got an agreement going on. Each new dame gets a bit of a grace period when they first show up. We got some time before they try to poach him from us." she then pulled up files for Mouse and Checkmate. "These are his sidekicks. Checkmate is the silent type and a power copier. So a complete non-issue for you."

Cowgirl nodded in agreement as she read the mute hero's file. Since she mostly relied on tech, and the power that she did have took days to ramp up. So, this Checkmate chick might as well be another civilian to her and her crew. "What about the rodent?"

"More of a problem." was the immediate answer. "You'd have better luck keeping a rat out of an old barn."

The leader of the mercenaries let out a frustrated sigh. "Nothin' for it then. Once we hog-tie the hero, ever'one goes on high alert until we send him off." she ordered and all of her underlings nodded in understanding. "As for actually baggin' our mark..."

"Here's the plan, girls...."

Magic Man flew through the air, like he always does. His mind on what happened yesterday still fresh in his vision. He mind wandered over to who that woman was. Soon though his thoughts were interrupted by a peculiar sight.

Magic Man like to weave through buildings on patrols,and he was currently flying on his usual path,but today was different. Between two skyscrapers was a net;not invisible,but one couldn't see it if they were hundreds of feet below. But from Magic Man's position, the light glared obviously from it.

"Ummm." Magic Man could only state dumbly. He scratched his chin. "Is...is this meant for me?"

He flew closer to it and stared at the "trap", if he could even call it that.

"Unless I'm a bird, this is pretty easy to see. The net glares way toomuch for nobody,notto notice it." Magic Man began to explain out loud. "I mean, at least its not a giant, black rope between the skyscrapers. But come on!"

Muttering out a spell, Magic Man formed an energy sword to cut the net. The moment he done so, a second trap was sprung.

On both roofs of the skyscrapers, a total of six armed ladies appeared,hidden by the building lips. Armed with weapons of weird design, Magic Man's eyes opened in shock. Forming a shield around himself, the hero thought himself safe, he was wrong.

A weird foam formed around the outline of his shield and Magic Man could feel it constrict. His entire vision had gone blank.Thankfully still up in the air, Magic Man began to formulate an escape plan.
15533232222121.title: "We're gonna lead him into anotha' trap"
