155332322221211.content:
Magic Man could feel the weight of the foam begin to weigh down on his shield, while many thought of his shields as homogeneous, Magic Man's shields were instead specially crafted constructs. Each had their own chants and purposes. The one he usually placed around himself was meant for his own protection,it couldn't handle the foams heaviness.

Magic Man was about to teleport out of the foam ball,but two thoughts occurred. If it was this heavy,than if he let it drop, it would probably injury many civilians below him. Besides that, the women would probably shoot him the minute he got out. And then he would also have to deal with the incoming foam ball of death, which brought him back to problem one.

So instead of escaping, Magic Man allowed the foam to harden around the ball shield's surface. With great care,he allowed himself to drop down. While not being able to see, he flew by the buildings so many times, Magic Man steered the descending ball to the roof of a smaller building. He gently laid the foam ball down and dispelled his shield. The interior of the sphere was extremely hot though and Magic Man began to pant.

"I wish I packed an cooling spell." He huffed. Some intricate and essential part of the sphere allowed Magic Man the ability to breath, but not enough for cool air to blow inwards. Magic Man gulped and waited, instantly he heard a harpoon smack against the ball's surface.

"Guess this is the welcome wagon." Magic Man joked. His plan of teleporting out and flying off was still on the menu since the sphere was now on more stable land, yet he still didn't want to bank on the fact whether or not the group were fast enough to foam him up.

Mumbles issued forth from outside the foam sphere and Magic Man lightly enhanced his hearing to listen in on the group who had captured him.
155332322221211.title: Magic Man is captured

Streak: One of Magic Man's least dangerous opponents, but nonetheless a nuisance like the rest of his "foolish rouges." Streak was an exhibitionist who was punished disappropriate to her crime;her crime; public nudity. The Succubus came down to the girl and granted her the power to get away from her tormentors. Now she roams the streets and humiliates the people she see as "too stiff for their own position." Be it man or woman, old or young (not too young, she isn't a sicko you know), she'll take their clothes right off their backs!

Powers: The less clothes Streak wears, the faster she'll become. Her clothed form can be comparable to an Olympic runner, while her nude form is faster than the speed of sound. Her only weakness is her own strength, nudity limits her interaction with the environment. Cold days freeze her to the core and hot summers are a drag for her.

Appearance: From those who glimpse her, they describe her as a light-brown skinned woman, with a Middle-Easterner accent. A full face mask covers her head, a lighting bolt covers the area where her eyes would be. Shoes that come from various manufacturers are always on her feet, from Nike to Vans.
155332322222.title: Streak

1553323222222.content:
Lipsticker: A disgraced saleswoman that was given a chance to become something more by the Succubus and like some of his other rogues, a friend of Mark. Lipsticker enjoys long walks in the park, cooing at animals,putting graffiti on buildings, and stealing large sums of cash from various sources. She usually likes to target the various institutions that make up the city, from private military companies to regional HQ's of some franchise giant. She sometimes has to deal with Ziggy; Snap, Crackle, and Pop; Shrinker; and Thunder Thighs, She does however come out with all her limbs intact.

Powers: She can expand her lips towards large proportions,it can reach the size of her own head! That isn't the only thing she can do however, her various lipstick colors possess unique powers for different situations.She is considered a "poorer Magic Woman", which is a complete disregard for her own merits.A list of them are as follow:
Red: Heat waves that can melt through most metals
Green: Acid
Blue: Forcefields
Purple: Energy blasts
White: Acts as a "base" that she uses to paint characters and objects that she can bring to life.
Black: Opens a portal to the other side of a area. Example: Sticks it on the side of a building, opens up to the interior of the place. Doesn't work on biological objects however.
Orange: Clones of herself.
Yellow:A temporary fear blast that causes opponents to run from her.
Magenta: A temporary influence wave that causes affected to believe anything she says for a arbitrary amount of time.
Cyan:This causes a wave that distorts areas in front of her.

Her main weakness is that she needs to apply the lipstick she wants to use. This gives time for an opponent to reach her in time.

Appearance: A woman in a full-body suit, a lip symbol is located on her chest. The areas where her boots meet her knees and her gloves meet her elbows are heavily armored. Her costumes are synchronized with her lipstick, changing to complement her lipstick color at her time. A opening on her mask is heart-shaped, revealing her puckish mouth to the world. Her short hair can be seen from an opening at the back of her mask.
1553323222222.title: Lipsticker

15533232222221.content:
Lipsticker overlooked the city from her skyscraper near the beach, a Karellia cigarette tucked in between her thick, puckish, upturned lips, a look of confidence in her dark, black eyes. In 5 weeks, she'd loudly amassed a criminal empire strong enough to rival the strongest villains in the city, her sale of her effective lipstick chemical weapons to politicians and law enforcement agencies keeping them from cracking down on her schemes. She inhaled a deep puff of smoke before inhaling a trio of smoke rings wider than her head.

"Ma'am?" a masculine voice questioned from behind her. "Our guest is arriving earlier than expected."

Her bodyguards stationed at the door tensed up. They weren't expecting her visitor to arrive so early.

A sinister smirk appeared on the villain's mouth. She was fully prepared for this, hence her green costume. "They didn't want to miss the party, Michael. I don't blame them."

She relit her cigarette for another puff before turning her attention to her guards. She could sense their fear. It amused her. The guards were kept more her image than for any kind of personal need. Their purpose was more for decoration and a display of wealth and power than any actual security.

"You have permission to go home." she sighed. "Michael, please tell the other guards to take the night off as well."

Her assistant gave a look of visible confusion. Lipsticker must have had at least 80 guards in her employment, and from what he knew of her guest, she'd need every one of them. "But, ma'am..."

Lipsticker gave a hardened stare to Michael, slowly walking up to him with an aura of pure power and presence. She slowly pulled out her green lipstick from her utility belt, the belt making a brief clicking noise upon the removal of the device, as she carefully spun the bottom. She carefully ran the neon tip along the side of Michael's black tie, the cloth quickly dissolving with a sizzle upon its touch. Michael gave a shudder of fear and discomfort.

"My guest tonight is an equal." she explained coldly. "Something exceedingly rare in this city of pussies and weaklings. I wouldn't expect you to understand."

Michael nodded his head nervously, giving a deep gulp of unease. "Yes, ma'am."

With that, the weaselly assistant quickly ran off to speak to his employers guards, Lipsticker's uncomfortable guards following close behind him. Lipsticker turned her attention back to her majestic view of the city, her arms clasped behind her back, as she awaited her formidable guest.

Just who did that guest happen to be?
15533232222221.title: Lipsticker

155332322222211.content:
The Lipsticker sat down behind a large oak desk. It was covered with maps of the city and different charts about how she could take over.

Suddenly, her doors flew open. Two muscular men dragged a half unconscious Magic Man in through the door. They stopped in front of the desk, but continued to hold him. Magic Man coughed and choked from the beating they had given him.

“Oh hello Magic Man. It’s a pleasure to have you here tonight. I’m so glad we get to talk face to face.”

Magic Man weakly lifted his head. “Oh. You again. You look great Diane.”

The lipsticker frowned. “Don’t you call me that pathetic name. I am so much more than that now. I am the all powerful LIPSTICKER!”

Magic Man coughed again, spitting up a bit of blood. He looked up at her. She smiled down on him, enjoying his suffering. Magic Man licked the blood from his lip.

“What is it this time?” He managed. She giggled, still not over the fact that a powerful hero has been brought to his knees.

“I am so glad you ask. It’s simple, really.” She said, beginning to ramble about her past. Magic Man was planning his escape and paid no attention.

“-at. Do you understand?” She said, jolting him back to reality.

“No.” He said. He quickly elbowed each of his guards. They grunted but quickly began to grab him again. He cast a spell that made a pole appear in us hand. He used it and smacked one in the knees.

He used a spell to tie up the other. He spun around, only to see that his nemesis had applied a large dose of purple lipstick.

“Well, looks like I have the power now!” She said, blasting him in the chest. Magic Man tumbled backward and collapsed onto the floor with a groan.

“Let me get right to it Magic Man. I have a plan. And, I can’t have you getting in the way. So, what I’m going to do is simple.”

Magic Man widened his eyes as she told him the plan. She was about to _____.
155332322222211.title: Magic Man

1553323222222111.content:
Magic Man shot a fireball but Lipsticker rolled out of the way. She raised her palm, sending a purple beam into Magic Man. Mark collapsed, coughing and gagging. At that moment, more henchmen burst into the office, and they quickly hoisted Magic Man up, binging him to a chair. He now looked face to face with a powerful villain, and he was helpless.

She grinned and pulled out a lipstick tube. What was this? Her dastardly fear blast? Her drawing lipstick? Her energy fields? Magic Man squirmed against the bulky guards who held him in his seat. She pulled the cap off and..... Magic Man was confused. It was a rick bright pink. He had never seen this before.

“Admiring my newest creation?” Asked Lipsticker. Magic Man tried to cry out but the guard put a hand over his mouth. The evil yet fashionable villain smiled and put her lips outward, dragging the lipstick along her currently purple lips.

When she finished, she strained and grunted, tending her muscles and gritting her teeth. This was another weakness. When she applied her lipstick she had to absorb all its power. Once she finally gained her composure she began to walk around the desk toward Mark.

“You see Magic Man, I have a plan. Most clowns in this city, villains as you call them, have no idea where to go. They just blindly use their idiotic powers for personal pleasure and leisure. Not me. And not my colleague. She designed this new lipstick. I believe you know her. Dr. Grant? Come in please.”

Marks eyes widened as a familiar woman came into the room. She walked over to Lipsticker and shook her hand. She then turned to the helpless prisoner.

“Hello Mark. How’s that Rat friend of yours?” She asked with a laugh.

“You see, The Shrinker and I realized our potential.” Said Lipsticker. “We can help each other. Imagine it Magic Man, fighting the Shrinker with my Lipstick, and fighting me while being a tiny little man. Well, it’s happening. This pink lipstick will allow me to change the size of any object, living or non-living. Including myself.”

Magic Man nearly fainted. Wait her one of these villains had incredible power. Now they both had TWO powers??!?!?! It was too much for Magic Man to handle. He couldn’t think of anything to say. He just sat there, mouth covered, but still wide open.

Now we shall unveil our master scheme.” Said Dr. Grant.

What are these baddies up to?
1553323222222111.title: Unveil a new lipstick: PINK!

Follow Magic Man as he recuperates and makes a plan.
15533232222221111.content:
"Shrink the City!" The Shrinker cackled manically and Magic Man rolled his eyes.

This was what Grant was obsessed with all the time: trying to shrink the city. Granted, it she did use a variety of method, but this was what she did with her time. Making her own personal dollhouse to spite all the people who made fun of her. But, what Lipsticker had to do with this plan, and what she got out of it, was a mystery to Magic Man.

"What if I just ask her, would she be willing to tell? What does she get out of this? She usually targets companies, she isn't a 'take over the city' type of villainess" Magic Man jokingly thought as he muttered a spell under his breath, before realizing he was completely unopitmized for this fight." I was in the middle of a fight with Streak, why did they have to do this right now? Although, if they did plan this, I'm impressed."

Magic Man watched as the two vilainess circle him, each of them had their piercing eyes on his movements. Magic Man watched as The Shrinker pulled out one of Lipsticker's lipsticks and started to apply it on her face. Lipsticker, in turn, started to swell her lips to a larger size. Magic Man watched, entrapped, as her cute lips plumped up like they were filling with silicon.

The two face lines finished their transformation upon reaching a size that reached the bottom half of her nose. She smiled with her large lips and puckered them up greatly. She "blew" a kiss towards his generally direction and a wave of pink lipstick flew from them.Magic Man only had a few minutes to doge,and in a few moments, a couple of potted plants behind him shrunk down to minuscule size.

Magic Man kept his eyes on her, before he realized that in his confusion to escape, Shrinker had gone missing."Damn, where did you go, Grant?"

Magic Man looked around and tried to find the small villainess, while also keeping his wits about Lipsticker. The sound of creaking rubble caused him to turn around, quickly dodging Grant, who almost tackled him. Magic Man briefly saw her lips ready to give him a big ole' smooch, he shuddered a little.

"She is pretty, but she was also my mentor and ten years my age, it would be kinda weird." Magic Man thought internally.

"Come now, Magic Man, don't be like that. Just let us give you a couple of kisses." Lipsticker spoke sedutivley, her enlarged lips seemingly did nothing to impede her speech. Shrinker had appeared on the right side of the villainess and lazily smiled at Magic Man, waiting to make his move.

"Yeah, how about you two kiss my rear?" Magic Man said, beyond the two he saw a window and thought up a pretty dumb plan.Steadying himself, Magic Man readied to act it out. "Here we go."

Rushing forward, which surprised the two, Magic Man quickly muttered two spells. "Invincibility; Running"

He crashed out of the skyscraper and hoped that what happened next wouldn't hurt too bad. He hit the concrete sixty floors down and the wind in him was knocked out. He groaned a little before getting up and shooting off like a dart into the dark city.

"Dammit, he got away and we were just starting to have fun as well." Shrinker spoke and crossed her arms in anger.

"Don't worry dear, you know how wild this city is, he'll be too occupied dealing with the buffoons that are the other villainess." Lipsticker replied, before she placed a Karellia cigarette into her still enlarged lips. She looked down to see her tobacco stick almost crushed between her lips before shrinking them back down to a manageable size.

"Apologies." She said to Shrinker, she lit her cigarette up. A crash came through her penthouse door and eight guards armed with rifles came rushing in. Michael, her lead bodyguard, came rushing in at the forefront. He swept his view around the room, noticing the shrunken plants and the notorious Shrinker, then placed his gaze on his employer.

"Ma'am, are you alright?" He questioned. Lipsticker smiled and waved her hand in a lazy fashion. "I am, Michael, no need to worry. If the other gentlemen would please stand outside, that would be fine by me."

Her bodyguards filtered outside, leaving only Shrinker, Michael, and Lipsticker alone in the room.

"Now to deal with our rivals." Lipsticker thought as she went towards her desk, sitting down and relaxing for a few moments."I wished those wild, sex crazed Magic Man, fanatics could deal with each other. Buffoons I said, and buffoons they are, only wished they could deal with each other...."

Lipsticker felt a light-bulb flash in her brain before she spoke again."Michael, be a dear and put out a notice to every little market in this city. I'm putting six million on Magic Man's head and whom ever gets him out of the picture will be greatly rewarded."

"This way they'll deal with Magic Man, and be out of my hair. And for the more 'controlled' ones, well, Shrinker and I will have to deal with them ourselves."
15533232222221111.title: Shrink the City

155332322222211112.content:
Magic Man limped along the street, grimacing. He may have powers, but jumping out the window of a 50 story office building was not easy. Mark knew he had to get back to his dorm room. He pulled himself into an alleyway to rest.

He dragged himself out of the darkness and into his college campus. He hurriedly moved across the green, trying not to wake the students at the late hour of night. When he reached his building, he pressed himself against the wall and took a deep breath.

After a moment, he summoned the last of his strength to fly up and into his room via an open window. He collapsed onto his bed, thoroughly exhausted. He closed his eyes and tried to rest, knowing a battle was coming.

.... two days later......

He woke up that morning with the sun. He rubbed his eyes and sat up. His phone rang suddenly. He picked it up and said a greeting.

“Hello?” He asked.

“Mark? It’s me, Dave. Listen have you seen the news?”

Mark stood up. “No. What’s going on? Are you all right?”

“I’m fine, it’s the villains. You better turn on your TV.”

Mark rushed to his TV and pushed the on button, changing it from TBS to CNN. He nearly dropped the phone. In front of him was the image of 10 villains chained up and being led to a prison that even Mark couldn’t get out of.

“I’ll have to call you later Dave. Thanks.” He said, hanging up. He couldn’t believe it. How could all his enemies be apprehended so easily? Then it dawned on him. The Shrinker and Lipsticker we’re behind this.

Magic Man began to form a plan. But first, if he was to win, he’d need backup. He picked up god phone once again and dialed the number of a certain girl.

“Amelia? Get over here right now. Code red. And bring Checkmate. We’re gonna need her.” He said, not leaving time for a response.

.....

They rushed over as fast as possible. Mark let them in, and quickly turned away as they changed into their super suits. Mark did the same, becoming Magic Man once again.

“So, now that we’re here, let me brief you. As you may know, 10 of the top villains were caught and incarcerated. This sounds good, but I’m here to tell you that it’s not. The Shrinker and Lipsticker teamed up to form a size changing lipstick, and a partnership. They used their combined powers to force the villains into capture.”

“Are you sure? If what you say is true, we have no chance. They will be too strong! What do we do?” Asked Mouse.

“Calm down. We don’t know what they want, so let’s not freak out. I say we come up with a plan. I have an idea, but it’s risky. We should attack them, Checkmate and I. They are hiding in Dr. Grant’s lair. While we distract them, I need you to infiltrate and steal the lipstick, or maybe use a device to enhance your powers so you grow.”

Mouse thought about this. Checkmate made the signal “I don’t know”. Should they continue with this plan?
155332322222211112.title: Magic Man plans  his next move against Lipsticker

choices: Magic Man and his sidekicks arrive in time.
She pulls the lever, shrinking the city.
1553323222222111122.content:
“I don’t know what if it will work. It seems forced, not well thought out. Let’s figure out a more solid plan.” Said Mouse. Mark nodded, as did Checkmate.

The three hero’s thought for a while, no one wanting to say their plan. After a few moments, Magic Man nearly jumped out of his seat. He had struck inspiration!

“The Shrinker is a lone wolf. The lipsticker is as close to a mobster as we have. They may be working together, but if we could....break them up. Then we could defeat them individually. Right?” Asked Magic Man.

“Ya. But tell me Mark, how are we going to break them apart? They seem like they have a good relationship.” Said Mouse.

“You May think that now, Amelia. But trust me, deep down these villains are nothing but selfish. All they want is either me, or this city. Sometimes both. We can figure out how to break them up.” Mark finished.

“What do you suggest?” Asked Amelia. Checkmate also looked at him, not fully believing in his plan. Mark smiled and revealed his plan.

.....

“Are you sure this machine will work?” Asked The Lipsticker. She was standing on her balcony, watching the Shrinker work feverishly on a computer. It was attached to a large circular device.

“I’m sure. Listen, you may be new to this, but I am a professional. Believe it or not.” She replied, not looking up from her work. The Lipsticker casually approached.

“And may I ask something? Why do we need this contraption if we both have powers? You have the lipstick and your regular ability. If we combine, can’t we do it?” Asked the Lipsticker.

The Shrinker let out a deep sigh. She knew that her partner didn’t understand the science behind their scheme. She turned and smiled at her partner.

“Well, It’s simple really. Think about this: every time I shrink something, there is a required amount of power, called a miniaturization pulse. That Magic Boy takes about a 3.5 magnitude pulse to shrink down. Together, we have the powers of about a 10.75 magnitude pulse. This city would take about a 5 million magnitude pulse. Hence the machine.” She finished.

“I get it. We need more power for a target this big. So are we using the machine for shrinkage or using it to boost our power?” Asked The Lipsticker.

“We will simply use it to shrink the city. There is no way we could shrink everything. Our powers are not nearly strong enough. And even if they were boosted it would drain our power for good.” The Doctor explained. The Lipsticker nodded.

“Now, to test our machine. I have every confidence it will work. And when it does, we shall be Queens!” She said. Both let out a long evil laugh for good measure. The Doctor realized her dream would finally come true as she clasped her hand on the lever. It was time.

The escapades of Magic Man and Thunder Thighs continued as he was chased like an, excuse me, mouse by a cat.Numerous times did Magic Man seemed to be pinned down by Thunder Thighs.

The size-changer, who moments before left, had come back. Whatever Squisher found, she came back with it hiding it at an angle. She revealed whatever Megabutt asked for by exchanging it between hands; a weird contraption that looked to be a mixture of a handgun and a harpoon-rifle. Megabutt gleamed and pointed the weapon at Thunder Thighs.

"Yahoo, Thicc Mistress." Megabutt teased, Thunder Thighs turned around and gasped in surprise as a suction-cup device attached to her chest. Magic Man and the hidden heroines watched as a stream of electrical power traveled down the length of tubing right into Thunder Thighs! The saw as pound upon pound piled onto the woman's behind. Her face was scrunched up, although, Mouse could see the outline of a smile. It could've been the trick of the light, however.

They all saw her butt slowly consume the silk panties she wore,and when that was over, pushed against the bordello skirt she wore for the occasion. Thunder Thighs hands appeared to be confused;not knowing if they should touch the length of the weird gun-taser or the large globes on the horizon.

Finally, with a snap, her pants fall towards the floor. Magic Man clearly was doing his best not to hide a special friend from the others. Thunder Thigh's white cheeks came onto the scene, and yet, more power went into them. Now the electrical villain was getting unbalanced, not possessing the super strength shared by the others. With an almost comical edge, she waves her hands in the air and falls over. A very subtle shockwave escapes from the area where she lands.

Megabutt's weapon putters out and the tubing delivering electricity seemed to dim down. Thunder Thighs was like a turned over turtle, doing her best to get back on her front. Megabutt giggled at the view and tapped the shoulder of Squisher, who was guffawing at the scene.

"Squisher, be a darling, and kindly put Magic Man under Thunder." Megabutt said in her best impression of Thunder Thighs.

"Sure thing, boss." Squisher said, she grew to a larger height. Not to out-shadow Astro-Cheeks at the moment, but to lift up the struggling Thunder Thighs. Multiple times in this endeavor, Squisher could be heard uttering "Damn, sparkplug" or "Stop that", eventually she manages to life up Thunder Thighs. Magic Man in all of this was being watched like a hawk by Astro-Cheeks, who wasn't about to let him go away before she would have some fun.

"Alright, Magic, GET UNDER THE THUNDER!" Squisher announced like a wrestler referee. She snatched him up and laid him flat on his back, dropping Thunder Thighs ontop of him. She seemed to squirmed in pleasure, if her feet kicking were any indication.

A second time tonight---or was it day---Mouse's jaw hung open for someone to see.
1553323222222211112221.title: Twin Tushy Terrors!

choices: They get small and copy powers to fight
They open the door and free the hero’s!
15533232222222111122212.content:
Mouse pulled Checkmate back from their spot. “We have to do something. We can’t let them continue. If we don’t save Mark soon, he could end up....” she trailed of. Checkmate understood and signaled “no Worry”. Mouse smiled.

They suddenly heard a scream. They both dashed to their viewing place. They looked down and saw Magic Man being absolutely manhandled. Every one of the villains was far taller and larger than he was at this point. He was tossed across the floor, landing hard and sliding a good 10 feet after his rough landing.

Checkmate covered her eyes and Mouse held back tears. Now they were more determined than ever to save him. They needed to pull of a daring rescue. After all, it was 4 against 2. Mouse thought hard about their next move.

She tried to remember how they had dealt with these baddies before. Last time they had to fight, Magic Man had gotten help from villains. That wasn’t an option this time. Once he had enchantress put TT into a dream to defeat her, but then Enchantress wouldn’t let them out. So a villains help was off the table.

Checkmate continued to stare in horror as Mark was lifted up and crushed beneath two villains at once. He looked terrible, and would give in at any moment. They had to act. Mouse finally struck inspiration.

“Ok. Here’s what I’ve got.” She said to Checkmate. “We shrink down so we are undetected. Once we get close enough to them, particularly thr Squisher, you jump on and get their powers. Once you have all four, you grow. That way you can deal with big ones, and I can stay small and free Magic Man. We can handle the smaller two. Sound good to you?”

Checkmate thought for a moment. She looked down once more st the terrible scene unfolding below. She shook her head yes, but then quickly signaled “other idea?” Mouse frowned. She did, but it was different.

“I had another thought. This one is more risky. We could go over there.” She pointed to a nearby door. It was solid steel and looked as if even Kaboom wouldn’t be able to break it. It had a passcode as well as a camera and alarm.

“That door leads into a lab. All the inventions they’ve created and all the prisoners they’ve taken are in there. That’s where they’re keeping Apex Prisoner, and all the hero’s we once had in this city. If, and it’s a big if, we do make it in, and we can free the hero’s on there, and take some weapons or powers, we would have an advantage in the fight.” She said

Checkmate thought for a second. This was a good plan, however, if she didn’t copy one of the Four’s powers, then the hero’s would have no big gun to fight against their towering might. They had beaten these hero’s before, and they could do it again. But, they would have numbers.

Mouse looked at her partner. She pleaded with her eyes. “Well?” Checkmate moves her hands and signaled. It was time to save the day.
15533232222222111122212.title: Mouse and Checkmate try to save Magic Man

choices: Mouse frees Magic Man before Checkmate's arrives in disguise.
Checkmate fools the four( or three in this case.)
155332322222221111222121.content:
Checkmate held up one finger, probably meaning she wanted the first option of the bunch.

Mouse held out her hand,which Checkmate gently took into her own. Slowly the two shrank down, hand and hand, until they reached the limit of Mouse's size changing capabilities. Pocket-sized, the two crept down into the arena that the Fanny Four had somehow acquired. Dodging many obstacles, the two had finally made into the area, where the saw the corpulent giants crushing Magic Man at the moment.

Staring, Mouse and Checkmate craned their heads to see the gargantuan beings that were the Fanny Four. Realizing that they were out in the open, the two fled towards a pillar to hide themselves. Peaking out, they saw how Magic Man was only a speck compared to the four, though, Mouse did realize something.

"Wait, does Thunder Thighs have size changing powers?" Mouse spoke in Checkmate's ear, who turned to her side to give the hero a look. Only three members of the Fanny Four had any size changing talents, but only Thunder Thighs grew in the rear and not in anything else. That being stated, her trunk was far larger than any of the three, It mushed Magic Man the most,but the villainess seemed to be quite apprehensive about her size.

Looking at their targets, Mouse and Checkmate silently agreed that touching one of the giants at the moment was tantamount to suicide. So, their best option was to at least lure one of the numbers away to copy.

If their is a Lord, he seemed to be looking down at them this night(or day, who knows how long it been.) Thunder Thighs seemed to want to end her turn. Tapping the thigh of Astro-Cheeks, The two quickly conversed---Astro-Cheeks having to bend down towards Thunder Thighs, mind you--- while Squisher and Megabutt toyed with Magic Man unaware.

Placing her hands under the gorgeous cheeks of the electric magistrate, Astro-Cheeks stomped off with Thunder Thighs ass ontop of both of her palms.

Watching them leave, Mouse turned her head to Checkmate. "Follow them"

Checkmate nodded and quickly set off after the two. Upon exiting the Colosseum, Checkmate made sure no one else was watching and grew back to her normal size. Astro-Cheeks to oblivious to look down and Thunder Thighs only occupied with looking forward.

Even though the underground area could fit four giants in itself, it still wasn't that large. Astro-Cheeks only having to stride a few feet--giant feet that is---to he destination: a circular structure without a roof. Placing Thunder Thighs down into the place, Astro-Cheeks went back towards the arena.

Checkmate quickly shrunk down before the villainess could see her, being thrown up into the miniature air by the passing villainess' weight. Growing back to full size, Checkmate silently slunk into the room where Thunder Thighs was occupied.

Opening the door, Checkmate was greeted by a wall of supple white flesh. If she could gasp in embarrassment, she would, but she couldn't. Hearing the villainess humming, Checkmate jumped a little in shock as she saw the ass wall slowly shrink. Following its lead, Checkmate activated her powers as well. Being now child-sized, Checkmate crawled on her knees to hide herself. Finally, she was face to ass with a normal, albeit still noticeably large, posterior.

"Hopefully the girls don't reveal that Magic Man is here;if half of the villains of this city knew he was with us, they would risked themselves trying to bust down our door!" Thunder Thigh joked.

Checkmate watched, shrinking down even smaller, as the villain looked herself over in a mirror. Seeing a good as time as any, Checkmate grew to a larger sized and pricked Thunder Thighs in the bum. The villaines gasped, before her eyes grew lazy and she fell to the floor with a thud.

"Magic derived serum:one; crazy butt girl: zero" Checkmate sarcastically thought. Turning around,Checkmate searched through the woman's wardrobe, before finding what she was looking for:handcuffs. Checkmate blinked in surprise, only searching for the tools for the hell of it.

"Now, were these here for pleasure or business?" Checkmate thought, she shrugged. Placing them around Thunder Thigh's limbs, Checkmate's next step was finding a good place to stash her. Tapping her foot, Checkmate jumped in surprise as a panel opened up beneath her. Dodging aside, Checkmate watched as the panel revealed a wardrobe of costumes. And was just the right size to stuff a 5'9 woman into.

Doing just that, Checkmate copied the powers of Thunder Thighs, before stuffing the crook into the panel. But just before she was about to so, she stopped. Checkmate scratched her chin, lost in an idea. She peered intensely at the wardrobe, wondering if she could try out something. Above where the leotards were helmets, for when Thunder Thighs needed to go to more environmentally hazardous places. And where was a more hazardous place than the place where three giants were kicking up a bunch of dirt?

Thinking it over, Checkmate decided to try what she was planning. Putting on the leotard and helmet, and of course putting her clothes back into the pocket dimension Magic Man made for his partners, Checkmate looked like a spitting image of Thunder Thighs. Except she was about 3 inches shorter; maybe she could play it off to the giants?

Stepping outside, Checkmate hoped her gambit played off.
155332322222221111222121.title: They get small and copy powers to fight

choices: The Fanny Four-or three- don't notice the ruse
Caught after a slip-up on Checkmate's part
1553323222222211112221211.content:
"Wait, she was wearing raised shoes all this time?" Checkmate thought as she looked down to see that she'd gained about two inches in height. She had gained about two inches in height from the platforms, so an inch off was the best she could get.

Walking forward, she adjusted her--or Thunder Thighs--shorts for a bit to make them justright. Straightening her back, she moved towards the Colosseum.
===

Meanwhile, Mouse had traveled back to see what Magic Man was suffering from now.

Squisher was squishing Magic Man under her enlarged foot, doing her best not to crush the hero under her own weight. Megabutt seemed to be quite peeved at the wrestler's hogging however.

"You've been doing that forever now!" Megabutt proclaimed. "I demand for my turn to fondle Magic Man!"

"It's only been five minutes your 'Majesty', let me have some fun!" Squisher replied. At this time, a(ss) certain someone came swaggering back to the Colosseum.What was going to be a quiet entrance turned into a loud crash. Astro-Cheeks huffed out a bit as she became stuck in the archway and Squisher came over to help her fellow giantess out. Before she did though, she placed Magic Man out of Megabutt's reach. The royal villain grumped in anger and tapped her foot to relieve some of it.

Mouse saw her chance,quickly did she scamper up to the seats. There Magic Man laid dazed on the seats, a bit of drool running down his face. Mouse scampered over to him and began to grow herself. About a foot in height, the rodent-themed heroine tried to make sense of his bindings.

"Don't worry Magic Man, I got you." Mouse assured, though she did gape a little at the strange straps that bound him together. The strange cuffs were something that she never seen before, stamped with glyphs of some ancient language. Chewing her lips, Mouse went over to see if any of the Fanny Four had a key on them, and low and behold, Megabutt did!

"Yes. I can use Astro-Cheeks and Squisher to-"

"And you're out!" Squisher proclaimed as she pushed Astro-Cheeks out of the door. The German was a little smaller,but still quite hefty in size. Smiling, Squisher went back over to grab Magic Man. Mouse yelped and shrunk back down to a smaller size. She cursed her luck and began to formulate a plan to save Magic Man. But fate smiled down on her.

"Hey, you're back Thunder-Thighs! Still wanna see what we do to this little guy?" Squisher announced.
1553323222222211112221211.title: Mouse to the rescue.

choices: The girls go to free Magic Man.
The Fanny Four's boss calls in.
15533232222222111122212111.content:
Checkmate, as Thunder Thighs, shrugged. The three looked at her for a moment and replied with the same attitude. Squisher looked around where Magic Man was, right before she saw him in the seats and plucked him up. He went flying into the Colosseum ground, still dazed out of his mind.Squisher and Astro-Cheeks were stretching themselves as they leered down at the tiny man.Checkmate,meanwhile, walked up towards the seats, where Megabutt was, and sat a little farther away from her.

"Welp, it looks like its my turn to get MM away from that dumb giant." Megabutt said. She stood up,which allowed Checkmate to see Mouse shrunken down behind the woman's massive ass. Mouse pointed towards Megabutt's rump, which of course made Checkmate confused, but then the girl saw what Mouse was pointing at. A key tied around the waist of Megabutt.

Checkmate stumbled forth to get Megabutt to sit back down,but in her haste, she grabbed a squishy sphere of flesh. Megabutt turned around to see where Checkmate's hand was and turned towards her. Underneath Thunder Thighs mask, Checkmate was blushing furiously.

"Well, well, well, Thunder Thighs," Megabutt spoke. "You've finally chosen me as our team leader?"

Like a comet hitting the Earth, so to did Megabutt come crashing back down to her seat. Mouse was thrown off her feet and Checkmate worried she was going to fall down, the shrunken heroine did not though.

"So Thunder Thighs, when did you decide I was the best choice for ou-" Megabutt rattled onward as Mouse raced forth and grabbed a hold of the key. Pulling with all of her tiny might, the rodent themed heroine managed to free the piece from its master.

Checkmate delivered a thumbs up, Megabutt none the wiser to her stolen property.

"Now whats left to do it getting Magic Man away from these booty bandits." Mouse thought as she cradled the key.

155332322222221111222121111.content:
"-and that's how we'll take over the entire city with us as the overlords and me as the empress!" Megabutt happily finished whatever she was saying to Checkmate.

Checkmate absentmindedly nodded to whatever she was adjusting, only focusing on Mouse's movements and calculating the chances of the groups success.

"Now as my first decree as The Fanny Four's Leader, I say we redraw our contract with our benefactor." Megabutt declared. Checkmate's eyes winded beneath her mask. She wondered where the four had acquired their tech from,maybe Megabutt could reveal a little about their anonymous source?

Meanwhile, Mouse was grappling down from the stands and into the Colosseum's floor. She coughed as she landed in the surprisingly soft sand. At a inch in height, the heroine still felt too big and exposed in front of the two giantesses. She couldn't shrink any further though, if she did she wouldn't be able to drag the key's behind her effectively.

Above her, Astro-cheeks and Squisher were still in the middle of the warm-up stretches. Astro-Cheek,who was more bottom heavy and smaller than Squisher, was having some difficulty reflecting her companion. Her twin spheres snuggled tightly against her skintight black suit.

Magic Man was still dazed out of his mind from the torment he suffered under the two. Mouse could still see he was somewhat conscious, but she didn't put much hope into him getting back up for awhile. Mouse crept slowly next to Magic Man's downed form, her body shaking from the movement of Astro-Cheeks and Squisher. Taking the keys into both of her hands, she aimed it into the keyhole of Magic Man's cuffs. Twisting the key, she waited until she heard a tell-tale pop of a lock.

"Yes" She whispered out. All that was needed left was to get Magic Man out of the base.

Going through all the options for a plan, she waved for Checkmate's assistance.It took awhile for Checkmate to see the minuscule woman, but once she did she played around with her hands. Making it look like absentminded movement on her part, she conversed with Mouse on what to do.

Coming to their own conclusion, the two went to enact their plan.

"Oh, you're going down their to play with Magic Man?" Megabutt questioned as she saw Checkmate---or to her Thunder Thighs--get up and move towards the two giantesses. The disguised woman put a thumbs up and moved right next to Squisher.

"Don't hog him too much though! Wait, no I'm the uncontested leader now, I don't need to explain my desires!" Fanny Four's 'leader' proclaimed.

Back onto Checkmate and Squisher, the giantess took note of her arriving teamate. Standing still, she peered down at Checkmate.

"Thunder Thighs, great of you to come! Megabutt, do you want to join in or-" Squisher stopped as Checkmate placed her hands onto the ankle of the giant woman and absorbed her power. Squisher felt only a slight tingle over her body. Before she could speak out, Checkmate opened up her bag to transform back into her original costume.

"Wat?" Astro-Cheeks cried out. Megabutt, still in the stands,shot up like a flag on a pole.

Mouse took the initiative as well, growing into her full height and grabbing onto Magic Man. Checkmate, now in her original costume, took advantage of the confusion.Using Squisher's absorbed power, she swelled in height. Growing to be around sixty feet in height, she gently took a hold of Magic Man and Mouse and smashed her fist into Squisher's face. The other woman fell like a chopped down tree.

She then proceeded to knock down Astro-Cheeks into the floor. The giant woman plopping down onto her monumental sized ass with a boom. Megabutt temporarily flew through the air.

Shrinking down into a smaller size, Checkmate dropped Mouse and Magic Man onto the floor. She mimicked with her fingers a 'compressing' motion to Mouse. Taking quick note of that, the rodent hero knew what her teammate needed of her. She shrunk and crawled into Magic Man's pocket. Checkmate then took the downed magician and shrunken cargo into her arms.

Growing to around fifteen feet tall, the power copier ran with her rescued leader out through the archways of the underground Colosseum.
155332322222221111222121111.title: The girls go to free Magic Man.

1553323222222211112221211111.content:
"Raaargh" Squisher screamed as she got her bearings together. Checkmate ignored the yell of anger and kept up her pace. Another yell called out, followed by the crash sound of crashing debris.

"Probably Megabutt" Checkmate thought, her pace getting quicker. A third crash came from behind her, confirming Astro-Cheeks joining the chase. Checkmate bobbed and weaved through the small city that was this underground base.

Looking over her back,Checkmate internally screamed as she saw Squisher become a four story tall giantess. The woman strode forth, intent on capturing the trio of heroes. Turning back around, Checkmate would've yelped in surprise if she had the ability to speak. There coming up in front of her was Megabutt,bent over, ass ten feet wide. No doubt she was there to act as a barricade.

Swerving besides the woman, Checkmate delivered a quick kick to Megabutt's left, knocking her into a structure. The woman yelped in surprise, her titanic butt denting the architecture.

Checkmate stared down at Magic Man's prone form, making sure he and Mouse were alright. Seeing no harm done to them, she continued forth on her race to the stairs. Behind her, she could hear the thump of Squisher's boots.

Ahead of Checkmate, the heroine smiled as she saw the exit coming for her. A large piece of shot forth into her path.

"Gut ya!" Astro-Cheeks German accent echoed.

Checkmate couldn't care less and dodged around the debris and towards the stairs. Shrinking down so she could fit into the cramped space,she dragged Magic Man up.

Reaching the door, she cracked it open,and with a kick,had it open. Closing the door behind her, Checkmate raced out of the warehouse, Magic Man cradled within her grasp.

It took over an two hours for Checkmate to make it back to base. She had to weave in and out of alleyways and make a shortcut through a park.

The warehouse, knowing who she was, kindly opened its door and let the enlarged lady through. Checkmate bent down, carrying the unconscious hero in. Passing the memorabilia of the hero's previous victories, Checkmate looked for a surface that she could place him on.

Seeing a table, Checkmate decided that it was good enough. She laid Magic Man gently down, about to walk away, Checkmate felt a small movement on her body.

Amelia went to check Magic Man's vitals and health. He didn't appear too injured, but she didn't exactly have the materials to be through in her study. It was a twenty minute checkup.

Meanwhile Checkmate was off in the corridors, looking for something to assist Magic Man's unconscious form. Rushing throughout the building, she eventually found some supplies to help in his recovery. She came back, arms full of bandages, water bottles,and whatever else she could grab.

Amelia looked at her companion.

"You know, I think we should chip our money together for a medical cabinet or something." She spoke before turning back to her leader.

The two villains laughed as they continued to rub their cheeks against the helpless hero. Magic Man soon stopped struggling as the big booty villains squeezed the consciousness out of him.

"We got the artifact!" Thunder Thighs announced as she and Astro-Cheeks entered the lobby.

"Silent girl and tiny girl showed up, but they got away." Astro-Cheeks added, unaware that the two heroes had shrunk down and were hitching a ride on her costume.

Big Sister just stared down st the hero’s. Mouse was a little nervous. She hadn’t planned on a hero so large. This would be a tricky sell. The Fanny Four were on relatively good terms with most villlains, including Big Sister.

“Big Sister. We need you to help us.” Mouse said. Big Sister burst out laughing. Checkmate and Mouse looked at each other while the giantess laughed.

“Me, help you? Sometimes I think you fools are the dumbest ones in the city.” She said. Checkmate quickly signaled “say Mark” to Mouse. She understood.

“They took Mar- I mean Magic Man?” She said. Mouse walked over to comfort her. Big Sister may be a villain, but she still cared about her brother more than almost anything.

“Will you help us save him? We don’t know how long he has left.” Mouse said, trying to get her emotional. She needed for Big Sister to be angry at the villains.

“How could they betray me like that? How could they take the one thing I love. My poor baby.” She said.

“I will help. I know where their hideout is and I will take you to them. That Megabutt is gonna learn some manners.” She said, rising to her feet.

1553323222222211132.content:
"How about Magic Woman, wait no, Magic Man said to never call her." Mouse said.

The duo had exited from the building by shrinking into smaller sizes and hiding themselves using rubble; they saw police arrive at the scene. Trying to calm down the panicked civilians rushing out of the hole Squisher made. The girls felt that not alerting everybody to Magic Man's capture by the Fanny Four.

Currently the two were on a rooftop, sitting on one of Magic Man's "nest". Which were hideouts that Magic Man used for respite; these "nests" ranged from little campfires to large tents. Magic Man used his powers to disguise them, as to not give them away. If anyone but Magic Man were to arrive there, they both couldn't see, nor touch anything. Mouse and Checkmate had to use special keys to dispel that effect. Unfortunately, Magic Man had to redo the spell and he was probably getting smothered by bums right now. So any snooping character would see the heroines pacing outside a ,weirdly, cheery tent.

Checkmate scratched her chin, or at least her helmet's chin, in meditation. She sighed out "Cheer" and "Team". Mouse shook her head again in response. "No, those two are difficult to work with. If we have to help Magic escape by ourselves, then it is what it is."

"If its a another hero you need,sweet thing, I open to discussion." A voice called out, Mouse and Checkmate instantly went onto the defensive. Mouse shrank down and Checkmate pulled out a stun gun for the attacker. The heroines looked around for the owner of the voice.

"Hey, hey. I'm not a bad guy. In fact.." A figure walked around the tent, Checkmate held the stun gun in front of her. Mouse.meanwhile, made her way towards the figure. "...I'm a new hero on the scene. The name's: APEX!"

Apex was an Adonis of a specimen; standing around 6'5 and carved like a Greek stature,or at least the armor he wore was. The main color scheme of it seemed to be various shades of red, barring the chest emblem. That was grey, with a sword and shield carved into it. Apex's head wasn't covered bya face concealing mask, but a visor which proudly showed his features. Which, like his body, was a thing worthy of songs. Chiseled jaw, piercing brown eyes,thin lips,and an imperial nose. Strangely, the man decided to have his mane of hair open to the air. All in all, he looked like a hero from a bygone area.

Checkmate and Mouse were not impressed;probably because they hanged out with Magic Man, someone they respected and liked. Additionally, Checkmate didn't swing straight, so that piled onto the "piss off" angle. Apex didn't seemed to notice the contempt though and flexed in egotistical might.

"Anyways, I overheard your troubles. And while I was thinking of breaking onto the scene in a different way, maybe take out Lucha Libre or her rivals, I decided this is way better." Apex announced. "I get to save the 'big man' of the city, Magic Man! How cool is that? Pretty cool."

Mouse had already arrived at the blowhard's feet and was taking out a few explosives that Magic Man made for her.. Meanwhile, Checkmate was just watching Apex with pure confusion, with hints of annoyance. Still, Apex kept digging himself deeper.

"Oh, I mean he has all the action on the scene, but what about the other guys? We can't let he keep all the pretty girls to himself, can we?" Apex said. "Wait, I forgot to give my card out."

He held up his forearm and Checkmate could see a slot on it, a card appeared in it. Apex handed the card to Checkmate, who tentatively took it from him. She looked it over, on it was Apex's mug, a phone number, and his name in bold lettering. Mouse had finished her job and was slowly started to back away a safe distance away from Apex's feet.

"Back onto topic, we need to get Magic Boy away from the 'Badonk Baddies'. Thankfully, I managed to get a bead on their location." Apex said absentmindedly
.That caught the duo's attention;Checkmate rushed over to him, while Mouse grew back to her main size.

"Where?!?" Mouse said as she grabbed onto Apex's shoulders fro behind. If he was surprised, the man didn't show it." Easy on the armor, I'm not scary. If you wanted to get close, you should've just asked!"

"Again, where?" Mouse insisted.

"Alright, alright, we can talk about me later. The four girl are here..." Apex showed the two girls where the Fanny Four were based at the moment.

When the duo had arrived at the pillar, they had to clutch to the side of it.The gauntlets of Mouse's costume had claws to clutch to the side of the pillar, while Checkmate's had suction cups on her's. Mouse held onto the pillar with one arm and had held onto her grappling gun with the other.

Magic Man had been silently watching the two villainess as they made their way around the museum. Somewhere between the time he lost sight of them,and now, the two had their costumes on.Where they changed at and where they were keeping their clothing was an question that he pondered on for a few moments. "We grab the artifact and get out of here, Squisher and Megabutt know where to go afterwards. And hopefully I can get some tea after all this is done." Thunder Thighs continued. Magic Man followed the duo to an area of the museum, the place was titled "Objects Unknown" and it appeared to have everything that couldn't be cataloged.

The two arrived at the front of a weirdly shaped object, Thunder Thighs stopped Astro-Cheeks before she could grab it. The electric villain saw something only visible to her own eyes. This made Thunder Thighs the only one able to disable whatever was around it. She put her hand in front of her, with her powers she seemed to drain something from the air. Magic Man could see the lights in the museum flicker for a moment. He also could see her butt blimp up. She grabbed the artifact, not before she shot off a lighting bolt in Magic Man's position.

Magic Man cursed and turned visible, he conjured a shield to block off any more attacks." How did you know I was here?"

"I had a hunch that you were going to come, and as to my shooting, I took a lucky guess." Thunder Thighs called out.

"How did you take a 'lucky guess'? I only saw you take the artifact and you don't have an hunch. You have a large butt, but not at this moment, ja" Astro-Cheeks said, scratching her head. Thunder Thighs sighed and kept one hand trained on Magic Man, while she spoke to Astro-Cheeks.

"Its a figure of speech Astro, we went over this."

"Who is this 'figure', is he- oh, wait. Sorry,mein fuhrer, must've forgotten about it." Astro-Cheeks replied. She bumped her bum against the the now empty pedestal and grew a foot in height. Her butt was still proportional to her body, although, it almost seemed to yearn for attention.

"It seems that we're at a standoff, Thunder Thighs." Magic Man called out.

"That is where you're wrong, Magic Man. Now, Astro-Cheeks!" Thunder Thighs screamed. Astro-Cheeks appeared to be confused as Magic Man was, right before she snapped her fingers in understatement. She slapped her right buttcheek, and from the left, Magic Man could see her holding a bomb. Astro-Cheeks threw it and Magic Man instinctively put a magic field around it.

It went off, but it wasn't a explosive that damaged things. It was a flashbang and Magic Man was blinded in pain. When he regained his vision, he saw the two villainess run out of the area he was in. Thunder Thighs to the right; Astro-Cheeks to the left.

Who would he follow?

Astro-Cheeks thought, she had shrunk a good foot from her enlarged height. Her powers needed to "grow" with her, where she had to absorb larger objects to take it in herself. He turned around to hear anything coming at him, he past a sarcophagus. He didn't hear a thing as the artifact crashed down behind him. Wait, what. But yes, it was a underwear clad Astro-Cheeks and Magic Man blushed in embarrassment. She was ten feet high at the moment and her hips were almost wider than her shoulders at the moment. And her height grew even bigger, and her butt even larger, from the broken piece of wall.

Asto-Cheeks looked at her and complied, trapping Magic Man under her mighty mounds. Thunder Thighs strutted over to the downed Magic Man and squatted down near the hero. She raised her hand to his face and slowly moved her to his face.
