1553323222222212221.content:
"Ow!" Magic Man complained. "Ow again! Do you have to do it like that?"

"Oh pipe down you big baby. You literally only have scratches right now!" Mouse, or Amelia at this moment responded. Nicole, or Checkmate, meanwhile was watching the news feed on the computer.

The trio had returned back to the Magic Cave (or the Mouse Hole or the ChessBoard; it depended on the time of day) and were nursing their wounds sustained in battle. Checkmate seemed to be the worst in shape, but she allowed Mouse to check on Magic Man first.

"So. What exactly happened to you girls?" Mark said. Amelia finished applying medical alcohol to a nasty scratch of his and covered it with a bandage. Fin

"Thunder Thighs. It seemed that she circled back around and decided to help out her friends. She didn't even stay to fight us! She just zipped in blasted Nicole, shot at me, and then ran off. Which I can see, resulted in your beatup." Amelia replied. "And then Megabutt smacked me with her enlarged posterior. Luckily I shrunk down to make myself less heavy and smacked into Nicole.At this time she was getting clobbered by Squisher. Thankfully I landed on her skin and she managed to copy my powers so we could get away."

"And what about Squisher and Megabutt?" Mark spoke.

"Got away with Astro-Cheeks and Thunder Thighs." Amelia replied. Mark waved off Amelia, who then got up and lead Nicole away from the computer. Mark sat down on a random chair and watched as Amelia went to work.

"Got anything Nicole? About the museum, the four villainess, or anything noteworthy about the artifacts?" Mark asked. Nicole began to move her hands in response. Which made Amelia's work somewhat harder.

"No. News say that the museum is still taking stock of what they lost. While somehow nobody saw the giant running about." Nicole could somehow add sarcasm to sign language.

"Darnit. Okay everybody let's name off what we got: four butt villains have decided to work together and begin their relationship by stealing something. Now normally my villains can barely stand to work with each other, barring duos, but it seems we have here a "Legion of Doom" on our hands." Mark stated. "Now we all know what these ladies can d-."

Nicole shot up a hand and began to 'speak' her thoughts. "Not me, came here only a month ago. Hero for about two weeks of said month.So can you give a quick rundown for the newb? I can see they're a bunch of booty bandits and I already know what the giant can do, but even then.."

Mark raised an eyebrow. Nodding his head, he conjured up miniature versions of each of the villainess. Nicole's eyes widened at the spectacle and bent her head closer for a better view.

"Who do you wanna see first?" Mark said. Nicole rubbed her chin in thought,before pointing at Squisher. Mark nodded and began to enlarge the miniature. "Just to make sure you know these are to scale and without any powers activated." Mark added on.

Squisher appeared to be a African-American woman about five-foot nine in height. Her hair was cut short, but not to a boyish extent. She had a confident grin on her face,as if the woman thought she could take on the world. Currently, she was dressed in a purple leotard with a crumbling tower on it. Her boots and gloves were also purple, but a different shade than her body. On her head was a cowl that left only her hair and mouth open.

"Squisher, or 'The Squisher', but who wants to say 'The' every time we mention her? She's a size-changer who can reach one-hundred and ten feet tall."

"That's about thirty-three meters." Amelia whispered in Nicole's ears.

"Yes. Back onto the topic. This makes her the tallest size-changer in the entire city. Not only that her strength and durability increase tenfold every time she grows five feet. She also gains regeneration, minor, but noticeable. Besides that, she always grow taller than anyone in nine square feet of her."

"Or three meters." Amelia whispered again. Mark ignored that. "She only grows taller than anyone in those nine square feet of her; anyone shorter than her is ignored."

"Squisher is also an expert wrestler, so good that she can take on Lucha Libre in a match without any help.That being stated, she would soon loose in a battle of might against Lucha as the fight dragged on. Unlike the others who will come up, Squisher can't grow her rear. She just likes to get to a size that allows her to crush people beneath her cheeks. Physically, she is the mightiest of the four, but her power isn't that versatile in a fight.Usually one needs to trap her legs with something."

Finishing, Mark waited until Nicole pointed at the next villainess.

Megabutt appeared to be a woman around five-foot five in height. Her hair was a distinctive shade of brown that almost bordered on blonde. She also wore a grin, but her's was like a noble staring at all of her servants and castle. Dressed only in a red G-string bikini, scarlet boots, and a domino mask just as red as the rest of her, something about Megabutt gave the woman grace that shouldn't be possible in her getup.

"Megabutt. She's the second strongest of the group, which probably makes her angry to no end,only being able to lift about fifty-five tons. She can fly,but she isn't the fastest one in the city. She's also a size-changer, but with a cap of ten feet, like Squisher though, she can get stronger in her taller form. At this size, she can pickup about one-hundred tons."

Amelia was about to say the metric form of Mark's words, Nicole waved her off.

"Now we're lets get onto her namesake feature." Mark stated. "Yes. She can the biggest out of the four, with only Squisher beating her, but even then that's on a technicality. Her great big butt of her's is indestructible,can launch people farther than what should be possible for the rear, and like we've seen today, is able to hypnotize people temporarily. It isn't the strongest,as one only has to be on guard to ignore the effect. While formidable, Megabutt isn't that durable relatively, as one could see when Amelia punched her face in,though don't let her get her hands on you. Additionally, she is an intense megalomaniac who loves to glorify herself."

Nodding,Nicole picked her next target.

Astro-Cheeks was about five-foot six in height. Her hair was a bright blonde and flowed near her shoulders. The expression on her face made her seem a little ditzy, what with her placid smile. She wore a completely black suit patterned with stars, the solar system was located right on her sizeable bust. A cowl left only the area around her chin and hair open.

"Astro-Cheeks is another size-changer,she's able to grow a total of thirty feet in height. She's strong in her base form, able to lift up a ton. Her main power though is to absorb things inside of her. Trapping anything to use in her own mass.This ability also grants her a form of indestructibility, as she can easily absorb bullets,rockets, debris, and most matter.This lady can also expel any absorbed matter and shoot that stuff out like some sort of missile."

Mark continued.

"And like the other size-changers,she gets stronger the bigger she gets. But she's thankfully weaker than Megabutt or Squisher. Her additional weakness is her growth factor; Astro-Cheeks isn't able to absorb things larger than herself. If she wanted to absorb a car, she would have first get herself up to a size larger than said car by absorbing other,smaller things. She also doesn't like electricity as that causes her to go wild and shoot out her absorbed debris,"

"And what's her butt gimmick?" Nicole asked.

"Ever hear the phrase ', It'll go straight to your thighs?.' Well Astro-Cheeks is that phrase personified. Her rear grows first, followed by her height. At twenty-five feet tall, her butt can touch both sides of a street. I think she can get bigger, but her butt would impend her movement way too much."

Nicole pointed out the last member of the four.

Thunder Thighs appeared to be a woman around five foot seven. Her hair was a mixture of blue and white, but she could've been wearing a great wig. Unlike the others, her entire head was covered in a mask of some sort. And out of the all the four, she appeared to be dressed the weirdest. Her upper body was professional in presentation; with buttons, covered seams,and armored portions to it. The bottom of her was near scandalous in opposition to the top. Her short-shorts appeared to be practically in her crack. The colors used in the strange assemble were blues,whites, and light-greys.

"Thunder Thighs is thankfully not a size-changer, like the others. She can absorb electricity,add some extra power to said electricity, and shoot it back out. Her butt is how one tells how much power she has. At her biggest, I've seen her shoot arcs that could instantly slag steel like it was nothing. That isn't the only thing she can do. She can clap her thighs together and make a shockwave,temporarily turn herself into electricity, cause EMP attacks,and fly."

Nicole rubbed her arm in thought,feeling lucky she had Squisher's power when she was shot.

"Thankfully she is physically the weakest of the bunch. Which also relates to her other problem. See with her expanding lower half comes weight, and unlike the others, she can't lift it up. And her power if she doesn't concentrate, she absorbs electricity mindlessly. Granted,she can shrink herself back down by shooting an arc out,but the distraction is noteworthy. One can also insult her butt size,it'll get her angry. I honestly don't know how her power came to be,"

Looking at the girls, who seemed to be mentally jotting notes down, Mark finished his lecture off.

"These women are some of the most dangerous villainess in the city. They seemingly have teamed up together.We all need to keep our eyes open and make sure we're ready for their next appearance."
1553323222222212221.title: Aftermath:Heroes

choices: We cut to the Fanny Four at their hideout
We cut to our heroes after the fight.
1553323222222212222.content:
Elsewhere.

Four ladies walked neatly together. Costumes stuffed into backpacks, the Fanny Four looked like a group of ladies out for a jog. Sunglasses,track shorts,and slim-fit tops. Megabutt led from the front,with Squisher trailing behind her. Thunder Thighs talked with Astro-Cheeks,the German woman's butt a little on the large side. She currently hid the artifact the group had acquired inside of her buttocks.

"Just a few more blocks girls."Thunder Thighs spoke from behind the leading duo.

"Are you sure its this location?" Megabutt questioned. Even though Thunder Thighs knew where the meeting place was, Megabutt wouldn't dare not lead the group forward.

"Positive."

Soon the four arrived at an indistinguishable warehouse, its architecture resembling the others on the street. Megabutt opened the door and walked in,the others followed. A robot,with a screen for a face, stood vigilant,or laid dormant more accurately. It was larger more at its bottom than it was on the top,it would've been tear-dropped if its underside was curved.Tank treads instead of feet, its humanoid top seemed out of place compared to the rest of it.Two compartments,one near is 'stomach area' and one near its 'bosom' were easily discernible on its form. A red button was held by its metal hands.

"I do love these little doo-dads." Thunder Thighs cooed as she walked closer to the machine.

"I wished she'd actually showed her face." Squisher spoke. "It'd be nice to see what our buyer actually looks like."

"Can you blame her anonymity? I bet she can't bask in my glorious self." Megabutt stated. "Though I do wish we can at least see something of her,well other than her silhouette."

"I don't know, I kinda like meeting this little fellow as well." Astro-Cheeks cooed as she paced forward. She petted the robot with Thunder Thighs. Megabutt and Squisher didn't get their obsession,more in-tuned with the physical instead of the mechanical.

"All right, let's put our masks on and get this over with." Thunder Thighs spoke. All four ladies unzipped their backpacks and put on their masks. Some weird quirk of the Succubus magic allowed their identities to be hidden by even the smallest of facial coverings,barring some exceptions.

Finished, Megabutt pushed the button the robot carried and a flicker of life buzzed through it. A video of a silhouette showed on screen, by both bodily communication and shape, one could tell it was a woman.

"Good evening,four." The distorted, yet still feminine voice, called out.

"Salutations, boss." Thunder Thighs responded. Megabutt not wanting to defer to anyone else;everyone was either a equal,a peasant,a toy,or Magic Man.She did grudgingly accepted the orders of the group's mysterious backer though,least because she gave the four a base of operations.

"Has my package been acquired?" The voice intoned.

"Right here,Astro?" Thunder Thighs called. Astro-Cheeks walked beside her and grabbed a hold of her belly. It wobbled for a minute until the distinct form of the artifact they stolen appeared like a submarine out of water. Megabutt casually grabbed a hold of it and shoved it into the screen's face.

"Here." She proclaimed. "Your prize."

The robot gingerly grabbed it with one hand.The button arm fell limply down to its side as it seized the artifact. It shoved it into its chest compartment. The four watched as the robot held stiff for a moment,until it 'stomach' opened and a small sack could be seen. Squisher was about to curse in anger until Thunder Thigh's opened the sack to see shining jewels inside of it.

"Your payment.You'll find at the bottom of the bag contact information for various fences around the city." The voice spoke. "Anything else you ladies would like to ask?"

"No that will be all." Thunder Thighs interrupted before any of the others could speak. She quickly pressed the button and shut off the feed.

The four argued for a bit about Thunder Thigh's action,but didn't feel the need to continue on. The ripped their masks off their faces and tided themselves up.

"Now that that's over, lets find a cab to get ourselves outta here." Squisher said.
1553323222222212222.title: Aftermath:Villains

choices: We follow one of the women
We follow Magic Man once more
15533232222222122221.content:
It took around twenty-two minutes to get home. The four walked into a warehouse, which seemed mundane on top,but below was a whole other story. Underneath was a massive cavern with an easily seen colosseum,though minuscule compared to its more famous sibling. Scattered around was about six tiny buildings;four small homes for the group as well as a communal storage shed and a recreational center.

"How did she carve out such a huge area underneath this place? I mean, the roof is forty feet above us and we have about two and a-half football stadiums in length.And I know we're sucking up a lot of power and water. Shouldn't the cops and various eggheads figure out where we are?" Squisher noted as the four walked down the steps.

"The bos-" Thunder Thighs began to speak before Megabutt butted in.

"The buyer."

"Um. The buyer has deep enough pockets to pay us in jewels, so maybe she's had this place all planned out?"

The four ruminated on their thoughts as they reached the bottom. The four walked off to their rooms. After an hour or so, they met back at the larger---yet still somewhat compact in this cavern---building. Thunder Thighs wore a nice T-shirt and skirt, Megabutt wore a flowering red dress more covering than her usual get up, Squisher wore a tank-top and daisy dukes, and Astro-Cheeks a nice sundress.

They all crowded around a table, Squisher stood over the three as they sat on chairs.They spoke for a few minutes,soon after they came a conclusion. Between themselves they split the jewels somewhat evenly, though Thunder Thighs awarded both her and Astro-Cheeks two extra, much to Squisher's and Megabutt's annoyance.

All managing to find common ground, the four conversed with one another until they broke apart.

Megabutt said she was going "partying" out in the city. Thunder Thighs went away to plan the group's next plan. Squisher went towards the colosseum,while Astro-Cheeks looked towards the TV for entertainment.
15533232222222122221.title: We cut to the Fanny Four at their hideout

155332322222222.content:
Snap,Crackle,Pop: Identical Triplets whose parents had died to the establishment,the Succubus gave each unique powers to fight back against "big business", in revenge for their parent's death. They enjoy " tweaking" the noises of various corporations and will glady humiliate them for free on their open time. They do have morals though: they won't go after tiny businesses.

Powers:
Annie Kellogg,or Snap, can "snap" two objects together, essentially glue them together. Its temporary on living things,but permanent without her hand in taking it apart. She can control the speed of the two colliding objects, allowing her to have a can collide with a wall at three hundred miles per hour. Her weakness is thst she has to touch the two objects in the first place to use her power.

Danni Kellogg, or Crackle, has heat based powers. She can't manipulate fire,but instead heat up objects to their melting point. Air shimmers around her at the height, and only the mightiest villainess can contest it. She can also manipulate it well enough that she can put it over individuals areas of her body. Her weakness is one born of worry, she coule hurt her siblings if she put up her limits. Another one is physics, if you're the heat of the sun, you're going to melt into the ground.

Marcie Kellogg, or Pop, can turn any non-living things into an explosive. She just has to form her materials into a facsimile of a bomb. From grenades, to smoke bombs to flash bangs. Besides that, her power also grants her "protected" senses,so as not to deafen her from her own explosives. Her weakness is time, if she doesn't have any, she can't make her explosives.

The group main weakness is their own sibling love; they may love each other,but they will always get under their skin. Snap is an optimist, Crackle is a pessimist, and Pop tries to keep all of them in check.

Apperance: They possess almost elf-like features, no one knows if it was from the Succubus. They almost look like marching band members. Snap wears yellow, Crackle wears blue, and Pop wears red.
155332322222222.title: Snap,Crackle,Pop

1553323222222221.content:
"So if my calculations are correct our makeshift explosive should be enough to blow a hole open into the skyscraper's side." Snap said to her siblings. Her elfish ears twitched as the cold air breezed past her sides.Snap carefully picked up one of the pipes they were going to use as explosive arrows. Crackle, meanwhile,was gathering more pipes for the trio to use. She melted straight through the base of each pipes. Pop was off to the side, gum in her mouth as she watched her siblings work. Her part in the scheme done for now.

"Is my bomb good enough now or do I need to make another?" Pop spoke. Snap used one of her hands to make a makeshift telescope. About a minute of this later, Snap gave her sisters a thumbs up.Pop and Crackle nodded and quickly hid behind a smoke stack.Snap pulled her hand back;her stance was more in line with someone pulling a slingshot's string than a throw. With a loud woosh, the pipe flew across the gap and stabbed the building opposite to the trio. The pipe stake began to turn red then blue and then finally exploded into a shower of sparks. No smoke came from the explosion though,just the ruin. A hole big enough for a person to climb into was carved into the building's structure.

"Ta da~ Snap smiled. "Now with that outta of the way, I'll launch one of us across then come back for the other. Whose first?'

"You go first Pop." Crackle spoke. Pop nodded before she walked right next to Snap. The yellow dressed elf grabbed a hold of her sister's waist before launched herself from the rooftop. The duo soared across the gap leaving Crackle behind. With a grunt the two managed to roll on impact into the building's interior.

"I'm coming back." Snap yelled. Just before she could do so a familiar figure came sinking down from the night's sky.

"The Keebler Elves. Nice to see you all out and about."

"Magic Man!" All three sisters exclaimed.

"The one and only. Now how about we all go head down to the station and sort this mess out? I can even get you three a nice lawyer for those copyright infringements you're all wearing."

"Book it you two!" Crackled yelled. Pop and Snap both ran away from one another, no doubt planning on losing the hero inside the building's halls.

Which one does Magic Man follow?
1553323222222221.title: Snap,Crackle, Pop

choices: Megabutt gloats, allowing Mark a chance to try to escape
Megabutt takes her prisoner/toy somewhere more familiar
Megabutt has immediate plans for the hero and her ass
Mark's friends try to mount a rescue
Mark finds a spell that somehow helps him escape?
15533232222222211.content:
As the trio separated, Magic Man took off hot on the trail of Snap. She was somewhat of a ringleader for the group and he knew that if he got her, the other two would be much easier to deal with. Snap ran through the corridors of the building with a smile on her face. She figured that the hero would turn up, and hoped that he would pursue her and let her sisters get away. He'd catch up with her in no time, but that was all a part of her plan.

Snap bursts into the next room and smiles as she sees the enormous ass of Megabutt, expanded and bent over waiting, just as planned. The impatient villaness complained. "It's about time, my back is starting to get stiff you little elf, if I don't s-" her whining was cut off by the shorter villain.

"Shhh! If he hears you, this will never work. He can't know you're here!" Snap whispers. "And pull your pants down unless you want him fused to your tights!"

Megabutt is not one to take being silenced well, but she has more important things on her mind than her ego at the moment.

----- Earlier that day -------

Snap meekly approached Megabutt, she knew that if this didn't work, the tall villainess could make her a pancake with ease if not worse. But she had a prize to dangle that she knew Megabutt would want.

"How long have you been saving that spot for Magic Man MB?" the shorter woman asked, leading with her offer.

The taller woman scoffed. "For far too long, but he'll be mine sooner or later," she said caressing her ample ass.

"Well, I know a way we can ensure that it's sooner. Are you busy this evening?" Snap asked, knowing she had the taller more powerful woman's full attention.

Megabutt listened to Snap's plan as her smile grew broader every second the shorter woman spoke.

"I'll be there shorty. You just better make sure this works. Otherwise my schedule won't be the only thing I'm rearranging if you get my drift," the taller woman threatens. Snap swallowed hard and walked out.

---- Present time --------

Magic Man knew he was right behind Snap and slowed his chase to avoid any potential missteps. Despite her size, Snap was a strategist. Still, he had her alone. Without her sisters, he should be able to take her down with a....snap! He smiled to himself at his little pun.

The hero phased through the door the villain went through and paused a moment to allow for his eyes to adjust to the incredible darkness. He felt a hand on his back, but before he could deal with it, his eyesight adjusted and saw something he had never counted on. Megabutt! His eyes shot wide open as he felt his body pushed at incredible speeds toward the largest ass in the city.

SMACK!

Mark collided with Megabutt's bare backside with a fleshy slap. Snap wasted no time, keeping her left hand pressed to the back of the hero's head and putting her right hand on the villain's thick ass. With a quick, loud, SNAP, the two were fused.

"Mmmmmph....Nnnnnnnooooo!" Magic Man screamed into Megabutt's backside, but his protests were only met with laughter.

"Well, that seems to have worked quite nicely Snap. And he can't get away?" the villain asked.

"Not without my help," the shorter woman crowed as she turned to leave the room. "You two have fun!" she giggled.

Megabutt caressed her full ass and pushed Mark's face further into it with a huge smile.
15533232222222211.title: Soaring Into a Trap

choices: Megabutt's got a nice long-range weapon
Cut back to Snap,Crackle, and Pop
155332322222222113.content:
Snap's power was more akin to a magnet than a fusion, which meant that Magic Man could briefly push against Megabutt's giant behind until he was snapped back in.

A groan escaped his mouth as he saw Snap leaving back the way she came.Muffled in one ear, Magic Man could hear the sound of guffaws escaping Megabutt's own mouth.

"Yes, I got you, me! Megabutt!" Said villainess screamed in haughty might. She wiggled her immense booty, which swung Magic Man around like a toy. Still, he was attached to the woman whether he liked it or not.

"Alright Mark, you can deal with this, Snap's power on living things goes away in twenty-four hours. You'll be fine until then." Magic Man thought. Megabutt, unhindered by her prodigious bottom, walked away from the initial struggle.

"I wonder what mistre-I mean Megabutt is taking me." Magic Man mumbled.

Being so close to the mind warping power of Megabutt's butt made Magic Man feel woozy. He wasn't prepared for her.

"You and me are going to have fun Magic Man, oh we're going to have so much fun!"
155332322222222113.title: Megabutt's immediate plans.

1553323222222222.content:
Team Player: Sister to Cheersquad, Team Player wanted to do every sport in existence. She had the drive, the passion, and talent. She could have it all,but she lost it in an accident. A jealous rival made sure of that. Heartbroken, the Succubus came to her aid like her sibling. Now she has come on the scene and is ready to join her sister to take on Magic Man. Though, she does appear to be training her yoga poses around him, if you know what I mean.

Powers: She can split apart like her sibling,but with a twist. She creates a "team" that are styled upon by a sport.
For example: football team would have a quarterback, linebacker, and so on. A soccer team would have a goalkeeper, midfielder, and so on. A baseball player would have a pitcher, shortstop and so on. She can do this for any sport in existence. These teams can be dangerous to the toughest of opponents, Lucha Libre has been known to tangle with her wrestling team at her height of power.

Her weakness is that she can only make one "team" at a time. So no basketball players with rugby players at one time. They must be defeated or dispelled by the referee, who is the original Team Player. Her other weakness is that she can only go as far as a team will allow. So no going over 25 for baseball players, no going over 11 for football players,and so on and so forth.


Appearance: Almost every sport is referenced on her body. A football jersey, with a hockey helmet on her head. A baseball bat that also looks like a hockey stick. Air Jordan's on her feet with retractable ice skates. A soccer short with various vehicle sports stitched into it. A backpack holds basketballs, or volleyballs, or tennis balls in it. Who knows what else she has on her.
1553323222222222.title: Team Player

15533232222222221.content:
Magic Man was strolling around and making his way through a crowd of students. The high school was packed with townsfolk and students. All had gathered to watch the biggest event of the season, the high school division 1 championship.

Mark was wearing a black over coat to cover his super suit. He sipped a hot chocolate as he scanned for any signs of evil activity. He was expecting trouble at this game. He hadn’t seen Cheer Squad or Team Player yet, but he was positive they’d make an appearance.

“Hey there!” Someone said. Mark spin around. He saw his partner, Amelia, in front of him.

“Oh hi. Excited for tonight? Should be a good one. Chesterfield Central is town.”

Amelia, also known as Mouse, smiled. She wore glasses and had her hair tied up to avoid being noticed. Her blonde hair blew slightly.

“Keep on the lookout. The sisters are bound to be here. The question is, when. Keep me updated on the radio.” And with that, she turned and disappeared into a crowd of parents.

Mark did as she said. He kept looking around. The trouble was, there were so many people, he couldn’t tell who he needed to focus on. Suddenly, he bumped into someone. It was a player.

“OMG. I’m sorry.” The player said. Mark saw that the player was in fact playing tonight in the _____
15533232222222221.title: Goal! I mean Touchdown! Team player it is

155332322222222212.content:
Magic Man looked the high schooler over. She would definitely be a very good player to have tonight. It was in fact the

A) girls Basketball finals

Or

B) The Football championship.
155332322222222212.title: Other sport

1553323222222222122.content:
It was the Girls state Football championship. Mark watched as the huge girls took the field. They may not be as good as the boys, but they were still a force. These were the largest girls in the school. Mark looked and saw his old friend, Tammy, stroll onto the field to warm up. She was the smallest on the team, and yet she was easily 5’8.

“Ladies and gentlemen! Welcome to this, the 53rd annual Girls Division 1 Football championship!” The announcer said through the PA.

Mark took his seat. Anxiously awaiting an attack. Mouse and Checkmate could be seen casually strolling around the edge of the stadium. Suddenly, Marks thoughts were interrupted.

“...And now, the starting lineup for your LADY WILDCATS! At Center, standing at 6’3 and coming in at 207 pounds, LUCY JOHNSON. At WR, she’s big, she’s mean, it’s LIZ GREEN!”

The announcer continued to call out names and the crowd erupted with each one. The girls waved at their fans and giggled on the sidelines. Finally, the intro came to an end.

“...And finally, Your captain! At starting Defensive tackle, she certainly earns her title. Standing at a mighty 6’10”, and coming in at a hair above 250, you know her, you love her, it’s AVA Moore!”

The crowd exploded as the biggest non-villain Mark has ever seen emerged from the tunnel. Something wasn’t right though. All the girls had blonde hair. Come to think of it, they all looked the same through their masks. And, they all had a small tattoo on their palm that said TP.

Wait a minute, is it...TEAM PLAYER!

Mark immediately signaled his partners. He picked up his radio sand dashed toward the field. “Mouse! Checkmate! Team Player is posing as the Team! Get to the field NOW!”

“We’re on it!” Mouse replied. Mark threw off his jacket and put on his mask. He tore off his jeans and revealed his spandex Magic Man suit.

They soon got to the field. Suddenly, ___
1553323222222222122.title: Football

choices: This is a ploy; we cut to Cheersquad stealing some item.
No, this actually is a game
15533232222222221222.content:
Magic Man watched as Team Player... didn't seem to be doing anything. She actually just seemed to be playing the game. Magic Man scratched his head in confusion and was only interrupted by Mouse coming in over the comms.

"Hey boss, do us to still interrupt them?" Mouse said.

"No, just watch." Magic Man said, he quickly whispered a spell to turn himself invisible. He sneaked through the crowd to get a closer look at the scene. He looked over the railing and whispered another spell. This one allowed him to see farther than humanely possible.

He scanned the sidelines to see his prize, and there she was, Team Player in her coach outfit. She seemed weirdly in the game at the moment.

"What are you doing, Team player?" Magic Man said quietly.
15533232222222221222.title: Let the Game Begin!

15533232222222222.content:
We all know the mighty Lucha Libre, but most of the villainess seem to not match her in physical power. Let us add some more to that category

Ebony Soldier:A wounded veteran, Amory was gifted a weapon by the Succubus. What type of weapon; every weapon! From swords to even missile launchers! She can also receive any ammo for the weapon she has on hand. Her weapon will always instinctively come back to her, anywhere in existence. Combined with that; Ebony Solider may not have super strength, but she is impossible to kill. Indestructible in the truest sense of the word and willing to beat up Lucha when she messes with her turf.

Her weakness is her weapon. It maybe able to change into any other weapon, but it can't turn into multiple things. So no chaingun-rocket launchers for her use. Her other weakness is her own Indestructibility, she doesn't have super strength to fight back against Lucha head on at her more powerful levels.

Appearance: She usually dresses in cheap army fatigue as she most of her clothing will be gone in most of her fights. She is a about 5'11 and a strong jawed African-American. Her eyes are usually covered by sunglassess. Her Ebony title comes from the color of her weapon.

Ivory Knight: A girl that legitimately wanted to be a hero, the Succubus came to grant that wish. Now she goes around the city, "helping" people. Whether it be breaking into bank vaults to give to the poor, beating up "evil order keepers" or police, or finding the "Villianous Magician's lair", Ivory Knight has her work cut out for her!

Powers: Equipped with white armor that can never break or be molded, Ivory Knight can take on Magic Man's spells. The armor can take on the pressures of the deep or outerspsce. She carries with her a sword that can " detect" innocence I.E anyone not attacking her. It can bypass anything she wants gone; steel, magic barriers,hardened flesh, all will come undone to the sword. It can be thrown away from her, but it will always come back to her in three days time. Her other weapons include a bow that can shoot out arrows of light and a shield that will always come back when thrown.

Besides that, she can can pick throw tanks across city blocks. And is probably one of the handful of people who can deal with Lucha on her rampages. She can also summon a flying horse named "Butterscotch" that she greatly cares for. No one knows if its a summoned beast or an actual living thing.

Her weakness is her own fantasy that she believes in. The Enchantress particularly likes to mess with her, pretending to be a damsel to have Ivory Knight mess with another villain.On that note, she can be tricked by more craftier villainess for their own gain.Her final weakness is her weaponry which can be thrown away from her. They will comeback, but it does take awhile, unlike Ebony's instant recapturing.

Apperance: A white colored, heavily armored Knight. She gesticulates and exaggerates every movement she does,hamming it up for the people.
15533232222222222.title: Rivals to Lucha Libre

155332322222222221.content:
Ebony Soilder

Or

Ivory Knight
155332322222222221.title: Ebony Soldier, or Ivory Knight

choices: Ebony Solider fights on with Lucha Libre.
Ebony Solider leaves the skirmish, leaving Magic Man with Lucha
1553323222222222211.content:
Mark sat down on the park bench with a smoothie in his hand, he deeply gulped from a portion of the frost beverage. Smiling as he did so, Mark was happy that today wasn't that active with villains.

"Its about twelve'o clock in the afternoon and I haven't even seen a pe-" Mark spoke too soon. A loud bang ranged out from the distance and Mark knew it was trouble.It seemed like he had a job to do.

He quickly teleported to a safe location on top one of the skyscrapers located around the city and whispered out spell. Gone was Mark the college student,replaced by the protector of the city: Magic Man!

"Let's play 'I Spy' and see where the problem is at." Magic Man spoke. His observation wasn't needed as he quickly saw the smoke rise off in the distance. Cracking his neck a little, Magic Man flew off towards the problem.

===

Magic Man flew towards the smoke and upon getting there saw the problem. There was fire everywhere and about five or six wrecked storefronts. Twenty cars were destroyed and their occupants were scrambling to get away from the fight scene. Craters were left in the ground, some still smoking. Undetonated artillery rounds were...wait, artillery rounds! Did an army come through this street or...

"Ah hell." Magic Man spoke. "Is-"

He stopped as he heard gunfire and thundering cracks come a little farther down the street. Large puffs of smoke blocked his view, so Magic Man decided to fly a little closer towards the mess. Upon doing so, he could finally see the cause of this situation.

"Is that all you got today?" A distinct Latina voice yelled out.

"Its enough to make sure your behemoth ass is down." A deep, but feminine, voice responded. Another burst of gunfire echoed through the street.

The proprietors of this situation were none other than Lucha Libre and Ebony Solider. Lucha Libre was about six feet tall at this point,but seemed to be avoiding the Ebony Solider's gunfire.Which was odd because at this size she could easily tank low-caliber bullets. Magic Man raised an eyebrow at this until he felt a stray bullet smash against his shield.

"Oh crud, these are fifty BMG rounds!" Magic Man internally screamed and quickly reinforced his shield. He watched as Lucha Libre dashed into a store, causing Ebony to start firing into the establishment. The former solider watched for any signs of the wrestler, but was blindsided as Lucha Libre smashed into her. Magic Man was confused for a moment, before he noticed the wrecked storefront right next to the place that Lucha Libre initially smashed into.

"She must've made her way into there by breaking through the wall." Magic Man thought. He watched as Lucha Libre delivered blow after blow into Ebony Solider's face, who seemed more annoyed than in pain. But this lack of concentration didn't allow for the woman to form a new weapon, seeing as her gun at the moment was a turret.

"I need to keep these two from launching the other into the next street." Magic Man mumbled. He then saw Lucha Libre grow an inch and quickly added on. "And I also need to make sure I can take down Lucha before she grows too strong."
1553323222222222211.title: Ebony Solider

choices: Ivory Knight takes Mark as her squire
Ivory Knight goes off to fight The Ogre
1553323222222222212.content:
Mark scratched the back of his head while he walked down the street. It was a rather chill day and he was trying to bunch up his clothes to warm himself. On his device, Mark was reading off the local news for the day.

"Local debutante, Melissa McManners, is having a galla tonight? Great, I'll come if I had a ticket." Mark sarcastically noted. He craved some coffee right now or some hot coca. Heck, it was getting a lot more chill than before, was the city suffering a cold spout or...

"By the beard of thy Lord! I greet you peasant!" A voice yelled out. Mark grimaced a little and turned to look at his greeter.

Riding atop of a winged horse was a figure from a fairy tail. Covered head to shoulder in white plate metal was a knight. The figure's held a sword pointing towards the sky while the other arm was protected by a shield. The figure in white radiated truth and justice. Mark blinked for a few moments, then groaned.

"Ahem!" He coughed. "What hast thou been up to Lord's beloved, Ivory Knight?"

The Ivory Knight looked down at Mark as he spoke those words.

"How dost thou know my...by the pubic hair of Lucifer! Squire Mark?"

The Ivory Knight got off her fair steed and walked over to Mark. She stood a fair foot taller than him, which allowed her to hug him. Mark grimaced at how much pressure she was delivering onto his body. Thankfully the woman managed to not crush him to oblivion. Dropping him, the Ivory Knight began to question her squire.

"Where hast thou been? I've been praying to the Divine Intelligence for you safety? Why hast thou not contacted me?" The Ivory Knight exclaimed.

She shook Mark so hard that the boy went into a dazed confusion. She soon stopped this action of course.

"No matter. I'm glad that thous is alright."
1553323222222222212.title: Ivory Knight

choices: They meet Mouse or Checkmate on patrol
Ivory Knight "protects and serves" the community
15533232222222222121.content:
"Well come on then my dearest squire,we have work to be done." Ivory Knight exclaimed. Before Mark could even protest the knight gripped a hold of Mark's pants and lifted him onto her horse. He laid on his stomach until he positioned himself into a better arrangement.

"Grab a hold of my fair bosom squire!" She said in the most serious tone a woman in white armor could say. Mark obliged her request,and with that, the duo shot off. The air whipped his skin,while Mark was used to flying high in the sky, he was usually protected from the turbulence by his spell. His teeth chattered from the cold.

"You know squire, I've always enjoyed your company." Ivory Knight spoke.Her armor allowed her to easily communicate despite the turbulence."It reminds me of the wizard Magik Manus, that vile fiend. Your aura though is much nicer. I do wish to award you once we get back to my fortress."

She purred the last words. Mark,meanwhile,wasn't that concerned with her little speech. He currently had to deal with the biting frost,the wind whipping against his head, the fact that he was over four hundred feet up in the sky, and his hands currently glued to the icy cold bosom of the insane knight.
15533232222222222121.title: Ivory Knight takes Mark as her squire

choices: Nah. This villain doesn’t cut it.
155332322222222222.content:
Name: Emma Chambers (Titaness)

Background: Emma was a student at the local college, and a friend of Mark. One day, after being bullied, she cried in the bathroom, only to have the Succubus come and grant her wish.

Abilities: Titaness has the power to steal people’s mass. As she grabs you, she takes in your muscle and fat. While doing this, she grows in height and butt, and her opponent shrinks to a skinny, much shorter midget.

Appearance: Titaness is very thick to begin with. She is about 5’4”, with curly brown hair and a pretty face. She has thick legs and a wide round butt from years of playing Hockey at school. She wears a skintight spandex suit with a large E on her chest.

Personality: Emma is very playful. Like the squishier, she enjoys her power. Also, it is a pleasure beyond belief when she takes mass.

IMPORTANT NOTE: if you write her, she is sensitive because of all the times she was bullied. If you ever make fun of her, she will go into a fit of extreme rage.

choices: She wants to turn Magic Man into a smol bean
1553323222222222221.content:
Magic Man flew through the streets, he watched as the screams for help echoed through the building canyons. He uttered spell after spell to protect the citizens from the environment.

The perpetrator of the attacks? Why another former friend of Mark, though she didn't know Magic Man was once her friend as well. She was once known as Emma Chambers, now known as Titaness.

Currently she was over fifteen feet tall at the moment and slowly becoming larger. She grabbed a hold of another citizen, a young man who looked to be over six feet in height. The villainess wrapped her hands around the man, who screamed in shock. Slowly the man began to shrink in her grips. Thankfully do to some in-built protection inside of her power, she soon let the man go before he shrunk out of existence. Unfortunately, he was now a three foot version of himself. His friend Damien would've called him a chibi if he was with Magic Man right now. The man looked kinda adorable, like someone was making a plush doll of a person. His cute round head and slightly smaller body was just 'daww' inspiring to look at.

"All right get outta here little guy." Titaness spoke as she dropped him from her now eighteen foot height. Magic Man caught the man before he could splat against the ground. The small man held onto his clothes for dear life.

"Titaness, nice to see you again.What are you doing now?"

"Doing what I do best, making big people go tiny." Titaness said as she loomed over the hero. She was quite a curvy villainess, comparable to both Enchantress and Shrinker. All from good genes and not Succubus crafted powers. Seeing such a good body made Magic Man tingle in delight.

"I know that, but what's the ultimate goal this time?" Magic Man reiterated. Whether it was because Titaness could feel some kinship with Magic Man or something else, she was always direct with him when he asked politely.

"Well right now my main man, I'm planning to..."

choices: Flashback to how she got her powers.
155332322222222222221.content:
"Oi, Magy!"

Magic Man turned around to see the familiar form of Magic Woman, she cheekily waved at him. He sighed, but steadied himself, thankfully he was decked out for an "high" threat encounter at the moment. Lucha Libre was on the prowl and he wanted to be as strong as he needed for their fight.

"Not now, Magic Woman." Magic Man said, making sure he didn't use her real name." I got other things to do-." He didn't get a chance to finish his sentence before he was launched from the roof by a tackle of Magic Woman. It seemed today she wanted to be a lot more physical in her actions, usually she would've blasted him off. The duo fell off the building, the ground coming closer and closer towards them.

"Lift!" Magic Man screamed the word and his descent slowed as he was gently lifted by unseen forces;Magic Woman laughed as she was lifted up with him. She clutched him closely as they headed towards the roof of a smaller building. Magic Man blasted Magic Woman off himself, the villainess flew for a few moments before she did a back-flip mid-air.

Magic Man breathed in and out from the experience, granted, Magic Woman had done way worse than that. Still, falling off a building while a crazed Ex was hugging you was not an event that couldn't be ignored. Magic Woman, across from him, laughed and turned around. She wiggled her bottom at him and dashed off the side of the building. Magic Man used another spell to grant him better eyesight, he saw the villainess jump across to the fire escape and run down an alleyway.

"Alright Magic Woman, you asked for it." Magic Man said.

He uttered a few quick phrases and shot off after the escaping mage. Lucha Libre still hadn't appeared yet, hopefully he could deal with Magic Woman by then. She seemed to be in one of her playful modes, or at least, not "capture and make out with you" modes. So he lowered his guard a little, not by much, but enough not to accidentally trigger her toward greater passion.

He hit the alleyway floor and looked around, he saw nothing. He scratched his head in confusion and muttered out a quick "Track." A faint blue line appeared in his eyesight and Magic Man followed it.

"Where could she be going? I have to deal with this, when I have to deal with Lucha at the moment." Magic Man whined,maybe he could call in Mouse to deal with her? Hell, maybe Checkmate can come in. However, it would take the both of them to drive downtown and it was getting late. No, he had to deal with both Lucha and Magic Woman by himself.

He followed the blue line for a few minutes, muttering phrases to himself. Right before a force collided with his back, before he could say anything, two hands shot forth to grab his pants. The garment was pulled down, leaving Magic Man pantless for a few moments. He saw his assailant, it appeared to be The Bully.

Magic Man fumbled to pull his pants up. "Bully? Why aren't you in the Teeth, east of here?" The Teeth, being the county near the coast of the city.

The Bully was currently wearing a red, leather jacket with diamond studs on it, her pants had holes and rips in it. He hair was slicked and greased backwards, making her look like a 50's delinquent. She had sunglasses on her head, who even wore sunglasses at night?

"What can I say? I was in the area and I wanted to pic' on ya punnnny selfa" The Bully decreed, her over enunciated words grounded on Magic Man's ears. He cursed internally as he finally pulled his pants up. The Bully may not be as dangerous as Lucha or Magic Woman, but she made up for it by being a complete obnoxious boar.

She pulled out a lolipop from her pocket and pulled down her shades. " Are ya doing anyting right now?" She somehow made the act of licking a lolipop annoying.

"Yes, yes I am." Magic Man announced.

"To bad!" The Bully exclaimed and tackled Magic Man to the ground. Magic Man grunted then completely stone faced as her was pinned down by The Bully. He wasn't that afraid of her at the moment.

She may have super strength, but it was nothing compared to any of the higher class villainesses. Probably her most dangerous weapon were her mind powers that could change ones' mentality.Hell, her mind powers were barley comparable to a true threat even then. And yesterday, he had to deal with the Enchantress, his mind-blocking spell was still in affect.

"Launch" Magic Man whispered, and he grinned in satisfaction as he saw the woman fly into a park. He got up and stretched for a little bit, sore from the tackling.

"First, Magic Woman. Then the Bully coming after me. Okay, is there another villain group I don't know about? What a goddamn night." Magic Man said aloud as he dashed into park. He then focused on the Magic Woman thought, she just disappeared.Where could Magic Woman be now exactly, hopefully she calmed down and went back to wherever she lives now.

He arrived at the park, he saw a knocked down tree, but no Bully. Another villainess disappearing, what was happening?

"HOLD UP, MAGIC DORK!" Magic Man paled as he heard the voice, he looked over to the general area and saw a very distinct figure. It was KABOOM! and she seemed to be smiling devilishly at him. She started to inhale and he saw her form start to inflate, her body slowly becoming more round. He was not ready to deal with her at the moment, instead he conjured a shield that was meant for Lucha Libre's attacks.

"Crap!" Magic Man cried out. He waited for the distinct explosion that Kaboom! brought to the table. He counted in his head for it.

"3...2....1...." Magic Man muttered and he was greeted by a loud "KABOOM." Which was yelled out, instead of actually occurring. It was followed by a laugh he knew from his childhood.

Maigic Man face scrunched up in confusion and he dispelled the shield. On the ground where Kaboom! was, a girl clothed in a dark blue jumpsuit rolled on the floor in laughter. The suit was stylized, almost being more of a theater costume than a super outfit. With various expensive looking cuts and sewing on it. The figure's head appeared to be covered in a helmet that resembled a "comedy" mask, but at the same time, a "sorrow" mask as well.

"You should've seen the look on ....HAH....your face" The figure said, as it began to slowly push itself upwards. Magic Man knew the identity of it, and began to rub the bridge of his nose.

"What are you doing here sis? I thought you were picking on Typhonic the next state over." Magic Man said, of all nights, she just had to pick this one to appear?

"Don't worry, lover-boy over there will get what's coming to him." Magic Man's Big Sister said. She danced around to show off her large rear. Which was weird, both he and her mother never showed signs of it, nor their father's side of things.

"Still doesn't explain why you're here." Magic Man said, he tapped his foot down in anger.

"So, I've been seeing that you got some new girls with large backsides. The, "Fanny Four", they call themselves, the land their large trunks on you. That is supposed to be my job! I have to give you a lesson, to not make you forget that Magic Man." Big Sis proclaimed.

Magic Man gulped, he remembered how this went." And is this all?"

Big Sis rubbed her chin for a little bit, then followed up that question. " You know I can never lie to you Magic;remember I was friends with Lucha? No, well I have one. Anyways, she said to distract you for a little while so she can get up to her more powerful form. And as you can see, I'm doing a hell of a job."

"And what is to stop me from just flying away right now?" Magic Man said, he was about to do just that after his statement. He opened his mouth, before the air was knocked out of him. He was knocked onto the ground and rolled over onto his front.

A rear attached to a giant appeared in his view, it was thankfully not as big as the Squisher mind you. The giant, not the rear, that was bigger though. It landed onto Magic Man, smushing him gently. The act was surprisingly gently, not as aggressive as some other rear based villainess. His face and upper body weren't crushed, which wasn't a fortunate thing. A hand appeared over him and the index finer started to gently noggie his head.

"Noggie, noogie, noogie. Not as bad as that tower bitch, am I right Magic? Noogie, noogie, noogie." Big Sis said.

And he hated to admit it, but she was kinda right. The very least he wasn't suffocating, or had his face crushed by Megabutt.
155332322222222222221.title: Magic Man and his Sibling

choices: He manages to put up a fight
1553323222222222222211.content:
Mark continued to struggle under the squishy round cheeks. Each was the width of his body. He quickly summoned all his strength.

“Launch!” He cried. Sophie groaned and was barely lifted off as she topple over. When her titanic body hit the ground, a rumble shook Mark. He tried to run but his sisters long arms got hold of his feet.

“Where you going Mark? Don’t want to play with your big sister?” She teased. Mark tried to fly but firmly held his feet. There was no way he could lift her when she was this size. She grasped him in both hands, trapping him. She lifted him to eye level.

“Quit it Sophie! You don’t know who you’re dealing with. It’s just like when we were kids. I may be younger, but I know that Lucha Libre is dangerous! Help me defeat her while there’s still time!”

Sophie stopped and thought for a moment. Then, she let out a loud, hearty laugh.

“Ahahaha! Oh Mark. You don’t understand. But you were right. It is just like when we were kids. Except you are the one who doesn’t understand. I was made for this. And you were made to serve my rear end!”

She tossed him down and plopped onto him once again. Her massive cheeks began to slowly close in and devour him as he lay helplessly under her.
1553323222222222222211.title: The rumble against each other

15533232222222222222111.content:
“Sophie get ompfhermmgymu!” He cried as her flesh swallowed his face. She continued to bounce up and down, crushing his head with each playful movement. Magic Man tried to push against it but his puny arms just sunk into her round orbs.

“Oh little bro. Just like old times huh Marky! You know what, I want to wrestle just like we used to. That way I can at least break a sweat!” She cried. She shifted and stood up, leaving Magic Man battered and exhausted.

She stood with her hands on her hips. Mark slowly got to his feet, but his knees trembled as he tried to stay upright. Sophie has a look of pure annoyance.

“Ughh. Let’s go!” She said. Magic Man had finally recovered. He looked at his enormously large big sister who now leaned against a building while she waited. Mark guessed she was easily 15 feet. He most likely came up to her fat meaty thighs.

“I’ll even make it easy for you.” She said. Sophie quickly began to slowly shrink down. She finally stopped at about 7 and a half feet. Mark barely reached her sizeable chest. She strutted over to him and bent down so they were face to face.

“...or are you too scared to lose to a girl?” She taunted. Mark turned red.

“Fine. I just hope you won’t tell on me this time.” He said. They both began to circle each other. Nobody wanted to make the first move.
15533232222222222222111.title: He manages to put up a fight

155332322222222222221112.content:
He quickly charged at his opponent. He ran straight into a flabby mountain and was sent back by the mass of jiggling fat. Sophie just laughed as her body continued to big up and down. Magic Man has already been sent to the ground and she hadn’t even moved.

“Isn’t that so cute! To me, it’s funny that my tiny teeny little brother thinks he can take on his BIG Sister.”
Sophie just continued to enjoy herself.

Magic Man prepared for attack number 2. This time, he waited until she wasn’t focused. He then sprang onto her, grabbing her skin tight suit to hang on.

“What the fu-“ she was cut off as punched her square in the jaw. He then kicked himself off and blasted her with a bolt of magic. She slowly fell backward. Mark was triumphant for only a moment. She quickly got up.

“You’re..gonna...regret that you little..” she cried, lunging at him. He tried to get out of the way but he was too late. She body slammed him straight onto the pavement. Magic Man screamed in pain as he was crushed under the giant.

He finally rolled out from under her. She got up. Both panted.

“You can’t win. I’m more powerful than you could ever dream of! Any form I want is a reality!” She said.

Mark watched in pure horror as his sister began to transform. She laughed and laughed as she morphed into a new form. Magic Man quivered before her might.
155332322222222222221112.title: He goes for the body

choices: Sophie puts him in his place
1553323222222222222212.content:
Sophie continues to rub and jiggle gently on his face. The feeling have her incredible pleasure. Magic Man, on the other hand, was far less comfortable. It wasn’t as bad as other villains, but he was still pinned under a mountain of flesh.

.... 5 years ago....

It was summertime. In the Rodgers’ home, Sophie and Mark both went about their daily routine. Their parents, who both worked long hours at a corporate office, were not home to control their eldest daughter.

Mark quietly snuck downstairs. He walked with extreme care so as not to wake up his beastly sibling. Mark hadn’t hit his growth spurt yet. As a scrawny, undersized 9th going into 10th grader, he had no chance against his wrestler-sized big sister.

He quickly and silently whipped out a bowl and filled it with cereal. He poured the last of the milk into it, and began to eat. Suddenly, he heard the sound of his sisters feet pounding on the hardwood floor. Her door swung open and she emerged.

Mark kept his eyes on his cereal as Sophie walked by. She ignored her annoying pest of a brother and went to get some cereal. After filling her bowl, she open the refrigerator. After a moment, she slammed it shut.

“Hey squirt.” She called. “Where’s the milk?”

Mark suddenly went white. Had he really been stupid enough to take the last of something in this house? It may seem stupid, but Mark was terrified of his sister. She may have only had 3 inches on him, but she out weighed him by at least 45 pounds. She was also twice as strong.
1553323222222222222212.title: Flashback to how she got her powers.

"Now how great am I thinking of controlling the one woman who oversees the shipping process of the highly sought after vials?" Dominator asked politely, she knew she controlled the person who stood in front of her, but she just couldn't resist.

"Very great." She made the woman in the business attire speak. She laughed and spun around in the swivel chair. Dominator laughed for a bit more before she continued on with herself.

"And whose going to get those million dollar a piece vials to sell off to the city?"She asked once more.

"You are."

"Damn straight." The villainess proclaimed. She jumped out of the swivel chair, her bubble butt jiggled like jello. She struck a pose while she strutted down the office hallway.Behind her, the woman followed in perfect unison, which made sense seeing as she was controlled by Dominator.

"God I wished they made hallways much shorter for people like me." Dominator exclaimed. Only being four-ten made most tasks difficult,but Dominator still persevered because she was Dominator. The two soon made their way to the woman's office, Dominator waited as the woman typed in her command.

"Love my powers, I just have to give someone the suggestions and their brain fills in the rest." Dominator thought. She licked in lips in thought, she wanted some gum. Just to be certain the woman was doing her job, she closed her eyes to look through her puppet's vision. It was like going into VR, she soon saw what the woman was typing. Everything seemed to be in place, so Dominator got out of the woman's mind.

"Good lady. I'm proud to be your master."

"Thank you." The woman said. With that done,all Dominator had to do was get back to her base and hold the city's hospital district hostage. She squeed a little at the thought. Dominator left the woman behind as she went towards the elevator.

1553323222222222222222112221.content:
"Hello citizens, I am Magic Man!" said the titular announcer. Magic Man looked around. The local crowd at the park took a few snaps of their photos, but most were cautiously curious of the hero. Sorta how one looked at crazed homeless men. Magic Man sulked but quickly regained his bravado.

"You probably heard of me. New hero in town. I stopped that bankrobbery two days ago." He began to assure.

"Didn't that gum-lady pull down your pants?" One woman yelled. Some of the crowd chuckled. Magic Man blushed.

"Yes..but she's been caught and handled wit-"

"And didn't she make you go all crossed-eye?" The same woman yelled back.

"Yes,but she's been handled by the authorti-"

"I heard she escaped from the county jail though." An inquisitive young man chimed in. "How are you going to deal with that?"

"Oh..um. I've been discussing with the local police how's that going to work." Magic Man managed to find his words. "So something like that will never happen again."

"Why didn't place something on her the first time?" The heckling woman questioned.

"Well" Magic Man coughed to clear his throat to sound more manly. "Well you see citizen I've was under the assurance she'd lose her powers after her first appearance."

"How'd you know that?"

"Don't say because the Succubus told you.Don't say that because the Succubus told you."

"Well-"

"And why aren't you dealing with the newest,freshest piece of action in the city?" A obviously Hispanic voice spoke. It was deep enough to sound intimidating, but sultry to tickle the funny parts in Magic Man's pants. A woman stepped through the crowds;she was around five-six and wore nothing more than a sports bra and track-shorts. Sky-blue, they heavily contrasted with her mocha skin.

"Hello Ms.."

"Lucha Libre."

"Is that your real name?" Magic Man joked to lighten the mood.

"Nah stage name. I wanted to see the biggest man in the city compadre.Get a little close to him, you know what I'm saying?"

Magic Man laughed. "Sorry, I'm not taking sidekicks or partners."

"Whose said anything about that?" Lucha Libre replied. She grabbed a man from the crowd and threw him into the air. The crowd went into hysterics as the man went soaring. Magic Man cursed before he flew off after man. Behind he could hear the words of Lucha Libre.

"Meet your new jefe, Magic Man. I'll beat your ass and drag it back to my villa!"

15533232222222222222221122211.content:
Magic Man flew as fast as he could to grab a hold of the thrown civilian. The man's scream echoed through the park's air space. Magic Man whispered and a violet mitt began to form behind the hero. He stopped midair and threw the mitt after the man. It raced faster than the man flew away and it easily caught him. The man sunk into it a little, as a way to cushion and bleed off the momentum he had developed.

Both Magic Man lowered himself with the man in tow. The two were soon back on the ground, Magic Man plopped the man onto his feet. He swiftly ran over and gave Magic Man a heartfelt shake of the hand,all the while various thanks came spilling forth.

"Yeah. You're welcome citizen, yeah thanks, yeah okay." Magic Man spoke to the grateful man. "Yes, don't worry the authorities have been notified. Yes, don't worry, you'll be safe I got to deal with the person who threw you."

And with that,Magic Man flew off back towards Lucha Libre. When he got back, he was surprised the villain didn't run off, though thankfully the civilians had scattered. Magic Man hovered watching as the villain gave the him a cheeky wave. Not waiting for her to form a counterattack, Magic Man flew straight into her. She grunted as she was shot forward a ten or so feet. Magic Man did his best not break her sternum,he didn't know how invincible she really was.

She landed on her back,and when she didn't get back up, Magic Man feared the worst. A slight groan came from the prone woman and Magic Man watched as she pushed herself back up. He stared closely and swore that the woman was a few inches taller. And after a quick jaunt into his memories,Magic Man knew for certain she was smaller. Her curves had grown a little as well, though they were nothing compared to the lean muscles she now possessed.

"Good hit Magic e-mano." Lucha Libre joked. "Now let's see how you like mine."

Almost like a bullet, Lucha Libre gave Magic a hit right into the stomach. The hero coughed in pain, he flew upwards like a pendulum on an axis. Five, ten, fifteen, twenty feet up he flew. Gravity soon brought him downwards,and only through the quick utterance of a spell.made sure he didn't land back onto the woman's fist.

"Ding.Ding. First round goes to Lucha!" She cried.

15533232222222222222221122231.content:
Magic Man flew like an arrow through the air, wind swept off his body. It was nighttime right now so the stars were out shining down on the Earth. Magic Man did a small flip to appease his sense of relaxation.

"No high stress work for me today,all smooth and no crunch." Magic Man stated. A light flickered in his peripheral and Magic Man instinctively stopped to stare. He turned three-hundred and sixty degrees to find the cause of the light. There! Magic Man spotted where it had originated from. It came from the city's observatory,much smaller than anything on the coast,but still a tourist attraction.

He flew towards the source.Unlike most observatory's,this one was made somewhat recently. Its telescope much smaller,though not downgraded in the least. The dome was much slimmer and compact compared to its counterparts. Tonight, it appeared that everything was closed. The dome snapped shut and all the lights were out. But for some reason an astronomer was standing on the roof, in one hand she held the powerful light that brought Magic Man's attention.

"What seems to be the problem?" He asked. The astronomer,a quite striking brunette, placed the light down next to her.

"Magic Man. Thank God you're here. Someone's commandeered our telescope." She said.

"And you are..?" Magic Man politely inquired.

"I'm Dr. McKenzie, I would offer some coffee if I wasn't on the roof right now." The two shook hands for formality.

"Not to seem rude but shouldn't you call the police? I'm not going to leave mind you it just seemed they could be much more helpful in this matter.Does this person have any hostages?"

"No. Its just that...I think its one of your problems."

Magic Man sighed,realizing she meant a new super villainess was in town. He asked her how to get into the building,and with one point of her finger, Magic Man sulked inside. He moved around the place for a few moments until he found a layout for the facility pasted onto one wall. He searched for a bit before he could see the door that led into the observatory interior.

He cautiously walked in doing he best to see where the assailant was. It wasn't that hard though, as two firm pair of cheeks were bent upwards at his direction. He was startled for a moment until he steadied his nerves.

Whoever owned the pair of buttocks stood up and turned around. A blonde bombshell wrapped in a tight black bodysuit, various astrological symbols,as well as celestial objects, dotted her body. She stared at Magic Man with a perplexed smile.

"Gutentag!" Evident German in her accent.

"Damien I don't think this is for me." Mark spoke. Here he was, in a two-bit suit, inside one of the fancier locales in the city.Sonny's Plaza, the hottest bar/restaurants/lounges in the entire city.Featured on a variety of shows, Mark felt almost embarrassed being here.Damien smiled at his roommate and best friend with his signature smile.

Over sixty people were here for Tuesday night's "Odd Couple", a blind date roulette. Mark could see that Damien wanted him to find someone for himself.

"You keep running off every other day. If you find someone here, fill that time with that significant other, my mate." Damien said.So here he was, going to see if that special someone was here. Damien adjusted his tie as they began to edge closer and closer to the crowd.

"Its going to be all right mate." Damien assured. "I'll be right here besides you, trying to see if my special somebody's here."

Mark edged into the crowd watching as the mingled with one another. He didn't choose to speak with anybody but Damien, feeling a little overwhelmed.

"I've saved this city like three times already, so why can't you speak with some ladies, Mark?" He thought.

This went on for about twenty minutes until a tap of a wine glass caught everyone's attention. A man in a nice suit and white tie walked forward. He smiled at the crowd.

"Is everyone done with introductions?" He asked. "If so kindly make your way to the tables. They'll be baskets for you on the first table. Men go to the right one, women go to the left. Once you get a number, find the table that corresponds with your number. And hopefully the love of your life will be there."

The crowd did so, Mark walking with Damien. The two took there numbers, Mark getting ten while Damien got sixteen. Damien waved Mark off as they headed towards their tables. Waiting for Mark was an attractive lady in a blue dress, her short hair was slightly frazzled, giving it an electrical appearance.

"Hi." The women spoke. Mark gave her a gentle wave as well.

"I'm Mark and you are?"

"Susan." Susan said with a gentle grin.

Strange Cases

They could've been aftermaths, experiments gone wrong, or just things that can never be explained. Whatever the case, Mark needs to solve them for the betterment of his city.
1553323222222222222222122.title: Strange Cases

choices: Magic Man and the Disappearing Clothing
15533232222222222222221221.content:
So to begin out cases, what shall we focus on?

Magic Man and the Disappearing Clothing
For the last ten days, people from all over the city have been loosing clothing. One minute in their normal attire, then poof, out into their birthday suits. Thankfully their clothes never seem to fully disappear though, but unfortunately they instead end up in quite inconvenient places. Magic Man is of course on the scene, can our fair hero find out the cause of this stripping force before the entire city becomes nude?

The Case of the Dopplegangers
Recently there have been reports of increased superpower activity. Not really usual, that is if one discounted the fact that these activities came from supervillainess. Reports of Lucha Libre taking down muggers or Cheersquad saving people from a burning building have been going around. Unfortunately, it seems these villainess aren't taking their name being tarnished lightly and have increased their own escapades. Its up to Magic Man to find the do-gooder culprit before the situation gets outta hand.
15533232222222222222221221.title: Strange Cases

155332322222222222222212213.content:
Super Smackdown
Behold! The most glorious event of this year! Super Smackdown! Come all ye Super ladies and fight for the title of Super Mistress of the decade! Come win seventeen million dollars of untaxable money! And come win the greatest grand prize:Magic Man!

One Week of Heaven
One day Magic Man hears from the grapevine that his villainess have a secret meeting place they use as a neutral ground. Through his keen investigation,as well as normal favour calling,Magic Man has managed to land a job in the establishment. And to Magic Man's shock he finds out the place is a resort that caters to these villainess...tastes.
155332322222222222222212213.title: Strange Cases II

choices: We focus on Mouse and Checkmate as they plan their attack
We focus on one of the villainess.
1553323222222222222222122131.content:
"What can you do with a drunken sailor? What can one do with a drunken sailor? What can we do with a drunken sailor, early in der morning~ One Magic Woman sang in the dawn's early lights.The villainess flew through the air like a bullet as the wind touched her skin.She was somewhat bored today, her favorite man in the entire world hadn't been seen in over three days. Unlike the majority of the super criminal populace, all she wanted was Magic Man. Well, okay, the other women did too, but she wanted him more!

"Now where could he be?" Magic Woman thought. "I need some more balanced land to think on."

She slowly descended and landed in the more battered quarter of the city. Abandoned,but not entirely derelict,buildings loomed over her. She strutted down the street with barely a thought of being mugged, after-all she was Magic Woman. What she didn't account for was the incoming woman dressed in such stereotypical mailman attire that she hadto be some sort of eccentric, possibly even a supervillainess.

"Okay, what's yer gimmic?" Magic Woman inquired as the woman got closer. The woman panted for a bit until she responded.

"Oh nothing I don't have powers, this is just something my boss ordered me to wear." The woman held a finger up as she caught her breath. She pushed herself straight up and peered at Magic Woman. "Took me a while to catch up to you."

"Ye were following me?" Magic Woman asked a little angry at the thought of someone knowing where she was and without even knowing about them in turn. The mailwoman didn't seem to notice the angry look on the Irish lass' face. Instead she took out an enclosed envelope from her bag. Magic Woman's eyes stared quizzically at the envelope, with a small utterance of a spell, she telekinetically picked it up from the other woman's hand.

Magic Woman looked back at the mailwoman,to her utter shock the lady seemed to have disappeared.

"Lying,two-faced." Magic Woman muttered.Opening the envelope with a constructed scissor,Magic Woman took out a piece of paper. Slowly she began to read.

"Greetings O Great Magician..."
===

This was not the only mail being opened at the moment,all over city villainess read their monikers from the top of the page.

"A once in a lifetime event is soon coming. Something so spectacular that one can barely fathom it." Hypnotits read. She was currently sitting down on an enslaved man in a run-down looking room. Off to her side was another man, this one being used as a table. A coffee mug was balanced on his back, with one hand Hypnotits took a hold of the cup.The bare-chested beauty yelped in shock as she took a sip from her coffee mug. "Uggg, you there, make this a little colder next time. I think I burnt my tongue."

A mind-addled thug walked over to his mistress to take away her mug.Off to the kitchen he went, Hypnotits tapped her foot as she waited for her coffee to be remade.

"Maybe I shouldn't invade a drug den for coffee, but ehh, all the stores are closed right now." Hypnotits spoke.
===

"We. Alright is this royal 'we' or more than one of us 'we'." Thunder Thighs spoke to the rest of her group.The other three looked at Thunder Thighs in annoyance. This mysterious message had somehow gotten into Astro-Cheeks body,only through her expelling the contents of her absorbed mass did they even find this enigmatic paper.

"Does it really matter?" Squisher yelled out. "Just read the damn thing!"

"It kinda does, we need to plan fo-hey!" The blue hair woman yelled as Megabutt took the paper from her hand. With a hip-enhanced bump, she knocked Thunder Thighs down.

"We have cordially invited you to participate in this grand event. All expenses have been paid. Now,of course, you may be asking what this event even is." She read off.
===

"We call it SUPER SMACKDOWN: A WRESTLING EVENT OF FANTASTICAL PROPORTIONS! Hell yeah!" Lucha Libre exclaimed in delight. She was currently in an alleyway, one hand wrapped around the letter while the other was chocking a man out. Around her three other guys were battered and bruised. They did try to assault one of the city's strongest vilainess so they got off relatively unscathed.

"Yes, Super Smackdown. All throughout the city every single villainess shall come and compete for a variety of prizes, as well as three grand prizes..."
===

"Shall I continue sisters?" Sister Ivanov spoke to her equals. Van Bushkirk seemed bored while Delacroix was happily making food for the others as Ivanov spoke.

"Why bother in this degeneracy?" Van Bushkirk answered. "Nothing more than defenseless women being pulled dis way and dat."

"Well hold on." Delacroix said as she appeared behind Ivanov. She looked closely at the paper to read off what she saw.
====

"The first grand prize shall be the title of 'Super Mistress of the Decade', a trophy and belt shall be provided. Hey sis come over here!" Team Player yelled out to Cheersquad. The duo, or more accurately, the small horde of women were raiding a sports shop of all places. One of the clones of Cheersquad walked over to Team Player to read the section where she was at.

"A trophy? That sounds sweet."

"I know right?"
====

"Da thecond wuv be seventeen million dolars." Lipsticker spat out.Her lips still somewhat huge after a job she did a little over an hour ago. "Seveteen millio-ack. Seventeen millions is quite a pretty penny."

Lipsticker's lips were now smaller than before. After that she continued with the paper's message.

===

"The third, and to some the most tantalizing, prize is one neatly wrapped in a bowtie: Magic Man." Mouse read as she patrolled with Checkmate. The two super heroines were doing the best they could to combat the city's villainess populace without their boss.For the past three days the two investigated where Magic Man had been taken, with the letter the duo now knew where he was at.

"This is bad Amelia." Checkmate sighed over to her friend.

"I know right. Let me continue. On the bottom of this paper are the coordinates where this event shall be taking place. In eight days time the games shall begin, all who are not there by then are immediately disqualified from the event. A barcode on the back of paper leads to a special site where the reader will be provided a printable ticket to be used as admission."

Whatever was going to happen in the next eight days worried the two as they digested the information.
