choices: We cut to the tournament day
1553323222222222222222122131223333332.content:
The Big Bovine got out of the truck and looked around the forested area. She scratched her head and turned back inside her truck.

"Sure this is the right place?" She yelled towards Cheryl, her second-in-command. Diana and Sue nodded in agreement.

"Yeah boss, I'm as sure as the sun is yella." She replied. Cowgirl nodded and walked further into the forest, behind her came the sound of her minions. Cowgirl's breasts, which were fairly sizeable at the moment,jiggled as she bent down to pick up a stick.

"Now where in hell is our host? I better not be put into some wild ass goose chas-" Cowgirl stopped. The soft sound of gears echoed from below her, she jumped back immediately to see the dirt and roots of the forest move downwards. A grey corridor greeted her group, it connected to some sort of underground bunker.

"Well come on girls, seems this means we're invited in." Cowgirl cried out. "Be on guard."

The four women walked down the corridor, it was around seventy feet downards that they finally came to a stop. A large door, about eight feet tall and six feet wide,greeted them. It opened automatically and the quartet allowed themselves in. They were saw a huge dome-like structure in the middle of the place while a woman sat down on a chair. She drank some sort of red wine, upon seeing the four women she stopped and got up to greet them.

"Bonjour and howdy my ladies." The women spoke. She was dressed in what appeared to be some sort of ringleader/night singers outfit.It was like a dress that was texture to be like a circus ringmaster.

"My moniker is Sensation,and I'm guessing you're Cowgirl and her employees?" Sensation waited for confirmation.

"Well three of them anyways but you darntootien straight we are." Cowgirl replied. "You owah boss for this here event?"

"Yes."

"So is it true? You got the magician right here?"

"Not right here at any rate, but yes, I have captured Magic Man." Sensation pulled out a phone and showed it to Cowgirl. There,in the screen, she could see the hero of the city trapped like a crippled bird.

Cowgirl whooped in glee. "The large ladies of the town will want your head for this."

"Which is why I need your group to do security. I have over forty soldiers at my disposal but I know from third-person parties that your group is quite possibly the best I can get in America." Sensation said. She led the four to a row of seats to sit themselves down. With a snap of her fingers a butler came fast walking out to hand the four ladies a drink.

"So you want us to deal with any troublemakers?" Cowgirl spoke.

"Yes,only six ladies could ever match you in the city."

"Like that wrestler or that giantess, the wrassiling one, God there are so many."

"Exactly. I also know your group has experience with other super powered beings. They have the necessary technology to combat such strange women." Sensation took a sip of wine before she continued. "I'm also offering up this little deal to sweeten our relationship. If you disavow the money from the tournament, you can keep the money I'm already giving you but get Magic Man and the title."

Cowgirl's eyes widened in surprise.

"Why do I have to give up the money?"

"I'm already paying you, also instead of some of the ladies of the city getting it, I can keep it all to myself. You'll be my "champion" who can prune the tournament. Just think you get: the title, the money, and the hero if you win.What do you say?"

"I'll be my boss' representative in that matter." Cheryl came in. The two talked for over an hour, but soon came to a conclusion, Cheryl and Sensation shook hands and finished their chat.

Cowgirl would represent Sensation in the upcoming tournament,with a hefty bonus of course.

1553323222222222222222122132.content:
Magic Man stood in front of the cliffside resort, it overlooked a river one-hundred feet below.

"So this is the place huh?" Magic Man, or more appropriately, Marcus Stanford spoke.Disguised in this persona at the moment, the hero stepped through the resort's doors, a receptionist smiled at him until she saw his clothing. She still kept the smile,but some quality of it made it seem more natural.

"New blood, you'll be heading down the door to the right." She said to him. Marcus nodded in acknowledgement and swiped his card next to the door's scanner. He shuffled for a bit until he moved down the grey steps. Darkness greeted him for a moment until the lights kicked in. His walk downwards allowed him to think about the place.

"I can't believe this resort exists, and a few miles outside the city's limits to." He had learned about this place through hushed whispers between villainess, never really getting a lead until about three weeks ago. Some words were spoke between Cheersquad and Lipsticker and from there the hero went forth to find out more about this place. It took him two weeks of basic training in a sister facility to allow him to work here, and even then he had to go through hoops and hurdles for the mysterious group that financed this resort to even consider him.

Finally reaching the end, Marcus prepared himself for some dastardly evil lair. What he instead saw was a grand vision of a place. Twenty rooms were crescent around a giant pool, maybe eighty feet wide. A bar was to the left of him,while to his side was a restaurant of some sort.

"A new employee." A voice said to the side of Mark, or Marcus in this case. The disguised hero turned to see a meticulously dressed man holding a tray of martinis.

"Seeing as you're new here, I'll point you to our easiest client here. Oh, and forgive my rudeness, my name is Hank." the man evidently named Hank spoke. "Now for your client, see that room at the end of the crescent? That would be..."

15533232222222222222222.content:
The Secret Sect of Sexy Sisters

Scarlet Ivanov, Holly Van Bushkirk, and Marie Delacroix were three women in training to become religious sisters in a small convent. They heard tales of Magic Man and the woman after him, and whispers about the source of it all, The Succubus. The three vowed to put a stop to this devilry and cardinal sin, and moved to the city to do so. Amused by this, The Succubus secretly worked her magic on them; making them apart of the problem they want to stop.

Scarlet Ivanov is a slender Russian woman with short red hair. She has the largest breasts of the three which she accentuates by replacing the top of her nun robes with a corset. She's the unofficial leader of the Secret Sect of Sexy Sisters.

Holly Van Bushkirk is a tall woman of Dutch descent with long brown hair. She cut off the dress of her robes so she can show off her legs, usually clad in thigh high stockings, to the world. The most zealous in their pursuit to "purify" Magic Man.

Marie Delacroix is a short plump french woman with curly blonde hair. Her uniform is a middle ground between her companions, a hole in the top halve of her robe to show off her cleavage, and a slit in her dress to show off her legs. The most soft spoken of the three.

Powers: Their "faith" protects them, making the Secret Sect of Sexy Sisters immune to the powers of Magic Man and the other villains.


Ms. Metal

Rosetta Taylor used to be a construction worker, until she was blamed for an accident that caused the entire building she was working on to collapse. Having been fired, the Succubus came to her when she was angry and alone. Now, she goes on rampages to ry and bring down as many buildings as she can.

Ms. Metal is a toned woman with long dark hair done in two massive braids. She goes into battle wearing nothing but a bronze bikini and brass thong.

Powers: Ms. Metal can convert her body into any metal and has some limited control over metals that are not her. Particularly, she likes turning her braids into chains and using them as flails.
15533232222222222222222.title: Back to more villains

choices: Magic Man escapes the sisters, though is confused about them
The Sister plan on their next move:can't get Magic Man, what about villain?
155332322222222222222221.content:
"I do hope Amelia likes these donuts." Magic Man thought as he soared through the air. Today was one of those good days, were all the villainesses seemed to be resting instead of attacking. Not counting another encounter with The Streak; she always does something to cause discord among the populace.

Taking out a donut, Magic Man happily munched on it as he flew. His attention was quickly taken up once he saw a peculiar sight. On the roof of a building sat three women--- that wasn't that surprising, the public did that many times before---what was surprising was the fact all three of them were dressed up as nuns. One of the women, more so, than the others. Now, normally even with the strange getup of the women, Magic Man wouldn't even think of landing. It wasn't like it was his duty to come down and investigate people in strange costumes; as long as someone didn't count his rouges gallery that is. But, the three women on the roof seemed to be trying to get his attention. With one of the women raising up her arm high in the air.

"Strange,why would they know i'm at cruising speed right now?" Magic Man mused, at this speed he could easily see someone trying to contact him. He swallowed the rest of his donut and hugged the pink box as he flew towards the girls. He landed, and placed his donut box to his side, peering greatly at each of the girls.

The one making her way forward to greet Magic Man must've been the leader or at least the one who the others delegated to. Her red hair was in a bob, which Magic Man thought was odd for a nun to have. Her eyes seemed friendly and her general demeanor was that of a usually happy woman,but Magic Man could see something like....pity behind her eyes. While the rest of her body was covered like that of a nun, Magic Man's eyes were drawn intently to her bust.

"I didn't know a sister could wear something like that?" Magic Man peered at the twins pushed greatly into a corset, which was another surprising thing for a nun to have. Shaking his head he looked at the other two walking behind the first.

The two on the woman's side seemed almost like contrasts next to the first. On her right was a tall brunette, with hair straighter than an arrow. Magic Man wondered if hair could be uncanny, because this woman's hair seemed to be fitting that criteria. On her height, she wasn't just big for a woman, she was that for a man! She could easily have been 6'3, or 6'4 in height;now even though he met size changers before, Magic Man still raised an eye at the woman's pure size. Like the other woman, her body was covered up modestly, with the exception of her legs. Magic Man wasn't much of a fan of legs---and who still is, this isn't the fifties---but even he marveled at her soft thighs and powerful calves. They were smooth, and silky, making Magic Man gape at them. Her face told a different story as she seemed to be on edge and about to rip Magic Man's throat out.

The third and last woman on the left was probably the shortest, but still her curves were fantastical. She reminded Magic Man of Enchantress or Dr. Grant; though, those two beat out the her by wide margin. Her curled blonde hair bobbed gently as she walked. Out of the three, she seemed to be the most un-nun like of them all. Both a cleavage window and a slit in her skirt made her seem like she was cos-playing a nun more than she actually was one. In a middle ground between the first and the second;she seemed reversed,but at least welcoming to Magic Man.

"Hello, Citizens, what can I help you with?" Magic Man spoke as the first woman came before him.

"Salutations, Magic Man. My name is Sister Ivanov" The red hair replied, a faint Russian accent colored her voice.

" Behind me are Sisters Van Bushkirk" She pointed to the brunette, who glared daggers at Magic Man. "And Delacroix." She pointed to the blonde who smiled gently.

"Greetings." Magic Man smiled and waved, Sister Bushkrik seemed to take offense to that and only glared more at Magic Man. Delacroix, on the other hand, only smiled more at that." Now, as I said before, what can I help you with?"

"Its not what you could do for us, its what you can do for the world." Ivanov said, beginning to speak again as she saw Magic Man's confused face." We Sisters have heard of your sins and that of your compatriots. We've seen photos of the exposed bodies and vices and discord that you all bring. Normally, we let the good of mankind work out these problems, but we know your secret."

"My secret?" Magic Man replied, wracking his brain to wonder if the girls knew he was Mark.

"THAT YOUR ILK ARE SATAN'S LAPDOGES" Sister Bushkirk screamed, her accent being hard to place.

"We are 'Ze Sister of Protection'" Sister Delacroix trumpeted " And we're here to ztop your zinning to zave your zoul."

"Please, listen, we know it wasn't your fault that you sold it, but we can help you get it back." Ivanov pleaded to Magic Man, who only looked at the three like they were loons. Stepping back, he picked up his dounut box.

"Ummm, okay. So, uhh, yeah. You do that and I'll get back to you soon enough." Magic Man flew slowly into the air and turned his back to the three. Right until he felt himself get choked by something.

Dropping his donut box, he struggled with whatever was holding his neck. Looking down, he saw it was a some leather thing; it was a whip, but Magic Man was being strangled at the moment, it could be forgiven that he wasn't in the best state of mind at the moment.

"WHERE DO YOU THINK YOU'RE GOING?" Bushkrik exclaimed as she started to pull back on the whip. Magic Man struggled against it, before deciding to fly towards Bushkirk. The sister's eyes grew wide as she saw Magic Man fly towards her,the tension eased up on the magician hero's throat as he came closer to the nun. Upon reaching her, he pulled off the whip and tangled it up with its owner. It wasn't a solid trap, but it did make her start to curse out. Rolling after the fact, he got up to see the other two holding up a weapons.

Ivanov carried a sword and shield---from who knows where---and Delacroix was holding....marbles,what?

"I knew that this was going to be a challenge." Ivanov wearily said." But fear not, we will save you, even if you don't want, or know it."

"I think we're on two different planes of existence, lady." Magic Man shot back, trying to fly back up. It didn't seem that any of the girls had powers, or at least, any movement ones that is. But just when he reached ten feet in the air, Magic Man yelled as he felt something hit his back.

"Naughty, naughty." Delacroix voice whistled. He looked behind him to see that she had thrown one of those marbles, it rolled on the floor for a few moments before it came rolling back to her.

Doing his best to fly back up, Magic Man's eyes widened as he felt his ability to do so was gone. Quickly whispering out a spell, his eyes opened wider as he knew that was gone as well.

"Don't zink about going anywhere, my beads can cancel any zpecific zet of zpells you can conjure." Delacroix explained calmly. He watched as Bushkrik got herself up from her entanglement and marched with the others towards him, menacingly.

"Lets not make this anymore difficult." Ivanov gently spoke.

Magic Man looked around for any avenue of escape and mentally cheered as he saw his escape. "You both agree on something."

Dashing to his side, he oped up the skyscraper roof door, or whatever its called. He rushed down the stairs, and after thirty steps he heard the three coming after him. He pushed forward, hearing their voices getting closer and closer.

"Thank god, it doesn't seemed if their enhanced with invulnerability or speed." His thoughts pushed out to help calm him down. Upon reaching the end of the stairs, he was greeted with a long corridor. Rushing forward, he saw the bright light of an elevator.He cheered, but looked behind himself as he saw the three arriving just behind him.

He pushed himself to the absolute limits,he needed to work out more, and slammed into the elevator. His victory was short lived however as he still saw the girls coming after him. He frantically slammed on the '1st' floor button as well as the two arrows to close it. Closer and closer they came and just when they were about to reach the door. It closed. And Magic Man waited to see if they were about to break through it; one, two, three, four, five and


None.


He sighed and slumped down, only to realize that most elevators aren't randomly open. Looking to his side, Magic Man saw an opened janitor staring down at him. She white-knuckled her broom as she looked down on him. Magic Man smiled and got up to a standing position.

"Just another day in my life, citizen." He did his best to sound confident at his own speech.
155332322222222222222221.title: The Secret Sect of Sexy Sisters

1553323222222222222222211.content:
Magic Man did his best to calmly walk out of the elevator as soon as it reached the ground floor. He did his best to ignore the stares and whispers he got from the people in the lobby. As soon as he was outside he bolted for the nearest alley.

Now, out of sight, he did his best to get his magic working again. He ran through some of the simpler spells he knew, but none of them worked.

"WHICH WAY DID HE GO?"

"Crap." The hero did the only thing he could think of and dove into a nearby dumpster. He curled up, held his nose shut, and tried not to gag on the smell as he heard the trio of crazy nuns run past.

The second he was sure they were gone, he jumped out of his hiding spot and gasped for clean air. "What the hell was their problem?" He muttered as he leaned against the wall of the alley.

Whatever it was, he had to give them points for not committing a robbery or an act of terrorism to get his attention. That alone gave them more points then most of the women he normally dealt with. Still, he had no idea what they were going on about with secrets and saving him.

He was starting to get a headache from trying to make sense of this. With a groan of frustration, he hit the dumpster he hid in with a spell that teleported it to the far side of the alley.

"Huh, magic's back."

-------------------------------------------

After a thorough magical cleaning to get every last trace of garbage off of himself, Mark made his way back to the donut shop to replace the box he lost earlier. However, as soon as he got there he ducked behind a building. Peaking around the corner confirmed his fear; one of those crazy nuns was standing in front of a nearby shop as she examined things through the window.

Coming out from around the corner, Mark looked around but could only see one of the sisters, who was being given a wide birth by the general populace. Cautiously, the collage student began to make his way over to her. They seemed to be civil, and he wasn't in his Magic Man disguise. He was probably safe right now. And maybe he could even tease some information out of her to see what they were after.
1553323222222222222222211.title: Magic Man escapes the sisters, though is confus...

choices: Ivanov sits down and orders some donuts
15533232222222222222222111.content:
Mark walked out of the corner and did his best not to draw any eyes to that. Mumbling a quick cantrip, the hero's sense of hearing increased by twentyfold and also caused Mark to cringe in pain.

"OW OW, FOCUS ON THE SISTER ON THE SISTER!" Mark thought and instantly everything else drained out and only the sound in the nun's immediate area registered. "Gah! This is why I put Amelia onto reconnaissance. Anyways,i'll just spy on her for a bit and sit down in Joey's while I'll do so."

"Excuse me." Sister Ivanov spoke to a passing citizen; she was ignored of course. If she was angry at the apathetic reaction, she didn't show it. Scratching her chin, she called out again.

"Oh, excuse me!" A woman stopped to look at Ivanov. She raised an eye at the sister's costume; Ivanov didn't notice the stare at all. The sister just spoke her question.

"Hello there good child. I am in need of assistance. Will you help me with this endeavor?" Sister Ivanov said. The woman taped her foot and gave a shrug.

"Sure. What exactly do you need Sister...?" The woman said in a tone that didn't seem quite accepting of Ivanov's occupation. I mean, why would any nun not have a cleavage window?

"Ivanov, my dear. Now for my question: Do you happen to know where exactly does Magic Man congress? Any favored areas of some sort, hidden alleys,buildings?"

"You mean like: where he usually stays around? Is that what you mean? Like his 'go-to' places?" The other woman asked.

"Yis!" Ivanov exclaimed, her Russian accent briefly flaring up. She coughed and steadied herself. "I mean, yes, that's what I meant."

"Well he usually likes to go to that donut shop over there, which I have to commend Magic Man on. Joey Doughy is a great place, local, but still better than some franchises.It also advertises the hell out of Magic Man's favoritism! I mean you should try some of their Magic Man specialties.." The woman prattled on while also pointing to the shop,just in time for Mark to walk into Joey's. The hero grimaced as heard the speech going on. He could practically feel the finger pointing at him.

"Oh come on!" He thought. He was tempted to turn around and see if the sister was coming after him,but he kept his cool.

"Just go up to the cashier and ask for a dozen; hear also what Ivanov asks Joey at the counter and gather some info."

Mark walked in with a little ding and walked up to Joey. A man in his late thirties,early forties, who seemed to have a growing gut on him.

"Mark! Come In!" Joey exclaimed. Mark immediately took Joey up on his offer. He waited for Ivanov to come barreling in after him,but she didn't

"I'm on edge. Calm down Mark, she doesn't know who you are."

"So what's shaking Joey?" Mark questioned.

"Magic Man came in earlier today, like he always does, and asked for a dozen." Joey proudly exclaimed. "I keep telling him he can take a dozen for free for the rest of his life, but he always wants to pay me full price! And you know me Mark, I can't do that to the guy who saved my ma' and baby girl! So we haggle like always and we come down to him paying half of the price. That still didn't feel good to me..."

Mark listened in on the story, knowing it because he already experienced it twenty minutes ago. "Though I wished I could've eaten those donuts."Joey soon finished and settled down to talk with Mark.

"So what will it be today Mark?"

"Give me a dozen Joey."

The man nodded and began to take a pink box out. Taking out a set of tongs, he waited for Mark's orders.

"Three glazed donuts." Joey complied and waited for Mark's next order. "One Thunder Thighnut."

Joey took out a donut that was skillfully placed together,giving the impression of a rump. How Joey did that without having his wife yell at him was beyond Mark's comprehension. It had a stylized lighting bolt on top of it as well some mixture that allowed it to delightfully bubble in one's mouth.

"One Mouse Puckering Lemon"

Joey proceeded to pick up a doughy, copyright infringement from his counter.

"Magic Man's favorite after his own!" Joey exclaimed.

"Amelia's favorite. Lemon's don't have any right to be near sugary confections." Mark didn't verbalize this though. He also wondered where Ivanov was and only hoped she had gone back to her companions. Letting his guard down, he turned off the spell.

"A Lucha Libre Loop"

"Going for that extra kick?"
Joey then picked up a bread loop covered in that red-orange powder that has been on the rage. Mark didn't like spicy stuff that much, but he did like this.

"A Squisher Supreme."

"Thank God for big boxes, am I right Mark?"

Joey picked up a giant,chocolate covered donut and placed it in the box.

"One Cheerleader Cluster."

"Going for the a whole lot of doughy goodness?"

Joey grabbed a hold of a weirdly deformed donut covered in pink frosting and purple sprinkles.

"How about a Shyren Stick?"

"Feeling a little naughty today, Mark?"

Joey grabbed a hold of a blue donut stick and put it into the box.

"One Magic Woman Mayhem."

"Of course."

Joey put in a chocolate covered donut styled like a suit into the box. It had strawberry filling.

"And two Magic Man Masters."

Joey placed in a something that looked almost like a Magic Woman Mayhem, but a little bigger and it had blueberry in it.

"That'll be all Mark?" Joey asked and Mark nodded. Joey went to the cash register with the box, but before he did so, he let out a little chuckle

"Something funny Joey?"

"Yeah, its just, this is EXACTLY what Magic Man ordered earlier. Can you even believe it?"

"That is interesting." A Russian voice called out behind Mark.

"Crap." He mumbled, turning around to face the sister as she walked in.
15533232222222222222222111.title: It was Sister Ivanov

choices: Mark allows himself out of the store.
Ivanov continues her question, Mark gets caught in the crossfire
Mark watches just to make sure Joey is okay.
155332322222222222222221111.content:
"Excuse me, sir, I would like to ask some questions regarding Magic Man." Ivanov politely inquired.

Mark did his best to act surprised, while Joey legitimately was. The two looked at each other for a moment. Mark scratched his head in thought.

"Do you mean Marky man here or me?" Joey questioned. Ivanov coughed a little to regain some composure. She walked closer to the two and spoke.

"Uhh...you shopekeeper. I do apologize for confusing you." Ivanov said. "But to reiterate, I'm looking for information on Magic Man. I had overheard your talk with 'Marky Man' regarding the fiend."

Joey laughed at that. "Fiend? You mean hero?"

"Hero! A black magic user? A hero? Sir, are you sure you're okay?" Ivanov questioned, for a brief moment her accent had gotten thicker. Why were such a diverse group of nationalities looking for him? He only worked in his city.

"Russkie, I don't wanna alarm you,but Magic Man's been a killing on the city. I mean look at my selection of donuts." Joey laughed without a hint of mocking the woman. "He's also been protecting this city from all manner of weirdos, though I wouldn't be here today with three other stores if said weirdos weren't here."

Ivanov bristled a bit at his remarks, but unlike that taller sister, she seemed to compose herself easily enough.She mumbled something in Russian, which Mark couldn't quite understand, before she continued on.

"His web has infected this entire city, I can't believe it. I will choose to ignore this decadent horror,for now let us get back to my questions."

"I'm waiting." Joey interrupted.

"Magic Man, he comes here often?"

"Yep."

"Why?"

"Man loves my doughy confections, I told him where to find me after he saved my life. I remember that day, driving on the road one winter, doing my best to see my niece's birth. I smashed against some black ice and swerved down the road, it was only by Magic Man's hands did my car not become my tomb. Man I thank him everyday." Joey spoke, pride in his voice at the hero's deed.

"No problem Joey." Mark thought.
155332322222222222222221111.title: Ivanov does a quick integration.

choices: She decides that her search is going no where and regroup with the others
Bushkirk tells the others that she'll go on a single woman hunt for awhile
15533232222222222222222112.content:
He approached the closest Sister near him, who seemed to be muttering something as she held her rosary. Her eyes were open but she was waddled strangely along the building's front.She traveled across the street easily as no cars seemed to be coming at the moment,Mark took this opportunity to follow.He watched as a few folk pointed her out,but didn't do much else. They mumbled among themselves as they watched the strange nun move across the sidewalk.The nun soon went down an wide alley and the people decided that the spectacle had lost its luster.

The disguised hero saw his chance in getting some info on this new trio.Mark shuffled around a bit to make him look more "student-like"; he ruffled his shirt, held on closer to his pink box, and took on a more dazed attitude.Walking into the alleyway, he found the sister with closed eyes. As he went forward, he groaned as he realized who he picked.It was Sister...something he forgot. Placing her under the name of "Sister Whip", Mark moved closer to the woman.

"Excuse me.." He quietly spoke. Instantly the woman turned around and grabbed him by the neck. Mark was about 5'9 in height,but the woman was a strapping 6'3 or 6'4. She had enough height on the man to easily do this. Mark's pink box fell to the alley floor and he made sure to angle it as to not have its content's spill.

"Not going to pay for another box, Amelia's lemon jellies are in there! And they were the last ones in this shop!"

"I'VE GU-" The Sister instantly looked admonished as she realized to her eyes she was holding a innocent man. She swiftly let him down.

"I apologize. Deeply. I thought you were the heathen, the one they call: Magic Man." The nun spoke. "Allow this humble servant of The Lord to introduce herself. My name is Sister Van Bushkirk of The Sister of Protection."

Mark's filed the name away in his mind.And also her strange accent. Straightening himself he began to ask his questions.

"If I may Sister, can I ask some questions?"

The woman seemed strangely pleased at Mark's request. She wiped down her habit,which briefly showed off her gorgeous legs. Mark couldn't help but appreciate the healthy,but large,limbs.

"I shall answer to the best of my ability."

"Who are these Sister of Protection? They aren't from around here. Are they after anything in particular?"

"The sisters of composed of me, Sister Ivanov,and Sister Delacroix. We seek one thing,my child, that is the redemption of the villains of this city. Especially the one who stand on top of it all, Magic Man!"

"I don't stand at the top of all this! At best, I get sat upon at the bottom." Mark internally joked. Picking up his pink box, he walked with Sister Van Bushkirk as they exited the alley.

"What makes you believe that Magic Man is a problem?"

"We have heard whispers of a demon from Hell. A Succubus that transforms women into perverse characters for Magic Man's pleasure. Think how many women villains there are and think about why they choose Magic Man of all people to go after."

"Owch."

"They could go after any other man in this city, but they choose Magic Man! Logically this could've been coincidence if it was one or two villains or even five. But all villains obsessed with the man? This could only being his perverted fantasy that he sold his soul for!"

"Ahhh. Yeah, that could be an explanation." Mark said. " But what about his partners?"

"The Mouse girl and the Chess copier? Hhhmph. Slaves to his whims. Poor girls,we shall free them!" Sister Van Bushkirk raised her fist to the air,before she meekly put it down. "Apologizes,Lord."

"And how do you plan to take him on?"

"With The Lord's powers of course." Sister Van Bushkirk stared at Mark like he was a child asking a strange question. "His might easily overpowers any black magic the sorcerer possess. He shall fail without his infernal backing. Now child I must excuse myself from this conversation, I have to find this evil."

Sister Van Bushkirk was about to walk off, but Mark chose one last question for the road.

"Um,real quick. Sister, why do you wear that outfit?"

Sister Van Bushkirk looked down at her provocative habit and stared back at Mark.

"To give Magic Man one last happy memory before we go through the process of redeeming him." Sister Van Bushkirk spoke ominously. She shot off, leaving Mark with his pink box of donuts. Placing it under one arm, Mark took out his cellphone and dialed Amelia.

"Hi. Amelia. I think i'm in large trouble..."
15533232222222222222222112.title: It was Sister Van Bushkirk

choices: Magic Woman, and she was pissed to see Mark in the arms of another woman.
The Shinker was coming and shrinking everything in her way.
15533232222222222222222113.content:
"Um, hello?" Mark said cautiously as he approached the blonde 'nun'. He did his best to ignore the various looks he was getting from people passing by.

"Yez?" Sister... Crap he couldn't remember which nun was which. "Is zere zomething I can help you with?" she asked, ignorant to his thoughts.

"I was just sort of wondering what you were doing going around dressed like that?" the collage student said as he stopped next to her

"Oh, yez, well, you zee..." the nun fumbled her words as her face turned a cherry red. That piqued the hero's interest; it was rare for the villains he fought to have a sense of shame. The only one he could name off the top of his head was Shyren, and she didn't exactly have the worst intentions.

"Are you okay?" Mark hesitantly put a comforting hand on the shorter woman's shoulder. He felt a tingly sensation in his palm on contact. Was this that anti-magic effect she had used on him earlier?

The shapely woman nodded her head in reply, although her face seemed to turn even redder from his touch. "My fellow Zisters and I... We came to zis zity to help."

Before he could ask what they were here to help with, Mark was interrupted by screaming. Panicking people came running down the street. The hero tried to move to the source of the problem, but the blonde nun pushed him against the store window and did her best to shield him from the mob with her smaller, shapely body.

Mark felt the tingling sensation flow through him. Dread filled him as he realized the Sister just unintentionally sealed away his powers again. He nervously gulped as he saw one of his villains heading this way.
15533232222222222222222113.title: It was Sister Delacroix

choices: Magic Woman shows interest in her offer.
Magic Woman tries to fight Sister Delacroix.
Magic Woman grabs Mark and telports out of there.
155332322222222222222221131.content:
"Oh, Magy!" the familiar voice of the hero's ex girlfriend called out. "Oi've been so lonely without ya."

The magical Irish woman hovered above the street. Occasionally she would trow a spell into the flee crowd. People collapsed as they were tied up, frozen, or started to spasm uncontrollably. Before long, everyone who was still capable of leaving had cleared out of there.

"Oi! Preacher!" Magic Woman called out when she spotted the curvy blonde woman in a nun outfit pinning Mark to a wall. "Just what do ya think ya doin' to my Marky!"

Realizing the somewhat compromising position she was in, the nun backed away. Despite her embarrassment she still asked curiously, "Marky?"

"She's... my ex-girlfriend." Mark admitted hesitantly . He was suddenly uncomfortable with all the looks of pity the incapacitated civilians were giving him.

"I'm zorry." the bombshell dressed like a holy woman said softly. A determined fire lit in her eyes as she turned to face the villainess. "I am Zister Delacroix!" The nun declared with none of her meekness from earlier to be found. "My Zisters and I have come to this zity in the name of the Holy Virgin to clenze it of zin! Miz, if you truly still have feelings for zis man, then I implore you! Cease your evil ways! It is not to late! You can still return to the happy couple you once were!"

The disguise hero was dumbfound by the Sister's speech. Not only was she trying to reason with one of his rogues, but she completely misunderstood the situation between them.
155332322222222222222221131.title: Magic Woman, and she was pissed to see Mark in ...

choices: The Fanny Four looking around for something
1553323222222222222222211332.title: Another Villainess

155332322222222222222222.content:
Mark stood in line as it moved forwards, ever so often he checked his watch to see the time. He stared at his wrist, almost as if the time would go faster if he kept staring.

"GOD! Why is it such a busy day?" Mark mentally screamed. "I should change banks."

He yawned, unaware that behind him, many patrons were gasping in shock as a woman stepped past them. She literally wore nothing but a bikini,though, considering what city she was in, it wasn't that odd. That did mean one thing however, she was a villain. Many people in the back ran out the doorway as this crazed woman stalked forward.

She bumped into Mark as she made her way forward.

"Hey!" He said, the woman stopped and stared at him. She glared as Mark looked at her, he was about to open his mouth, before he realized that he was currently witnessing a new villain emerge. That, or she was a reject from a local bikini shoot. The long,viking braids were a nice touch though, and Mark did admire her toned body. It wasn't like she was the most ripped of his rouges, Lucha Libre still held the honor of that, but Mark did admire her muscles.

"What?" She drawled as Mark stared at her.

"Nothing." He acted intimated by her, the woman smiled as he did and proceeded to grab and noggie him.

"Thats what I thought." Pushing him back, she walked to the front of the line. Mark took this distraction to head into the men's room.

The woman reached the teller and smiled at the small, black haired woman manning the counters.

"Howdy, I'm Ms.Metal. I'm going to rob this entire bank and walk away like nothing ever happened." Ms. Metal (apparently) stared as the black haired woman looked right at her. Rolling her eyes, Ms. Metal took out what appeared to be a piece of steel.

Holding it,her skin gained a glossy sheen and the woman turned into a steel stature of herself. Clocking her fist back, the teller was about to scream, before she noticed that Ms.Metal's fist seemed to stop right before hitting her. Something was catching it;the metal villainess turned around to see a blue rope around her wrist. Magic Man was straining to hold it, before noticing the metal woman's eyes were upon him.
